name: Super cozy and central with a back garden
summary: The place has a very cozy air. All the people who've lived here are artists of some sort so many art pieces around. The room gets a lot of sunlight and gets warm quick and easy. Kitchen is medium-sized and all cooking utensils are available. The apartment is located very centrally in one of the most beautiful neighborhoods in Istanbul: Yeldegirmeni (look it up!). Very close to all transportation.
space: Has a back garden that feels like a little forest. A ferry ride away from the European-side, and close to pretty much everything you think you'll need. 15 minutes away from the beautiful seaside of Moda, and hundreds of cute little spots/cafes/art galleries to hang-out. Oh, it's also on the first floor, so no stairs!

Oh, it's also on the first floor, so no stairs! Back garden Balcony (our balcony has a very pleasant air and view for spending time alone or with friends. Note: access is through my room, so not accessible for some hours -when I sleep or need some privacy-) Kitchen Mini study salon As long as I'm not scheduled for work, I can b
neighborhood_overview: Yeldegirmeni, Kadikoy is located on the Asian side of Istanbul and is known to have a different air than any other area. Safe, colorful, lively, and very 'neighborhood' like. It's full of old historical houses, walls and walls of huge beautiful graffiti, lots of cozy cafes, wonderful-smelling bakeries, creative galleries/workshops, and countless wonderful streets to walk around in. It's a 10 minute walk from the seaside, and all kinds of transportation you'd need.
transit: Ranging from 5-15 minutes away from all the available transportation: buses, ferries, metro, and the metrobus. We can always help you with getting around of course.
access: Back garden Balcony (our balcony has a very pleasant air and view for spending time alone or with friends. Note: access is through my room, so not accessible for some hours -when I sleep or need some privacy-) Kitchen Mini study salon
interaction: As long as I'm not scheduled for work, I can be available to hang out and show you around. I love socially cooking so I'd most probably cook for/with you now and then. Also available for calls, texts or emails
house_rules: Would be nice if guests do their own dishes if used. Smoking is only allowed if window is open(and if you are blowing outside the window).

host.host_about: Feeling alive in beautiful Istanbul. A part-time English-Arabic interpreter for an RSC. Working towards becoming a yoga instructor. Enjoying all the little (and big) things. Cooking, laughing, loving, dancing, exploring, making mistakes, learning, and going forward. Attempting to always remain content. :)

If you want a wonderful airbnb, with hosts who really get the airbnb spirit - stay with Luna and Kubra. I had a really comfortable stay. Luna told me which cafes to go to and Kubra told me which places I might like to visit. The apartment is in the perfect location, a few minutes walk to the ferry, or, if you prefer to stay in the area, close to cafes and galleries. I also really enjoyed my conversations with Luna and Kubra and getting to know them. Wonderful hosts.

Luna and Kubra are amazing hosts, ready to help you with everything and anything. They reply really fast, the communication is amazing. Apartment gives home-like feeling which allows good rest and peaceful sleep. Definitely recommend the hosts and apartment for everyone who values family atmosphere!
Expect excellent hospitality and comfort
Really nice and well located place! The host was helpful to create a awesome time in Istanbul! I enjoyed my time.. very much!

name: Sultanahamet Old City Two-Bedroom Suites 6 Person
summary: Alhambra Apart Hotel is set in a restored Ottoman mansion built in the 19th century. Situated 800 metres from the historic Sultanahmet area with Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque and Topkapi Palace, this property offers self-catering accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi. With parquet floors, the rooms at Residence Alhambra feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a work desk. The private bathrooms come with a shower hairdryer and free toiletries. Emre CELIK Alhambra Apart Hotel
space: Alhambra Apart Hotel is set in a restored Ottoman mansion built in the 19th century. Situated 800 metres from the historic Sultanahmet area with Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque and Topkapi Palace, this property offers self-catering accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi. With parquet floors, the rooms at Residence Alhambra feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a work desk. The private bathrooms come with a shower hairdryer and free toiletries. You can prepare your meals in the privacy of your own kitchenette with a fridge and a microwave. Situated in a historic neighbourhood with cafés and restuarants you can also venture out and sense the local atmosphere. The staff will be more than happy to help you with car rentals, tour information and ironing services. Cemberlitas Tram Station is 350 metres away offering easy access to other sites in the city. Ataturk Airport is within 15 km and airport shuttle services are arranged at an additional fee.

name: Sweet Spot's Tropical Cottage & Walk to Beach
summary: This is Hawaiian living where the indoors meet the outdoors as large sliding doors open to a wide lanai under a tropical ceiling of wooven mats. Surrounded by nature our open air screened kitchen has an airy feeling that is breezy and cozy all at once. Wood harvested from the property provide exotic detailing throught the cottage. Sliding glass doors open to east where a sunrise will greet you every morning and the skies at night provide some of the best celestial viewing for star enthusiasts.
space: The grounds have been cultivated over many years with mature and food bearing trees from coffee, cacao, mango, soursop, avocado, macadamia nut, breadfruit, sugar cane as well as citrus like lime, grapefruit, oranges and tangerines. Just a 15 minute walk is the stunning Kehena Black Sand Beach that is the only clothing optional beach on the island. Expect to see whales off the coast during the winter months.

host.host_about:
I am from Big Island. A world traveler and I live off the grid growing a lot of my own food. A variety of fruit trees and such. I went to Clown College and was in show business most of life. These days I am working as a transformational life coach and toy inventor. I am easy going, a fantastic communicator and facilitator and life/transformational coach.  I enjoy a wide variety of food and music and art. My favorite places to visit so far is, underwater reefs, Amsterdam and Morocco, New Orleans and the Canadian Rockies. Big into backpacking and have been involved with a global men's group (Mankind Project) for over ten  years where we initiate men into what it means to be responsible, accountable, emotionally literate and compassionate. I am a playful and inspiring soul. I look forward to connecting with you. 
You will be hard pressed to find a spirit as unique as mine as I am a W.O.W. Wizard of Whimsy. Playful, engaging, inspiring, thoughtful, insightful. I can offer one-on-one sessions to people who are looking to shift their perspective in their lives and access the dreams they always wanted to live. I am a change maker, innovator, creative soul. With aloha....

If you are looking for an immaculate place to stay in a great neighborhood a stone’s throw from everything, this is it.  The apartment was located in a nice upscale building with a doorman.  The view was beautiful!  All the amenities in the apartment were brand new and in perfect condition.  Located on Lee Tung Avenue we found everything we needed right there including access to the Wan Chai metro stop and a grocery store in the basement.  Great base for exploring HK or just laying low in style.

space: Flats are at very central location and Building has Restaurant, Fitness, Outdoor and Indoor Pool..Also There is Lobby and Computers for you..

Hi i m Ogün and i m  from Istanbul.. I m Married and have 2 Child..I am Tourism proffessional. I make Hotel management and also rent Livanur Flats for Guests who come to (Website hidden by Airbnb) the way Livanur is my daughter name :)

name: Apt. avec deux chambres fermées  - Parc Lafontaine
summary: Lumineux 4 1/2 proche du Plateau et du Parc Lafontaine : 20min à pied de l'avenue Mont-Royal et 2min à pied du parc. Vous pourrez emprunter le bus 24 sur Sherbrooke, en haut de notre rue, qui dessert le centre-ville ou la ligne verte au métro Papineau à 15min de marche. Vous tiendrez compagnie à notre Chat, Mallow, qui sera présent lors de votre séjour. Elle vit principalement dans le salon et aura besoin de tout votre amour pour la nourrir et changer sa litière (1 à 2 fois par semaine).

Vous pourrez emprunter le bus 24 sur Sherbrooke, en haut de notre rue, qui dessert le centre-ville ou la ligne verte au métro Papineau à 15min de marche. name: Chambre dans grand logement proche du métro
summary: Location d'une chambre avec lit double dans un grand logement.
space: Le logement est composé de 3 chambres, une grande salle de bains, une cuisine, un salon, une salle de lavage et une terrasse avec jardin.
description: Location d'une chambre avec lit double dans un grand logement. Le logement est composé de 3 chambres, une grande salle de bains, une cuisine, un salon, une salle de lavage et une terrasse avec jardin. Vous aurez accès à toutes les parties communes et accès à tous les accessoires dans la cuisine. Une salle de lavage avec laveuse/sécheuse est également à votre disposition. Je ne serais pas sur place au moment de votre séjour mais je suis joignable en tout temps. Le quartier est en pleine expansion, vous êtes à 7-8 min à pied de la Rue Ontario avec ses commerces, bars, restaurants et épicerie (Dollarama, Métro, SAQ ect...). Un dépanneur et une pharmacie sont au coin de la rue pour les petites urgences ;) Le métro situé à 3 minutes à pied vous amène au centre ville de Montréal en 10 minutes max. Si vous souhaitez vous parquer dans la rue c'est possible mais attention aux horaires. Il y a cependant possibilité de se stationner derrière le logement dans une ruelle. Le logement dispose de 3 c
neighborhood_overview: Le quartier est en pleine expansion, vous êtes à 7-8 min à pied de la Rue Ontario avec ses commerces, bars, restaurants et épicerie (Dollarama, Métro, SAQ ect...). Un dépanneur et une pharmacie sont au coin de la rue pour les petites urgences ;)
notes: Le logement dispose de 3 chambres dont 2 sont occupés. Vous vivrez donc avec mes colocataires. (Deux personnes)
