name: Lovely apartment with private parking
summary: Independent apartment, fully equiped in vintage house. It holds 1 bedroom, kitchen, living room, bathroom and a further terrace outdoors. It may accomodate up to 5 people and is located very close to Campanhã, Porto's main train station.
space: If you are looking for an apartment with a central location when stepping out of the door puts you right in the busy stream of the city centre, the touristic bars and restaurants and the hop on/hop off bus, then this is not the right place for you. If, on the contrary, you are looking for a quiet neighbourhood where the city still boasts something truly genuine, even if you have to walk 15/20 min to reach the center, then this is the place for you :) This is an apartment in a beautiful early 20th century house located in the eastern part of Porto, an area of growing interest for tourism and housing in the city. It is very close to Porto main train station (Campanhã) as well as metro and bus.  The apartment is on the 2nd floor and only accecible by stairs. It has 1 bedroom with double bed. The living room is equipped with a sofa-bed for 2 people. Still there is a small mezzanine where we keep a mattress for a single bed, just in case it's necessary. It is best designed to host 1 couple
description: Independent apartment, fully equiped in vintage house. It holds 1 bedroom, kitchen, living room, bathroom and a further terrace outdoors. It may accomodate up to 5 people and is located very close to Campanhã, Porto's main train station. If you are looking for an apartment with a central location when stepping out of the door puts you right in the busy stream of the city centre, the touristic bars and restaurants and the hop on/hop off bus, then this is not the right place for you. If, on the contrary, you are looking for a quiet neighbourhood where the city still boasts something truly genuine, even if you have to walk 15/20 min to reach the center, then this is the place for you :) This is an apartment in a beautiful early 20th century house located in the eastern part of Porto, an area of growing interest for tourism and housing in the city. It is very close to Porto main train station (Campanhã) as well as metro and bus.  The apartment is on the 2nd floor and only accecible by stai
neighborhood_overview: Eastern Porto has a unique cultural environment. It blends the tradicional, the pop and kitsch with the artsy and the most contemporary hipster styles. The neighbourhood is quiet but active and lots of tradicional commerce can still be found nearby. It is located at walking distance from the city centre, the Faculty of Fine Arts, the public Library, the river Douro, etc.
notes: When  arriving please ring on the 1st floor right (the bell states 1º Dto). That is where we live and will be waiting for guests to arrive.
transit: Campanhã train station 5 min away, Sao Bento train station 20 min away. Heroismo metro stop 200 mt up (direct line to the Airport, Matosinhos, Maia and Porto main city centers). Bus stops just about everywhere :)
access: Guests will have access to all in the apartment, including the possibility of laudry. Private parking is also available for no cost.
interaction: We will interact with the guests in accordance with their wishes. We live in another apartment of the same house, one storey down. All the tennants in the house are friends so interaction is quite common.
house_rules: Above all we expect our guests to enjoy their stay. As a basic rule, don't do anything you wouldn't like other people doing to yourselves!

host.host_about: Hi! My name is José and Elisabete is my partner. We love being with people so our house is normally full of friends which include all our neighbours.We love our house and always find ways to change things around. I am a visual artist and work in the neighbourhood. Elisabete is an ex teacher, now in a new project producing and developing the best cold pressed oils for skin and hair care! We love too many things to describe them all, so we might say we love life!

reviews.comments:
Excelente experiencia en el Lovely apartment in Vintage House, fue justo lo que buscábamos con mi novia, queríamos vivir unos días sintiéndonos parte del lugar y saborear la cultura de la increíble ciudad que es Porto y lo hemos logrado al estar en una edificio típico de Porto en una casa Vintange con muy buen gusto y el excelente y muy buen trato de Bety y José y los demás vecinos del edificio, que estuvieron todos muy atentos con nosotros!
Además la casa está a sólo unos 10 minutos andando del centro y enfrente de la casa hay un mercado y varios negocios y muy buenas pastelerías y panaderías!, hay una estación de Metro a una calle de la casa.
En síntesis la experiencia fue de lo mejor! y para mi sorpresa la casa tiene un lugar de aparcamiento muy grande y lo mejor es que la casa tiene una terraza grande con mesa y banquetas para poder desayunar, comer o relajarse allí a gusto!, espero volver pronto a Porto y a la Vintage House!
Saludos, Nahuel

Oh we loved it so much. The house is so beautiful and its just a small walk to the city center through lovely streets. We enjoyed the time a lot and Jose & Elisabeta were very nice and helpful. In case we come back, we are going to stay there again.

We were were in Porto only few days and we think that Jose and Elizabeth apartment completes the charm of this city. Old furnitures, radio, balcony. Everything has its history. It is situated close to the subway and about 15 minutes from downtown. It has coffee place and supermarket across the street. The apartment has all the necessary equipment for shorter and longer stay in Porto. The bed in the bedroom is big and very comfortable. About hospitality of Jose and Elizabeth I could write a long essay. They are extremely welcoming, friendly and they will help you in everything. Next time we will definitely return to them.
Nos encantó el apartamento, nos encantó el barrio y nos encantaron los anfitriones. Altamente recomendable! Queremos volver, y que la próxima vez sea por más tiempo!!

L'appartement de José et Elisabeth est très confortable et lumineux. La maison dans laquelle il se situe est vraiment très jolie. La terrasse de l'appartement est très également un endroit où passer un peu de temps . José et Elisabeth ont été très agréables  avec nous et nous ont laisse beaucoup de liberté pour l'arrivée et le départ.

The apartment of Elisabeta and José is really gorgeous!!! The location is great and it is more beautiful than the pictures look like. José and Elisabeta are very friendly und warm heartet persons. It was like visiting good friends!
Beautiful flat, great location, helpful host. Would book again.

José and Elisabete were very welcoming hosts they made us feel comfortable in their beautiful apartment which is very well located just outside the city center in a nice quiet and safe neighbourhood. Would book again

We enjoyed a lot our stay in José's appartment. It is very nicely decorated, spacious, light and comfortable. It is 1 min walk from the metro station from where you can be in the centre in approx. 10 min or less (the centre is also not too far by foot, 15-20 min). José was very kind and helped us a lot.

L'appartement était tout simplement magnifique, décoré avec raffinement. José a été un hôte attentionné et ce, sans que nous lui demandions. Le lieu est tranquille, près des attractions principales sans toutefois être touristique. C'était tout simplement parfait. N'hésitez pas réserver à cet endroit et vous serez ravis. De plus, la douceur, la gentillesse et les conseils de José vous seront utiles et bienfaisants. Je rêve d'y retourner.

José is a wonderful host, he is very hospitable and not only is the place great, José also has a great taste. All his recommendations in the neighborhood were spot-on and gave me a good start in exploring Porto. Wish I had more time to get to know the city

José est un hôte très attentif et attentionné qui sait faire des propositions et être à l'écoute des demandes , tellement sympathique ainsi qu' Elizabette et nous avons eu la joie de partager un petit apéro avec lui et le lendemain un repas avec eux et leurs amis . De plus la communication est très aisée , d'abord parce que José est très ouvert , mais en plus il a une connaissance du français qui est d'un haut niveau ( il frise la perfection !!!) Le lieu est permet de rejoindre rapidement toutes les points touristiques de Porto.Tout simplement parfait. N'hésitez pas réserver à cet endroit et vous serez ravis. En plus de la ville de Porto nous avons profité de la gentillesse de José , d'Elizabeth ... C'est à ne pas manquer ...Bien à toi José et à Tous .. bernard

José's apartment is a lovely place 15 minutes away on foot  from downtown (if you don't want to walk there is a metro station 1 minute away from the house) in a nice local neighborhood with everything you need close. I could not imagine a better place to enjoy and rest during a relaxing trip to Porto. José is really friendly and he offered his help every moment. He even let us park our car in a private parking area of the building. The place is really comfortable and unique. The entrance hall of the building is charming and we felt really like locals staying there. You will also enjoy José's amazing artwork hanging on the wall. We definitively recommend it to anyone that want to visit the beautiful city of Porto.

Super appartement très bien décoré,  au calme et à 2 stations du centre ville! Vraiment une super localisation et un super appartement!  Accueil top par José et une vrai confiance installée facilement!  
A 100 m le métro et de quoi faire les courses! 
5 jours géniaux avec la visite de la ville de porto et des plages de matsouhinos!
José was an incredibly welcoming and helpful host. He provided us with details of places to go and eat out and the apartment is stunning. I would strongly recommend staying here.

Nous avons adoré notre séjour chez José. L'appartement est superbement décoré, calme et pas loin du centre ville. Des bars très sympas sont également pas loin de l'appartement. 
José est très prévenant et extrêmement disponible en plus d'être de bon conseil!

José's apartment was perfect! It's beautifully decorated and has everything you need to make your stay in Porto complete. José is a great host and has a lot of good tips for exploring Porto. Truly recommended!

We stayed for 2 nights and it was just perfect. José is a lovely host and was very welcoming. He gave us lots of good recommendations. The apartment is beautiful everything was clean and just perfect. We would definitely stay there again.
Fomos muito bem acolhidos por o José :) o apartamento é mesmo perfeito, decorado com gosto é bem situado para descobrir o Porto! Até a próxima José!

I enjoyed my stay in Porto and the apartment. José was very helpful when I needed something. I liked the furniture, the artworks and the atmosphere of the apartment. When I arrived there was a bottle of fresh water and some fruits.
Perfect place! Lovely apartment and a very nice host. We spend 3 days in Porto, but we wished to stay longer, because of the nice apartment. We felt very comfortable there :)

The apartment was beautiful. We loved the art and furniture. The balcony was awesome, even though it rained for the majority of our trip. Communication was excellent and José was very responsive to everything we needed. Check in was very easy. The location was great, one block away from the Heroísmo metro station.

We had a great time in Vintage house. José's apartment is located close to the centre in non touristic area full of local shops an cafes. Metro station is literally round the corner with easy access to the airport.  Apartment is clean, cozy and very stylish. Furnitures, paintings and all artistic details make you feel special there. Kitchen is fully equipped and full of sunlight in the morning. Spacious terrace gives you a chance to enjoy views and warm evenings in Porto. José and Elisabete are great hosts. Friendly lovely people with artistic souls. It was pleasure to meet them. All this makes you feel like home. Only regret we didn't have enough time to have a glass of wine with them! Thank you once again for everything, Elisabete and José!
Отличная квартира! Очень удобное расположение,близко к метро, рядом супермаркет. На кухне вы найдете все, что необходимо! С большими чемоданами будет тяжело - нужно подниматься пешком по лестнице.
Another wonderful stay with Jose. Perfect  apartment, perfect location, perfect host. Thank you!

José is a great Host ! We had a wonderful time in his lovely, very charming and convenient apartment, situated very clothe to the center of Porto and near by metro station and shops, with a big balcony for sunny breakfasts.
José was available for us when we needed, he can advice you for any facilities and even showed some of his very fine art works.

Highly recommended !

Amazing appartment! José and his wife are really nice and friendly persons.  
We were impressed about the beautiful flat, great art. Easy car parking. 
Located close by to the tube station. Also easy to walk to the main sightseeing spots.
Nice old building with beatiful furniture. Easily accessible by car since there is private parking. Friendly host.

After a helpful email and telephone contact with José, Elisabetta welcomed us and it was a very warm welcome. The spacious apartment is beautiful renovated and decorated with keeping the old style but with all comfort.  The second day we were invited to dinner by Elisabetta  with José and Elisabetta and two other  inhabitants of the house. There is a very special warm and friendly atmosphere in the whole building. They gave us all tips where to go. So we visited the modern museum and went to the Fado café. (what was really very nice José!) 
We felt very at home so after three nights staying in the appartment I really didn't wanted to return home. It is so beautiful and in the neighbourhood of everything and if not walkable than the metro is at the corner and busstops everywhere.
We only can recommend this apartment in a nice, not touristic part of Porto.
Muy recomendable el lugar, la ubicación y la atención que ofrece José. Sin duda, repetiré!

José y Elisabetta han estado muy atentos y han hecho que nuestra estancia fuese perfecta. La casa es preciosa, acogedora y con mucho encanto. El barrio, tranquilo y muy bien comunicado con el centro. La boca de metro está al lado de la casa, de todos modos el centro está a 10 minutos andando, nosotros fuimos siempre a pie.
Es un apartamento al que volvería sin lugar a dudas...quizás para el solsticio de verano ;)
Adoramos a experiencia. Fomos muito bem recebidos pelo josé e a sua familia. a casa é antiga e renovada com muito bom gosto. Bem localizada e bem comunicada.
we felt like at home with the kind and light presence of Jose et Elisabeth in the earthly city oPorto...with amazing sunny days in January...this was a great stay...thank you..Armend et Niki

We loved staying at José's flat. It was just beautiful and homely and in a very good location. Already in the few emails that went back and forth between us and José he made us feel very welcome. We also arrived quite late but that wasn't a problem at all. We only stayed in Porto for a few days and José gave us some really good tips on what to do and we loved every single one he gave us. He marked everything on our map so we could find it again which was lovely.
We had a great stay, only the weather was quite bad which definitely made us consider going back in summer time again. I can imagine that having breakfast on the balcony of this flat must be very awesome ;-)
Jose was a wonderful and very helpful host. The apartment was very nice and made us feel at home instantly.

This apartment is very cozy and lovely!
And very close to supermarket(mini Presco) and subway station where it is easy to go to airport or city center)
José is very helpful to us so we felt comfort :)
Highly recommend!

Had a great stay here in Jose's apartment. Ideally situated along a great street with good restaurants and bars near by. Jose is a great host and his apt is decorated with some of his wonderful art work very cool spot - I'd highly recommend this apartment when in Porto

Die Gastfreundschaft von José & Elisabete hat meinen Aufenthalt in Porto zu einem ganz besonderen gemacht – zwei warmherzige und interessante Menschen, die dafür sorgen, dass man sich im Haus mit seiner geschmackvollen Einrichtung und der guten nachbarschaftlichen Atmosphäre sofort zuhause fühlt und sich ausgestattet mit den besten Tipps auf Erkundungstour durch die Stadt machen kann!
José nous a attendu notre arrivée malgré l'heure tardive de notre arrivée. José et sa compagnesont très sympathiques et chaleureux

This has been my best airbnb experience by far so far. I stayed three weeks because I used Porto to work on a project and José made me feel so welcome that I was really sad I had to leave again. I will definitely go back because Porto is a beautiful (underestimated) city - not to mention the coffee, the wine, the weather.  The apartment itself is tastefully furnished and decorated. The bed is really cosy and you even have your own balcony with afternoon sun. If you go to Porto (you should!) stay at José's place. You wont't regret it. If your are lucky he will take you out and show you some of Porto's nicest bars (which are just a 20 minute walk away from the apartment) or this table football place behind the steel door. Muitíssimo obrigado, José! Até a próxima!

숙소는 포르투 공항에서 메트로 E (Hidden by Airbnb) 을 타면 갈아타지 않고 도착할 수 있는 Heroismo역 바로 근처에 위치하고 있습니다. 메트로를 타기에 좋고, 근처에 기차역이 있어서(걸어서 300~400m 정도) 아베이루 등 근교 도시로 나갈 때도 편합니다. 숙소 바로 길 건너에 슈퍼(미니프레쏘)가 있어서 식료품과 필요한 물건들을 구입하기 편하고, 조금 걸어가면 Lidle이라는 대형마트도 있어요. 
도착하기 전까지 Jose와 메세지를 주고 받았는데, 피드백이 빨랐고, 필요한 사항을 자세히 안내해 주었습니다. 포르투에 오전에 도착하는 일정이었는데요, 처음에는 폐가 될까봐 시내 관광부터 하고 오후 늦게 체크인을 하려고 계획했는데, 고맙게도 Jose가 먼저 이른 체크인도 가능하고 아니라면 짐을 맡아 주겠다고 제안해주었습니다. (아마 전 날 숙박객이 없어서 이른 체크인이 가능했던 것 같아요) 떠나는 날도 오후 늦게 비행기를 타야 했는데, Jose가 배려해 주어서 낮 12시 쯤에 체크아웃을 할 수 있었어요.
참, 그리고 제가 영어를 그리 잘 하지는 못하는데, Jose가 알아 듣기 쉬운 영어를 구사해서 의사소통 하기에 불편함이 없었습니다. 
숙소는 사진에 나온 것과 같았구요. 오래 전에 지어진 집과 앤틱 가구와 빈티지 소품들, Jose의 작품들이 어우러져 아름다운 분위기였어요. 테라스가 있어서 아침에 바깥 풍경을 보며 커피를 마셨던 것도 좋았습니다. 부엌에는 필요한 조미료(소금,후추,올리브유 등) 들이 갖추어져 있어서 간단한 요리를 해 먹기에 좋았고, 세탁기가 있어서 빨래도 할 수 있었습니다.(세제는 개인 지참)
머무는 3박4일 동안 부족함 없이 편안히 지낼 수 있었고, 집주인이 같은 건물에 거주하고 있어서 필요한 게 있거나 궁금한게 있을 때면 언제든 물어볼 수 있어 좋았습니다. 포르투에 여행하러 가는 친구가 있다면 jose의 집을 추천해 주고 싶어요.

We had 3 nights with José in his lovely apartment. The ceilings are high and make the place feel spacious. There is plenty of room for two people and with separate lounge and bedroom plus a wonderful outdoor terrace we felt very lucky. There is also safe off street parking if you need it. We walked every where as the main part of Porto is about 15 minutes away. If you don't want to walk the metro is 100 meters up the street. A supermarket is across the street and a green grocer for fruit etc is nesrby as well. Everything you could want for a stay in Porto.

José's apartment was very clean, sunny, and well located. There's a supermarket across the street, and it's about a 15 minute walk to the city center. We parked our car in the space provided and used the metro station close by. Thank you José for making us feel welcome and for having us in your gorgeous home!

La experiencia ha sido inmejorable. La casa es incluso más bonita y acogedora que en las fotos. El barrio es cercano al centro y deja ver otra cara de Oporto. Además, para nosotros fue un punto a favor disponer de aparcamiento. En cuanto a José se ha mostrado atento y siempre dispuesto a ayudarnos durante nuestra estancia.
 ¡Sin duda repetiríamos!

José nous a très bien accueilli et nous nous sommes vite senties chez nous pour cette petite semaine à Porto.  L'appartement était chaleureux et il ne manquait de rien.  José avait même prévu des petites oranges ainsi qu'une bonne bouteille pour notre arrivée!  La ville de Porto est très mignonne et nous avons adoré notre séjour chez José, qui nous a même fait part de ses bonnes adresses pour une délicieuse francesinah!  Merci pour tout et à bientôt!

José a toujours répondu rapidement lors de nos échanges par courrier électronique. 
Une fois sur place, il nous a donné quelques pistes. 
L'appartement correspondait totalement aux photos.
Il est très confortable et lumineux.
Une bouteille de vin et des oranges nous attendaient.

Nous sommes arrivés en voiture, accès facile et parking dans cours privee très pratique. L'appartement est bien placé à 50 m de la station de métro Héroïsmo et une supérette justes en face. L'immeuble et l.appartement ont beaucoup de charme et sont bien rénovés, nous étions un couple avec deux petites de 6 et 4 ans et l.appart etait parfait. Pour finir accueil très sympathique de José , bref un très bon séjour.

We had an amazing stay at José's place. The apartment is very beautiful and you find everything you need. The bed is very comfy and you can sit outside on a large balcony. It's also great located, you can walk by foot to the Ribeira in about 15 minutes and the next Metro Station is only 3 minutes away. José was very friendly, the communication was perfect. We would come back anytime! Thanks for everything! :)
The stay in José's house was really nice. The flat is amazing and everything went smooth and uncomplicated.

On ne peut trouver de meilleurs hôtes, L’appartement est géniale.
N'hésitez pas.
Everything was just perfect! Definitely recommendable.

Wonderful stay in this beautifully airy and comfortable apartment - Felt like locals and wished we could have stayed longer. Really well placed for all the amenities; transport, sightseeing and bars/restaurants. José and Elisabete were welcoming hosts and we loved that we could seek advice about recommendations. Thank you José - we will definitely stay again. :)
Very warm and friendly. Accurate description. Convenient neighbourhood. Walking distance to the cathedral. Supermarket across the street. Restaurant on the corner.

Our stay in Porto was wonderful and staying in Jose's lovely apartment made it even better! The place is lovely and I would honestly live there if I could, super clean and cozy, beautifully decorated, high ceilings, great kitchen, wood floors and terrace to sit outside. Close to the metro to get into town and not too far to walk to many places either. Jose was so kind and gave us great advice on places to go for food and drinks and he recommended some places to drive within the nearby national park and even let us use his map. Staying here and exploring the area was the highlight of our trip! Jose - we can't thank you enough for making our time in Porto even better, wish we could have stayed longer!
Its an really nice apartement close to the subway and the old city centre.

The apartment is lovely, with wooden floors and high ceilings. With a terrace which has sun in the evenings.
The metro is close by, but walking to the city isn't a chore!
If you are with two or with five like us, it is a home away from home. And José is a wonderful host.

Jose was very friendly and gave us some great tips about things to do in Porto.  There was some of the local port to sample when we arrived. He lives in the flat downstairs and was happy for us to come and ask any questions or ask if we needed anything whenever. We popped down a couple of times to ask about a few things and he was very helpful.

The flat is really great with some lovely furniture and artwork, a great balcony and it was really clean and welcoming.  The neighbourhood is really nice. It's a little bit out of the centre which was great for us as it felt like real Porto rather than a tourist trap. There are some nice restaurants, a metro station, a mainline station, plenty of food shops and all the amenities you might need nearby.  The walk into town is about 10-15 minutes and takes you past lots of interesting places you might not find if you were right in the centre.  If we go back, which we hope to, we'd definitely consider this area and flat again.

The apartment was beautiful and Jose was a wonderful host. He greeted us and was very helpful with suggestions of local restaurants and sites. The location was nice giving us a flavor of local life but within a nice walk or metro ride to the city center. Thank you Jose for helping to make our first trip to Portugal so memorable.
The apartment is very nice and José is a very good host. He welcomed me very warmly and showed me around. He is a great host and I truly recommend his place!

We came the very first time to Porto and felt very much at home in José's apartment. It is just amazing! Wooden floors, heigh ceilings, a beautiful terrace we had breakfast on and great vintage furniture. José greeted us very friendly and helped us with informations about Porto, restaurants etc. Whenever we had a question we could juts go one flight of stairs down as he lives in the same building. There's a metro station nearby (Heroismo).

Great to have spend the first days of our vacation in Portugal here! A warm welcome by Jose late at night in a clean apartment with a lovely unique vibe.. plus with all the necessary facilities. Recommendable!  :)

Casa bellissima, accogliente e molto luminosa. Ci siamo sentiti a casa. Metropolitana a due passi, ristoranti e negozi sotto casa. La città di Porto ci è piaciuta molto e vivere in questa casa ha reso ancora più speciale l'esperienza. Josè è stato molto gentile e sempre disponibile.
Gezellig, proper en sfeervol appartement met uitstekende ligging om Porto te ontdekken. Warme verwelkoming.

Jose was a very kind and welcome person, even though Our flight was quite delayed he was still very nice. The neighborhood was very quiet but still very close to the old center of Porto, just a 15 minute walk. The cafe Jose recommended was very locally and cheap and had great coffee and sweets.

Jose was a very nice and accommodating host. He made us feel welcomed in Porto and gave us great advice on where to go and what to see. (The Portuguese chicken was great!!). The apartment is in a old part of the city, and had a lot of character to it. We particularly enjoyed the balcony overlooking the street. Great location that is close to everything by walk. We highly recommend staying at Jose's apartment!!
Lovely appartment in a beautiful building. José was very friendly and open. Highly recommended.

Amazing place! Amazing host!
Thank you jose for making our stay in porto comfortable and knowing the great hidden spots of the city! The apartment is cool and greatly decorated, easily fits 3. Great balcony in the sun for breakfast and/or afternoon wines!

We had an amazing week in José's appartment. They are a lovely couple and  they  gave  us precious advices  to visit Porto.
The flat is gorgeous and really quiet. 
I would recommand  José to everyone. 
Thank you for everything, José !

Experiencia muy buena. José fue siempre muy atento y preocupado para que nuestra estancia fuera perfecta. El piso tal y como se muestra en las fotos, la verdad que estuvimos muy a gusto. Totalmente recomendable!!

José nous a très bien accueilli !

Lorsque nous sommes arrivés José a pris le temps de nous expliquer la ville et les choses à visiter. José reste disponible car il habite au premier étage.

L'appartement est à 10 min à pieds de l'entrée du centre ville, à deux pas du métro, une place de parking est à disposition, un petit supermarché est devant la maison.

L'appartement est comme sur les photos, il est au deuxième étage d'une maison bourgeoise. L'escalier principal et l'appartement sont décorés par les tableaux peints par José.

Très bonne adresse, nous recommandons.

Piso cuidado al detalle y muy bien ubicado. Hemos pasado unos días como en nuestra casa gracias a la hospitalidad de José. El hecho de disponer de parquing y de la buena localización nos ha permitido conocer Porto sin preocuparnos del vehículo. Muy recomendable, volveremos a Porto a casa de Jose!

Estamos encantados con el trato recibido de José.
 Nos hemos sentido muy bien atendidos y hemos tenido la sensación  de estar invitados en casa de un amigo. José tiene una casa muy agradable y bonita. Nosotros somos una familia de cinco personas y hemos estado muy comodos.
Tiene un parquing privado muy comodo  para dejar el coche .
Oporto es una ciudad preciosa y nos hubiera gustado estar más tiempo.
Muchas gracias José por atendernos tan bien.
Jeronimo, Elena, Mateo, Julia y Kishan.
Nuestra experiencia fue excelente, de hecho mis hijas y nosotros estuvimos tan a gusto que consideramos que es una de las mejores casas donde hemos estado.

Superbe appartement,  décoré avec goût, dans un quartier animé et bien placé.  José est un hôte exceptionnel.  accueilli avec une bouteille de vino verde... que dire de plus We recommand ++++ et on reviendra!

El apartamento está idealmente ubicado, al lado del metro, a una distancia cómoda del centro andando, y en una calle viva y muy, muy auténtica, a la vez que segura (hay una comisaría de policía en la esquina). Todo lo que necesitas (comercio, restaurantes...) está muy cerca. El aparcamiento es comodísimo. 
El apartamento en sí está sencillamente amueblado con un estilo  muy personal, lo suficiente como para que no sea una habitación de hotel impersonal, pero no demasiado como para sentirte abrumado. Los suelos de madera, techos altos, y las vistas desde la terraza son una maravilla. 
La cocina tiene todos los electrodomésticos y está equipada con lo básico en cuanto a utensilios, suficiente para preparar un té, hacer una ensalada o freír una tortilla. 
Al resto de vecinos ni los vimos ni oímos: un paraíso de tranquilidad.
José nos dio todas las explicaciones y sugerencias necesarias para que disfrutáramos de nuestra visita y se mostró siempre amable y dispuesto a atender a nuestras necesidades (vive en el mismo edificio).

We really enjoyed our stay at this fantastic apartment .We got a good feel for old school Porto living and had a good time popping into the local supermarket, fruit market and coffee shop just out the door. The parking was great location was fab, and Jose went out of his way to make us feel welcome (providing a bottle of wine, helping with luggage) and helping us out by coming over to the metro station to explain the not so straight forward ticket purchasing  process. We would love to return given the opportunity.

Todo maravilloso!!! El piso espectacular, bien localizado y con parking privado
Una agradable estancia

Vielen Dank an José und Elisabete für diesen großartigen Aufenthalt in Porto! Die Wohnung ist toll eingerichtet und  geräumig, wir haben uns total wohlgefühlt. Das Auto konnten wir im Innenhof parken, in die Stadt kann man laufen (15-20 min) oder die nahegelegene Metro nehmen. Ein Supermarkt ist direkt gegenüber, Frühstückscafe ebenfalls. Und die beiden Gastgeber sind überaus offenherzige und interessante Menschen. Es hat einfach alles gepasst!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Joses great apartment. The place itself is a good size full of character and with a fantastic terrace! the neighbourhood was full of charm and it's only a quick 15 min walk to the centre or 5 min to the nearest metro. Jose was a brilliant host, him and his wife are such nice people! They gave us a great welcome and we're happy to share tips about local high lights. We loved Porto and Joses apartment !

Staying at José's place was a pleasure. José greeted us very welcoming and gave us tipps to explore the city. The spacious apartment is in a beautiful building, only 15-20 minutes walking distance to the city center. It was very clean and the kitchen is equipped with everything you need. There is even a private parking space. We really enjoyed our stay at José's apartment and would recommend it warmly.

José hat uns freundlich empfangen und gute Tipps über Porto gegeben. Die Schlüsselübergabe war reibungslos. Die Wohnung war sehr sauber und genau so toll, wie wir es aufgrund der Fotos erwartet haben. Eine Metrostation befindet sich in 2 Minuten Fußnähe. Ein Supermarkt ist direkt gegenüber der Wohnung, was sehr praktisch ist. Zu Fuß ist man in 15-20 Min. in der Altstadt. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Wohnung ist sehr schön eingerichtet und der Balkon sehr groß. Wir würden jederzeit wiederkommen.

Jose was both quick to respond and very kind and generous. He gave us some good advice about the neighbourhood and places to eat. The apartment itself is very cute, has tasteful design with a lovely personality and amazing high ceilings. Supermarket across the street is a big plus.

We had a great stay at José's place! The apartment was very cosy and José was very friendly. He assisted us with tips on the city and this in fluent English or French. We would really recommend this place!
Very nice appartment in an historical house. We had a wonderful time there. Thank you for everything :)

Die Unterkunft von José war genauso schön und gemütlich wie wir sie aufgrund der Bilder vermutet haben. Wir haben uns rund um wohl gefühlt, was nicht zuletzt an Josés willkommener und herzlicher Art gelegen hat.
Wer Lust hat Porto abseits des Trubels kennenzulernen ist hier genau richtig und trotzdem zentral. Ich kann die Unterkunft jedem weiter empfehlen und würde jederzeit wieder kommen.
Danke José!
Great place to stay at Porto. The flat was perfect for our family. Jose and is wife were very kind. The neighbourhood is quite, and not so far by feet from the center.

José nous a accueilli avec chaleur et gentillesse. Après la visite de l'appartement, très fonctionnel, conforme à la description et excellemment bien situé (près d'une station de métro, suffisamment à l'écart de l'hyper centre pour profiter du calme nocturne, mais pas trop pour pouvoir y aller à pied), notre hôte nous a donné des conseils judicieux pour visiter Porto (balades, points de vue, restaurants): ses indications nous ont permis de nous immerger dans la vraie vie de la ville avant de nous laisser happer par les sites plus "touristiques".
Une adresse parfaite pour visiter le Porto typique!

Ich habe 4 Nächte mit meiner besten Freundin bei jose und seiner Frau verbracht! Das Appartement war wunderschön! Viele tolle Bilder von jose gemalt und tolle Einrichtung. Dazu super sauber und ein fantastischer Blick. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und eine Menge sehr guter Tipps bekommen. Ich bin eine weitere Nacht allein geblieben, die Organisation war unkompliziert. Habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt mit jose und seiner Frau. Ein schönes Porto Erlebnis und ein guter Start ins 'weiterreisen'.

We rented José's appartement for 7 days. First of all we had a warm welcome from José and everything in the appartement was as described. For us the bonus was the free parking space since it could be nightmarish to find a parking spot in Porto. Good communication with the owner and always ready to help. We did have a problem with the WiFi on our last day, he sent us some help without avail and since José was out-of-town it could not be completely fixed. Everything was extremely clean and we liked the hard wood floor (Vs carpet). 

This appartement is off centre meaning that you need to take the subway (5 Min walk) or walk downtown (25 min). Note that it's close by (5 Min walk) the Campanhia train station (Direct train to Aveiro).

Notre séjour à Porto a été très réussi ! L'appartement correspond tout à fait à la description et José est très disponible que ce soit pour l'accueil ou pour des questions pratiques ou des conseils. L'appartement est très joli, la décoration est soignée,  le parquet magnifique et les tableaux de José sont un régal pour les yeux et une vrai découverte artistique.
Le lit est très confortable et des plaids sont à disposition dans le séjour, ce qui est sympa et pratique l'hiver car les appartements de Porto bénéficient rarement de chauffage central ;) Le radiateur bain d'huile et le plaid sont donc bien appréciables. La terrasse est très sympathique et spacieuse. 
Il y a un petit supermarché quasiment en face de l'appartement et c'est très pratique. Si la rue n'est pas la plus glamour de Porto, la station de métro est à  3 minutes à pied (station Héroïsmo) et le centre à 20 minutes à pied. Nous avons pu garer notre voiture dans la cour et c'est un sacré avantage dans Porto ! Nous reviendrons sans hésiter !

José put a bottle of wine in the fridge which was just what we craved for after our journey. His partner welcomed us warmly, even though it was quite late. The apartment and the whole house is absolutely beautiful, just like on the pictures. I would definately reccomend staying there when visiting Porto.

Jose was a great host, and the apartment was exactly as described, it is set in a nice neighbourhood in a lovely building. There is a private parking space behind a gate next to the building which was completely safe. Jose took time to recommend places to go nearby and things to do in Porto, he even helped us to plan the rest of our trip in Portugal which was very appreciated. The centre is about 20 minutes walking but very easy to navigate. I would highly recommend this apartment.

We really had a great stay at Jose´s place in Porto.

Unfortunately José wasn´t in town during our stay, but his friend gave us really warm welcome (and some great tips where we can find the best croissants and food in the neighborhood), so we felt comfortable since the first minute we arrived.

The whole building and the flat is really beautiful and an eyecatcher for everyone who´s interested in art, because José is a very talented painter and you can find his art all over in the house.

The underground station and a supermarket is super nearby. If you want to walk into the city you have to spend 15min -20min by foot.
I totally recommend this accommodation to everyone who´s planning to have a nice time at Porto surrounded by lovely natives!
Would definitely come back!

José and Elisabete's apartment in east Porto was just wonderful and perfect for our 2 days in Porto. We didn't get to meet José, but we were greeted by Elisabete, who was very lovely and friendly, and took the time to give us a run down of her favourite spots/sights/places to eat in Porto. All of her recommendations were spot on, including the best local place for pastries, local spots for dinner, best views along the Douro, ways to walk, etc. This was so appreciated and really shaped our visit! The apartment itself was great - quiet, spacious (perfect for couples), comfortable, with everything we needed. Lovely neighbourhood, away from the real touristy areas, but only a short wander into town. A truly wonderful stay and excellent hosts - we only wished we could have stayed longer! Thanks José and Elisabete :-)

José and his wife are the best hosts we could ever had. The apartment is even prettier than the photos show. Everything was clean and tidy, they were very nice and kind and the location of the apartment is good. I recommend it to everyone. We definitely go back as soon as we can. 

José y su mujer son los mejores anfitriones que pudimos tener. El apartamento es incluso más bonito que en las fotos. Todo estaba limpio y ordenado, ellos fueron simpáticos y muy amables y la situación del apartamento es buena. Lo recomiendo a todo el mundo. Definitivamente volveremos tan pronto como podamos.

Un accueil très chaleureux de José et de sa compagne. N'hésitez pas à lui demander des conseils pour vos visites et profiter de ses bonnes adresses ! L'appartement est vraiment comme sur les photos: grand, décoré avec goût,...  Il y a tout ce qu'il faut et est au calme tout en étant proche du centre de Porto. Une très bonne adresse où séjourner.

Wir waren drei Nächte in der schönen Wohnung von José. Sie ist sehr ruhig und mit dem Nötigsten ausgestattet. Beeindruckend sind die Malereien von José, die im ganzen Haus zu finden sind. Die Lage ist etwas abseits der Altstadt, die problemlos zu Fuß zu erreichen ist. Die Abbindungen mit Bus und Metro (zu Hbf und Flughafen) sind hervorragend. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten gibt es direkt gegenüber. 
Wir wurden sehr freundlich von Elisabete empfangen, die uns gute Tipps für unseren Aufenthalt gegeben hat. 
Insgesamt ist die Unterkunft sehr empfehlenswert. Wir würden selbst gern wieder kommen.
We had some great days in Porto!  The apartment is really nice, it is set in a nice neighbourhood in a lovely old building. The centre is in walking distance. I would highly recommend this apartment.
The appartement was lovely, with a great terrace, good place around, José and Elisabete are great hosts, they made us feel really compfortable.

Très bon séjour à Porto chez José. L'appartement est très bien (spacieux, nous étions 2, au 2e étage par un grand escalier central) et plutôt bien placé (20min à pied du centre ville environ) avec une cours pour garer la voiture.
Elisabete nous a bien accueilli (visite de l'appartement et quelques conseils sur les resto). Les échanges de messages via Airbnb est très pratique et José/Elisabete sont réactifs et arrangeants (horaires d'arrivée, etc...).

Jose and his wife are incredibly nice people. He welcomed us and gave us all the information about the apartment that we needed. he really took his time also show us some nice places to have food nearby and in the city. good tips, really local places and no tourist traps :) the apartment is very much like the pictures, although it was not clear to me that the balcony was no nice! I've spend my fear share of time  sitting there in the sunshine having a coffee.  Also we loved the little cafeterias nearby to have an early breakfast. coffee espresso and some pastries and croissant for like 3,50 euro :) We liked the neighborhood and the walk to the city was no problem for us!  also the train station is closeby so an easy trip to the beach to!
José es muy buen anfitrión, hubo un retraso en el bus de llegada y esperó muy amablemente. El departamento muy bonito, limpio y agradable, cerca de una estación del metro. Recomendable.

We had a wonderful stay at José and Elizabete's place!  We stayed in the apartment at the back of the house and the view was beautiful!  Our stay was during the full moon and summer solstice....magnificent moonrise while I was cooking dinner!  I communicated with José, but didn't not get to meet him.  Maybe next time? Elizabete was so sweet and helpful!!!  Obrigata!!!  Town was very easy to walk to, and there is a grocery store right across the street. We also had a car and parking was easy at the back of the apartment. Thanks again for a wonderful stay. I would absolutely stay there again.

José is een fantastische gastheer! Voorafgaand aan ons verblijf hebben wij diverse keren heen en weer gemaild en hij heeft mij een hele lijst aan tips gegeven waar wij veel aan hebben gehad. Als beste tip  het Sao Joao feest op 24 juni. Super leuk om bij te zijn. Het omboeken van de datum om bij het feest aanwezig te kunnen zijn was daarom ook geen probleem voor hen. Een fantastisch verblijf gehad in een heerlijk ruim appartement! Aanrader!
José place was the perfect spot to visit Porto. Awesome location and awesome appartement for a good price!

Tout correspondait à nos attentes et à ce qu'on avait vu sur les photos.
C'est Elisabete qui nous a accueilli avec une grande gentillesse et nous a donné beaucoup de conseils sur le quartier concernant les commodités (boulangerie, restaurant, métro, etc...).
Nous recommendons bien entendu cet appartement qui est à quelques stations de métro du centre ville.

Это было именно то, чего мы ожидали - уютная, отлично оформленная квартира в тихом районе в очень небольшом удалении от центра. Jose подсказал пару хороших недорогих ресторанчиков в пар-тройке минут ходьбы.

The apartment was beautiful and has everything you need to make you feel at home, including a terrace for a relaxed breakfast or dinner. It takes around 20-25 minutes to walk into the city or a taxi can take you there for around €5. The apartment is also very close (about 500m) to the train station Campanhã which will connect you to various other travel destinations! José was very generous with his time when we arrived and pointed out various restaurants and tourist attractions. He was very easy to contact and replied within an hour. We look forward to coming back next time :)

We had 3 wonderful days in Porto and Joses apartment. Everything was very nice. We felt welcome from the beginning and Jose was very helpfull and friendly. The atmosphere in both the apartment and the area is great. We have only good memories from our stay there :)

L'appartement de José est très agréable, confortable et la maison, très belle ! José est très attentif au bien être de ses hôtes. Il nous a gentillement conseillé des balades, des restos et des visites et nous a fait découvrir des coins sympas.  Nous avons pu garer notre voiture dans la cour à côté de la maison, c'était très pratique.  Bus et métro ( boulangerie et supérette )  sont juste à deux pas mais nous avons tout visité à pied. Le centre est à 15 mn de marche. Le quartier est très chouette. Merci encore pour cet accueil chaleureux et évidemment nous recommandons vivement l'appartement !

We really enjoyed our stay in Porto at José and Elisabete's apartment. They are really sweet people with big hearts and they made us feel right at home. The apartment is in a cool location, super close to the center but also close to cool local spots, also very close to Campanhã and the metro. I would definitely recommend this apartment :) thank you José and Elisabete!
Really lovely. Accueil charmant, José est un hôte vraiment avenant et sympathique. Adresse hautement recommandée.

Séjour court mais très agréable ! 
Nos enfants étaient ravis de logement et enchantés de l’accueil.
Merci José pour tout... un jours peut-être nous reviendrons.

Assolutamente perfetto!
Ho soggiornato con il mio ragazzo nell'appartamento di José.
L'accoglienza é stata fantastica e José si é preoccupato di mettersi in contatto con noi sin da prima del nostro arrivo.
Dell'appartamento non saprei da dove partire, se non dal fatto che é addirittura meglio di come appare in foto. Pulito,funzionale e arredato con stile e amore e pieno dei bellissimi quadri di José.
Anche la posizione é molto comoda, soprattutto se siete in macchina c'é la possibilità di parcheggiare internamente. Il centro é poi a circa 20 minuti a piedi, oppure a circa 100 metri c'é la fermata della metropolitana (che nei week end estivi funziona per tutta la notte!).
Consiglierei assolutamentem la casa di José a chi vuole soggiornare a Porto ma anche a chi vuole girare un po' il nord del Portogallo.
Grazie di tutto e alla prossima, speriamo!

Letizia e Mattia
Nous avons été très bien accueillis par José, dans son très joli appartement. Les restaurants qu'il nous a conseillés étaient très bons. Je recommande vivement!!

Wir hatten einen wunderschönen Aufenthalt in Porto, zu welchem diese Wohnung maßgeblich beigetragen hat! Sie hat die perfekte Größe für 2 Personen, ist sehr stilvoll eingerichtet, sauber und gut gelegen (15 min. bis in die Innenstadt, Bahnhof und Supermarkt in der Nähe). Außerdem hat sie einen großen Balkon. Wir haben uns rundum wohlgefühlt und konnten uns bei Fragen jederzeit an José oder seine Frau wenden. Die Wohnung ist somit sehr empfehlenswert!

Das Appartement war einfach klasse. 20 Minuten zu Fuß von der Altstadt entfernt und zum Strand benötigt man 40 Minuten mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln. Supermarkt, Bäckerei und kleine nette Lokale in direkter Nähe. 
Die Wohnung selbst total sauber, stilvoll eingerichtet und mit allen wichtigen Dingen, die man ebenso benötigt ausgestattet. Alles im allem - die Wohnung für einen Besuch in Porto.

To be honest we did not really enjoy this place. For us it missed some final touches. We think is should be refressed a little. Some better cleaning, re-do the paintwork, cleaning up the hallway, fix the waterboiler etc. It really has the vintage look and feel but when my towels also look vintage I dont like it so much.. Also we thought the location was not really nice. We knew we would have to walk 15 minutes but than youre only at the city center/shops. For the real nice locations in Porto you need to walk another 10/15 minutes (up and down the hill). Also the road in front the house was more noicy than we expecced with cars and busses driving by all day.
If youre not about the details, dont mind the location and dont mind walking a lot than this place might be great for you.

Bright and artistic house in Porto.
Jose was so friendly and explain many attractions in Porto. The location was near by centro. (around 20min by walk)
The parking place was also independently and nice to park. I recommend people who will visit porto by car.

everything just wonderful ! we stayed 4 nights and felt very comfortable in the flat, which is decorated just as we like it in a beautiful authentic Building.
Supermarket and very good pasteleria very Close, Center in Walking distance. José and his wife just wpnderful as well.
Would definitely go back !

The apartment is charming and tastefully decorated with beautiful artworks. The atmopshere is also very nice. Jose is a very kind and friendly host, easy to communicate with, responsive and willing to assist. He also gave us some tips about Porto and nearby areas - thanks so much! Check in and out were both smooth. 
The flat is not in the centre of the city -  it’s still easy to get to anywhere (nearly 15 min by walk, metro/train stations are also nearby), but be ready that it takes some time. Stay at the place was a nice experience, would definitely recommend!
欧洲去过的城市最喜欢波尔图了,房东家离地铁口很近,推荐的他家附近的餐厅让我们至今难忘,如果选择这家房子,请一定要去他推荐的餐厅NOVA ERA｡最最最喜欢的是他家阳台,配上红酒,水果,零食,仰望日出,日落以及满天繁星,真的愿意就这样发呆~

Nice apartment, convenient location. This building is gorgeous and I love the decor. The balcony is so fantastic. 3 minute walk to train. Very convenient. Neighbors in the building are extremely friendly. I felt very safe. José was extremely attentive to our needs and desires. He quickly replied to messages and answered all our questions. I would stay here again.

Wir haben zwei Nächte in dem Apartment geschlafen und haben den Aufenthalt da sehr genossen. Die Kommunikation im Vorfeld war sehr gut und schnell. José hat uns ganz herzlich begrüßt und sehr hilfreiche Tips für unseren Aufenthalt gegeben. Die Wohnung ist stilvoll eingerichtet und bietet alles was man benötigt. Zu Fuß brauch man 15 Minuten bis ins Zentrum und hat in der näheren Umgebung alles was man benötigt (Supermarkt, Bäckerei, Station der Metro etc.) Wir waren rundum mit allem zufrieden.
Der Kontakt über Mails war stets schnell hergestellt . Die beiden Gastgeber haben  sofort auf Fragen geantwortet. alles war sehr gut beschrieben und gut durchdacht vorbereitet.

Die Wohnung hat uns sehr gut gefallen! Sie ist stilvoll eingerichtet, war sehr sauber und hatte alles was man brauchte. Fußläufig zu erreichen waren Metro, Bus, Supermarkt und ein sehr leckerer Bäcker. Wir haben uns gut aufgehoben gefühlt, vielen Dank!
Nicest apartment we've been in the whole Portugal. Hosts are very friendly. Showed us the way around. Very close to downtown by walk and metro. They even bought a high chair for our baby to eat!

O José recebeu-nos com muita simpatia e o apartamento era exatamente o que estávamos à espera.
 Tivemos uma experiência muito agradável e espero voltar noutra altura .
 Elizabeth é uma pessoa encantadora com quem gostaria de manter contacto .

O apartamento é amplo e aconchegante, como nas fotos. O estacionamento privado ao lado da casa facilita bastante para quem estiver de carro, além da estação de metro ser bem perto ( 3 minutos a pé). O bairro é um pouco movimentado, mas silencioso, com mercado quase em frente ao prédio, A hospitalidade do José e de sua mulher fazem que você se sinta em casa!
Apartamento eh como nas fotos, antigo, bem cuidado ! Localização boa !
Un piso muy agradable, parking privado, 20 minutos caminando al centro.  Muy buena comunicación con el anfitrión

This is a lovely spot, very close to the Heroismo metro station which is only 2 from Porto's most central one, Bahao.

Jose was easily accessible before and during our stay and arranged for a neighbour to be present at check in.

A really nice little apartment which was perfect for our 3 days in Porto

We really enjoyed the stay in the apartment. Thank you José!
It was well furnished, we had everything we needed and felt safe and comfortable. 
In the evening we enjoyed sitting on the balcony, eating fresh strawberries and Natas we got around the corner. 
It took around 15 minutes to walk to the centre of Porto (e.g. São Bento). There is also a metro station and bus stop nearby as well as possibilities to go shopping ( e.g. Lidl - walking distance 10 minutes) and go out to eat. 
We got to Porto by car. There wasn't a problem to find the apartment and the parking space was on a private gateway (very safe). 
José gave us many advices and was very friendly. We could always contact him.
All in all, we had a great time in Porto - also due to this apartment - and we would always recommend it and would always come back.

Meine Freundin und ich verbrachten wirklich sehr schöne 10 Tage in Porto. Auch wenn viele , selbst Portuenser, es erstaunlich fanden, dass man 10 Tage in der Stadt verbringt – es war toll. Die Stadt hat so viele Gesichter und Angebote, die jedoch erkundet werden wollen. Deshalb waren wir auch sehr viel zu Fuß unterwegs.

José war uns ein sehr warmherziger und sehr zuvorkommender Gastgeber, der unseren Aufenthalt unvergesslich machte. Seine beeindruckenden Portraits, die im ganzen Haus und im Apartment verteilt sind, verleihen dem Ganzen einen sehr individuellen Charakter. José war immer für uns da wenn wir Fragen oder Hilfe brauchten und hat uns gute Tipps gegeben, wo und wie wir "sein Porto" kennenlernen können. Die Unterkunft in dem wunderschönen Jugendstil Haus ist sehr schön, sauber und geschmackvoll eingerichtet mit allem was man braucht. Und sollte mal was fehlen, war José stets sehr hilfsbereit.

Gegenüber gibt es einen kleinen Supermarkt, ein kleines Café und die nächste Metrostation Heroìsmo nur 1 Minute Fußweg entfernt.
Had a wonderful time in Porto! Would definitely come back! Also got the added bonus of seeing some of José beautiful art.

Jose is an amazing host. He was very helpul, explained everything about the city. Communication was great. His apartment is very comfortable and has all the equipment you will need. Loction is olso perfect.
Thank you Jose
Wonderful apartment - beautifully decorated with lots of space. Great location - just a few minutes walk into the centre. Check-in was super easy with lovely hosts! A true gem in Porto!!

Logement très bien situé un peu en dehors du centre historique et de sa foule. Un peu bruyant quand même mais bon ... C'est Porto ! José nous a très bien accueilli et quel plaisir de siroter un porto frais sur la terrasse en fin de journée
Le logement est très bien, nous y avons séjourné durant 4 jours - il y a une belle hauteur sous plafond et la taille de la terrasse est conséquente :)

Très bel appartement lumineux et bien situé près du centre ville par le métro
José et Elisabeth sont à l écoute et très sympathiques et parlent très bien le Francais.
Nous avons passé un excellent séjour à Porto qui est une très jolie ville
The apartment and house are very comfortable and nicely designed. José was a great host, involved and helpful when needed. Highly recommended.

Goede en snelle communicatie voor aankomst en tijdens verblijf. Eigen parkeerplek, veilig achter een hek. Groot appartement met alles aanwezig wat er nodig is. Afstand naar het centrum is prima, net buiten de drukte. Een aantal goede (en goedkope) ontbijttentjes en restaurants in de buurt, waar we op aanbeveling van José hebben gegeten! 
Wij waren er met een temperatuur van 35-40 graden waardoor het moeilijk koel te houden was binnen, met name in de nacht. Maar, daar tegenover staat dat je wel heerlijk (zeker in het avondzonnetje) op het grote balkon kan zitten! Kortom; prima plek om te verblijven bij een bezoek aan Porto, zeker als je met de auto komt!
Magnifique appartement, très  bien situé, José est fantastic et très aidant. Merci José pour votre accueil .

José possède un très charmant bloc appartement qui nous a permis de profiter de Porto à merveille. 

Il nous offert un accueille chaleureux en nous conseillant parfaitement sur les alentours et les activités. 

Ses appartements sont très propres et confortables. 

*Nous avons trouvé que son vaste espace de stationnement était un must pour nous qui arrivions en voiture.
Très bon accueil, chaleureux, appartement très agréable.
Very nice and clean apartment with a very good connection to public transport. Jose was also super friendly and always quick o respond and help.

José est très disponible, réactif et accueillant ! L'appartement a beaucoup de charme, nous avons aimé la décoration stylé et la petite terrasse est très appréciable le soir après une journée de visite. Literie confortable, pas de tv mais cela ne nous a pas gêné. La place dans le parking privée est un atout non négligeable pour Porto !! Un peu plus de vaisselle pourrait être utile (une poêle et quelques verres à vin ...). C'est un détail, sinon nous recommandons vivement !

José's apartment is really amazing! The bed is comfortable, the terrace super nice and the kitchen well equipped. 
Position was also perfect: there are bars, supermarkets, restaurants and everything you may need in the surroundings. The metro station Heroísmo is two steps from the apartment, but the city center is also reachable with a pleasant walk.
We arrived with a car that we could park in the private parking of the house (priceless!). Elisabete welcomed us very kindly and gave us a lot of info and suggestions about the city. 
I hope to have the opportunity to stay again in José's apartment! 
Ten stars!!
Très bel appartement à proximité du métro. Super accueil des propriétaires. Recommande les yeux fermés
José es artista, y la casa está llena de sus preciosas obras.

Appartement plein de charme, au dernier étage d'une maison traditionnelle. Quartier calme avec des petits commerces authentiques, à 10-15min à pied du centre touristique.
José et Elisabete sont des hôtes attentionnés et accessibles, les suggestions de restaurants d'Elisabete nous ont été très utiles !

Appartement très bien situé , à quelques pas du centre ville, s'il l'on aime bien marcher, sinon on peut prendre les transports en communs mais le métro n'est pas très pratique à Porto. 
Il y a des restos très conviviaux à promiscuité. 
L"appartement est dans un magnifique immeuble et il est parfait pour un couple , si vous avez un enfant, il peut dormir dans le salon ou sur une mezzanine mais cela entraîne davantage de promiscuité. 
La maison est très bien équipée et très joliment décorée.
Et José est juste ... hyper accueillant et donne de très bons conseils.

Super séjour dans l appartement de José. Il a toujours répondu à nos questions avant notre venue ét a su, lors de notre arrivée nous conseiller sur des points d'intérêts un peu à l'écart des touristes.
L'appartement est conforme aux photos et bien assez grand.
Je le conseille vivement.

Très bon séjour dans cet appartement! Agréable, simple, très joliment décoré et propre. José s'est montré très accueillant et nous a donné de nombreuses et précieuses informations, avec de bonnes adresses de restaurants. Il s'est montré disponible et sympathique tout au long du séjour. Merci!

José nous a reçu de la meilleure des façons. 
L appartement est tel que décrit voire plus joli en réalité. 
Le parking est idéal pour ceux qui voyagent en voiture. 
José prend le temps de vous conseiller sur les sites à visiter, restaurants et bars sympas... bref séjour ++ Merci!

Appartement très agréable et bien placé, où l'on peut laisser la voiture.
José est accueillant et de bon conseil pour entamer au mieux le séjour à Porto en famille.
A recommander!
José's place was amazing, José was amazing....highly recommend to anyone!
Logement agréable, tranquille situé, avec du charme. Tenu par de hôtes très accueillants.

Super stilvoll eingerichtete Wohnung mit Allem, was das Herz begehrt! Besonders genossen haben wir den Balkon, von dem man aus abends wunderbar den Sonnenuntergang bei einem Glas Portwein genießen kann. José ist ein sehr aufmerksamer und freundlicher Gastgeber, der uns gerne etwas über seine Stadt erzählt hat! Sehr weiterzuempfehlen!
José et Elisabeth sont de parfaits hôtes accueillants et disponibles! L'appartement est spacieux et la terrasse idéale pour profiter du soleil de Porto!

Onze eerste Airbnb ervaring, en wat een feest was dat! 
Erg leuk en sfeervol authentiek appartementje op prima loopafstand van het centrum. José is een erg vriendelijke man en een bevlogen kunstenaar, hij is aanwezig zonder op de voorgrond te treden maar voor vragen of suggesties staat hij voor je klaar! Kortom een heerlijke week gehad!

Nous sommes restés 5 nuits et avons passé un agréable séjour. Élisabeth nous a très bien accueillis et tous ses renseignements en Français nous ont beaucoup aidés. Le logement était conforme à la description très propre et un parking privé à disposition.  Une précision toutefois,  le logement est au second et ne convient pas aux personnes présentant un handicap. Le quartier est calme et vous avez petit supermarché, boulangerie et restaurants. Le métro est à 5' environ et le centre à une vingtaine de minutes à pied. Encore merci Élisabeth et regret de ne pas avoir rencontré José

Uns hat die Wohnung sehr gut gefallen, sodass wir uns den vorherigen Kommentaren nur anschließen können: Saubere Wohnung, schöner Balkon, privates Parken im Hinterhof (falls man mit dem Auto unterwegs ist) und direkt nebenan ein Supermarkt. Bus und Metro haben wir nicht genutzt, da wir immer zu Fuß in die Stadt gelaufen sind. Wir waren mit allem sehr zufrieden!
Fantastic Place! Great hosts
Gute Lage netter Gastgeber.wir hatten alles was wir bräuchten. Privater Parkplatz und Balkon rundeten unseren angenehmen Aufenthat ab.

José was incredibly hospitable and made some great recommendations on where to go to eat, shop etc. The apartment was great - roomy, clean and well decorated. The location was perfect as it was central to everywhere we wanted to go during our stay. Thanks José for everything!
Appartement très agréable dans un quartier authentique, situation idéale pour découvrir Porto. José est très accueillant, disponible et de très bons conseils !

Nice apartment with all amenities.  Opportunity to borrow bikes available made for a great day biking towards Espinho.  In-room washing machine proved very handy.  A very short walk to the metro (access to airport, and many other locations) and train station (access to Braga), or about 15 minute walk towards the tourist area in Porto.
Bien situé à 30 minutes à pied du bord de l'eau. Pâtisserie et épicerie à 2 pas. José très gentil et répond à toutes vos questions. Je recommande !

This apartment is as stylish as it looks! José was easy to communicate with before and during our stay, he was friendly and gave good tips for Porto. The apartment is convenient via the metro and nearby mainline station (to get to the gorgeous southern beaches, or to link into a tour of Portugal) but it's an short walk to the centre for the tourist stuff. 
Apartment itself was clean and has all the usual amenities but also a washing machine and balcony. 

I would recommend José's place to you and would stay again.

Emplacement idéal pour ceux qui veulent être dans un quartier typiquement Portugais. Tout ce fait à pied, sinon le métro est à 2 mn. Le stationnement est un + si vous avez une voiture.
Bel accueil. José prends le temps de vous donner des informations et des indications sur Porto, ce qui est vraiment apprécié!

Great location - just outside of the touristy area so you get a more of a "local" experience.   Don't let the outside of the building throw you off.  Inside it's very nice and clean.   The on site parking behind a locked gate is comforting.     There is a nice grocery store across the road.  Jose's english is very good and his suggestions were most helpful.  He has two bikes that you can borrow which provided a great alternative to walking or driving (once you're at the level of the river :)  We made it out to the cruise ship terminal and across the bridge to Gaia - where the Port cellars are - for a nice day trip which included several stops along the river.
Beautiful apartment, gloriously comfortable bed, a good bus and the metro both a couple of minutes from the door. I spent five nights here and couldn't have been happier.

El apartamento nos ha permitido descubrir un barrio de Oporto que no conocíamos, lleno de tiendas de antigüedades y bastante cerca del centro de la ciudad.
La calle es muy tranquila y silenciosa por la noche, lo que permite un sueño perfecto.
La facilidad del aparcamiento en la propia casa es una solución ideal para olvidar el coche.
Muy recomendable.

Muy lindo departamento, cómodo, amplio y con mucho espacio. Silencioso y perfecto para descansar y trabajar desde casa.
Jode muy atento con todo

Possibilité d’aller au centre-ville à pieds. Petites supérettes en face de l’apparmement. Deux petits restaurants dans la rue. 
Points négatifs: 1/ pas d’ascenseur. Deux grands étages (à l’ancienne). En gros l’équivalent de 3 étages. 
2/ l’hiver l’appartement est très, très, froid la journée. Petit chauffage le soir. 
3/ pas de télévision ou éventuellement une radio.
Idealne miejsce do przemieszaczania się w pobliżu centrum
Un trato muy bueno y bastante atento. El apartamento se encuentra a 15 min del centro, con lo que se hace ideal para visitar Oporto andando, sin necesidad de mover el coche.

Super lovely, stylish place right next to a metro station, but the distance to the city center is easily walkable (we did that each day). Jose was very kind and helpful and also offered some tips on where to eat and what to check out. The chance to park the car was also great!
Lekker op loop afstand van het centrum en dicht bij de metro.

We spent a very good time in José’s apartment. The house was super clean and comfortable, with everything you need. There is a supermarket crossing the street and the metro is very near. 
The downtown is 15-20 minutes by foot and it is easy to get everywhere. 
José was very nice and gave us some useful information. 
Also, there is a very good restaurant called Brasão to a ten-minutes walk and we highly recommend it. It is very crowded, so you better book in advance. 
The parking was very convenient for us. 
We recommend this place. Thanks, José!

This was perfectly located for us - a ten minute walk to where we caught the yellow bus. It is an older spacious place with high ceilings and a great deck. There are many mercantile, bakeries, etc in the immediate vicinity. We arrived a little late, but Jose was very helpful, having the gate open for parking when we arrived. He is a genuinely nice host, giving us lots of tips on the best bakeries, some restaurants. He is a talented fine artist too, as you will see if you stay here.

The apartment is comfortable and stylish in a beautiful old Victorian mansion.
I loved the balcony. The neighbourhood is still
Authentic Portuguese with lots of restaurants, stores and services.  Jose was always there to answer questions, check in and check out. We definitely recommend it!

캄파냐 기차역에서 가까워서 리스본에서 또는 리스본으로 기차를 이용해 이동하기 편리하다. 헤로이스모 지하철역 바로 옆이고 걸어서도 20~25분 정도면 포르토 중심가에 갈 수 있기 때문에 교통이 매우 편리하다.

호스트가 아래층에 살고있어서 체크인-아웃 시간을 유연하게 조절할 수 있고, 호스트가 감각적으로 꾸며놓은 집은 단정하고 아름답다. 테라스에서 멋진 석양을 보며 와인을 즐길수도 있다! 호스트가 알려주는 주변의 식료품점과 식당 역시 모두 친절하고 훌륭한 점도 빼놓을 수 없다.

언젠가 포르투를 다시 방문한다면 꼭 이 집을 다시 찾고 싶다!

Appartement charmant à 15 min à pieds du centre de Porto. 
Confortable lit deux places.
Adorable accueil parJosé qui nous a donné de précieux conseils pour visiter Porto et sa région. A recommander !

We enjoyed very much our stay in Jose’s appartment with its cozy environment at the good location. Jose is an intelligent host, provided us with very useful tips for 2 days stay. Communication was very easy and responsive. Convenient private parking. Check in and out - smooth and easy.  I would recommend to my friends. Thank you Jose.

Lovely appartement with nice terrace overlooking the rooftops and street. We really enjoyed our stay.
José is a very nice host. He gave us great diningtips in the area.
Jose's apartment is lovely and spacious and I would definitely recommend staying here. Elsbieta met us and she was really nice and friendly. We had a great stay.

Jose was a great host. He was there to welcome us when we arrived, and was available to answer any questions that we had, and quick to respond. The space is beautiful, with a great outside balcony, that was the perfect touch. We were looking for a space that was not centrally located in the city, but still walkable and this apartment was perfect for that. We had a car but still mostly walked around Porto, and had dinner at some of the great local restaurants that Jose recommended. Would highly recommend. Thanks again!
We spent two nights in Jose’s place when visiting Porto. The private parking was very convenient. Lots of space, amazing terrace. Very close to the Metro, easy to get to the city center!

My wife and I would not hesitate recomending Josés appartment to anyone who needs lodging in Porto. The appartment is spaceious and the terrase is nice the warm hours of the day. Metro is quite nearby. Though we prefered to walk into the centre of Porto - a distance easy to overcome. Arriving in car it is a big advantage that you can park it on private grounds behind a fence nearby the house. José and his wife are very helpful and lovely people and their appartment feels very much like home.

This is a terrific place to stay, in a lively area of Porto. IF you want to eat or drink without going into the city centre there are plenty of places within a moment's walk, yet it's only a 15-minute walk to the city centre (unless you keep stopping, like we did, to look at all the interesting stuff on the way!).

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour chez José qui nous a très gentiment accueillis, nous avons apprécié l ambiance recherchée  de la maison  et le style artistique,.nous le  remercions bien aussi pour ses conseils avisés.

Jose we an amazing host, he went above and beyond our expectations and provided us with amazing suggestions that made our stay in Porto memorable. I will without a doubt be recommending his place to my friends and family (clean, Jose is a great host, spacious and all of our expectations were met).
Un apartamento muy limpio y con mucho encanto. Unos anfitriones fantásticos.

Nous avons eu un excellent accueil de la part de José, il nous a conseillé cafés, restaurants et activités selon nos goûts. Le stationnement est effectivement un plus! Le petit café voisin recommandé par José était excellent!

The apartment was just perfect, big and well equipped and with a very beautiful interior and a nice big balcony to enjoy the evenings if you are not going out eating   in one of the many recommended places by José. The apartment is about 20 minutes walking distance to the center but there is also a metro close by if you are too lazy to walk. The neighborhood itself is lively and  has many attractions  like a beautiful cemetery, nice restaurants, cafes and bakeries. There is a free private parking in the backyard. José is a Perfect Host, very warm, friendly and helpful. He recommended many places you don’t find in average guidebooks and he had a profound knowledge of the city and places to go for every taste. We would definitely come back next time we are in Porto.

We Really enjoyed our Stay at jos'es Place. Especially the terracce was Great To enjoy the Sunset above Porto. The Communication was always fast and super nice. We would come back! Think you for the good Tips!

We truly enjoyed our stay at this gem of an apartment. Location is perfect if you're looking to get some space from the tourist crowds. Easy to find and parking is a bonus! The apartment is very charming, clean, spacious and stylish. Jose was very kind, accommodating and gave us some great local pointers! Wish we could have stayed longer.
Jose is great and very helpful

Beautiful apartment not far from the centre of Porto with a save parking lot and all around what we needed like restaurants and shops. José, the host, was really nice and helpful during our stay :) Highly recommended!

Nous avons bien aimé notre séjour chez José. Très bon emplacement à environ 15 minutes de marche du centre historique. Épicerie à une minute de marche. José parle très bien français, ce que nous avons beaucoup apprécié.
Wir haben uns sehr wohlgefühlt und würden jederzeit gerne wiederkommen.

Pasamos unos días muy agradables en nuestra estancia en Porto en la casa de José. Lo cierto es que no paramos mucho en casa pero por su situación es un lugar ideal para visitar la ciudad ya en 10-15 minutos andando estás en el centro. Y tiene todo lo necesario en su casa para tener una estancia agradable. Y el parking privado es un punto a favor muy a tener en cuenta. Recomendable

name: Appartement tout équipé dans le plateau
summary: Bonjour a tous , Nous vous proposons un appartement de charme composé de trois chambres, situé dans le plateau de Montréal avec commerces parcs et transports à deux pas !  L'appartement se compose de trois chambres et est tout équipé !
space: L’appartement dont les fenêtres viennent d’être changé pour du double vitrage se compose d’une grande chambre double dont une partie de la chambre a été aménagé en salle vidéo, une autre chambre de taille moyenne et une dernière petite chambre . Elles sont toute équipe de lit double, bureau, rangement etc. La cuisine est toute équipée, frigo/congélateur , plaque de cuisson , four , grille pain, machine à café , micro onde ,friteuse, rangements et bien sûr tous les ustensiles de cuisine pour préparer de bons petits plats!  La salle de bain dispose de rangements , toilettes , baignoire, sèche cheveux. Une salle à manger avec table et chaise, fauteuils. Et en bonus un petit salon/coin lecture lumineux et fait main :)
description: Bonjour a tous , Nous vous proposons un appartement de charme composé de trois chambres, situé dans le plateau de Montréal avec commerces parcs et transports à deux pas !  L'appartement se compose de trois chambres et est tout équipé ! L’appartement dont les fenêtres viennent d’être changé pour du double vitrage se compose d’une grande chambre double dont une partie de la chambre a été aménagé en salle vidéo, une autre chambre de taille moyenne et une dernière petite chambre . Elles sont toute équipe de lit double, bureau, rangement etc. La cuisine est toute équipée, frigo/congélateur , plaque de cuisson , four , grille pain, machine à café , micro onde ,friteuse, rangements et bien sûr tous les ustensiles de cuisine pour préparer de bons petits plats!  La salle de bain dispose de rangements , toilettes , baignoire, sèche cheveux. Une salle à manger avec table et chaise, fauteuils. Et en bonus un petit salon/coin lecture lumineux et fait main :) vous aurez accès a tous le logement Situ
neighborhood_overview: Situé dans le plateau ,au cœur de Montréal,le parc Jeanne Mance et Mont Royal à moins de 5 minutes à pied ,le bus 55 vers le centre ville(5-10 min de bus ) en face  , épiceries,supermarché et restaurants avec la rue très animée saint Laurent à deux pas c’est le pied à terre idéal pour une famille ou un groupe d’amis !
transit: Le bus 55 est au coin de la rue vers le centre ville et le metro mont royal à 10 min à pied.
access: vous aurez accès a tous le logement

name: Price cheap Economy Studio in Tsim Sha Tsui MTR
summary: Affordable Experience in Heart area of Hong Kong CBD Tsim Sha Tsui The hostel is located at Heart areas of Tsim Sha Tsui with 1 minutes walk from Tsim Sha Tsui MTR Exit D1, you can go to major CBDs and shopping Districts (Central, Exhibition Centre, Mong Kok, Harbour City, Causeway Bay, Ocean Park in 15 minutes!) You can find everything in room and all facilites are unique for you only, not shared. WiFi serviced will be provided. You can enjoy different experiences and cultures on Hong Kong
space: The Studio is located at the heart area of Tsim sha Tsui, upstair of Tsim Sha Tsui MTR. reviews.comments: 可能外国人和中国的住宿习惯有一些差异吧,我本次的体验打算写给中国订民宿的朋友看:1.房子位置在上环地铁站,方便好找｡2.房子内部有沙发有小吧台,都超级干净和整齐｡3.卫生间很小,锁不住门,洗澡时开了热水器但热水开关好像坏了转不动｡女孩子洗澡没锁门真的非常尴尬了!4.睡觉的房间很小,有一张床和一个柜子,剩下的就是两条小小的过道,两个人出入时需要互相让一下｡5.床单被罩非常干净,床垫很舒服,床也很大,我是睡得很好｡6.说下我和房东的沟通,可能我英文不是很好,我去时房东不在,他室友接待的,人很好,热情的小男孩,对我们也很信任｡7.住的房间门锁下方写着:不要锁门,家里没有钥匙｡ 难道不是应该写:睡觉时可以锁好门,家里没有开房间的钥匙吗哈哈哈

house_rules: Occupancy: Only the persons declared at the check-in and properly documented can stay in the apartment, according to current legislation. Pets: Pets are only allowed if you have been specifically granted permission beforehand when confirming the reservation. Noise regulations: The Barcelona City Council is very strict with compliance with noise regulations and respect for other residents. Rest hours are between 22:00 and 10:00. Loud music and parties in the apartments are strictly forbidden in order not to disturb the neighbors. In case of a neighbor complaint, it will be registered by the police and you will be immediately required to leave the apartment. If you suffer from your neighbor's noise between 22:00 and 10:00 please call inmediatelly our Technical support. Check in time: Check-in time at the apartments is from 15:00. host.host_about:
English: 
We are a young, enthusiastic and happy team! 
We are passionate about Barcelona: its people, food, shops, museums, buildings, beaches, markets, shows... We want you to come to Barcelona and enjoy your experience to the fullest. Therefore, we will be happy to guide you, recommend you our favorite spots and help you in whatever you need.  We're waiting for you :)!

Español: 
¡Somos un equipo joven, entusiasta y feliz! 
Barcelona nos apasiona: su gente, gastronomía, tiendas, museos, edificios, playas, mercados, espectáculos... Queremos que vengas a Barcelona y disfrutes tu experiencia al máximo. Por ello, estaremos encantados de orientarte, recomendarte nuestros rincones favoritos y ayudarte en lo que necesites. ¡Te estamos esperando:)!

name: 靠近旺角地鐵站E1出口-獨立房間, 可供1到4人入住
summary: ★獨立房間(可供1到4人入住)- 所在大廈位於旺角繁華市中心 彌敦道上,距離旺角地鐵站E1出口步行約3分鐘左右,交通便利,樓下也有機場巴士可直達香港機場｡ ★臨近多座大型購物熱點,如朗豪坊購物中心,旺角中心,新之城,女人街,潮流特區及各大金飾店｡對面街便是旺角電器街(西洋菜街)及香港聞名的旺區女人街(通菜街)､波鞋街(洗衣街)等｡ ★床型:1張大床(1米2寬*1米85長)和(一張1米1寬*1米85長的床)~房間不可加床,可提供1~4人入住 ★房間設施齊全——空調､電視､無線上網､獨立衛浴,並提供一次性洗漱用品｡24小時保安監視鏡頭及冷熱水全天侯供應,為賓客提供安全,衛生,實惠及舒適的環境｡自助入住退房, 方便快捷｡ ★住滿3天以上的客人, (在第4天), 可有一次免費打掃房間的服務, (由於房間眾多, 需要提前安排員工, 需要客人提前一天通知我們, 否則我們不會進入房間打掃, 但每天會幫忙清理垃圾), 另提供打掃服務, 每次收費為港幣50元.
space: ★入住時間為下午15:00,退房時間為次日中午12點前(我們需要在您退房之後打掃房間,以便將房間整潔的準備給下一位需要入住的客人)｡ ★抵達當天和出發日期有免費行李寄存｡  請注意:我們的房間一旦預訂只能根據取消政策進行 ★房間照片全部為實景拍攝,但也僅作為參考｡因為我們每個房型房量都不止一間,您實際入住的房間朝向,設計,面積不一定和照片的一樣｡您最終房號會按當天的房間供應作安排,不能挑選特定房號｡如預訂2間或以上房間,我們會儘量安排在靠近的房間,但由於實際房間供應､房型不同等等問題存在,我們不能保證一定是相鄰的房間｡未免引起您入住的不滿,預訂前請三思考慮｡
