host.host_about:
Born and raised in Montreal, father of 2 with no car, I'm an autodidact that like to understand and build stuff, from a puzzle to a house. 
I love coffee, good wine, Alley hockey with a  bunch of kids, going to the park on a sunny day, online businesses and spending hours at Home Depot.

Je suis né et j'ai grandi à Montréal, j'ai deux enfants mais pas de voiture. Je suis un autodidacte qui adore comprendre le fonctionnement des choses. J'aime construire et avoir des projets en cours, du simple casse-tête à une rénovation majeure de maison. J'aime le café, le bon vin, jouer au hockey dans la ruelle avec les voisins, l'entrepreneuriat et les commerces en ligne et je peux passer des heures à scruter les nouveaux produits dans des allées obscures du Home Dépôt.

host.host_about:
Greetings from Team Vacasa Vacation Rentals of Hawaii, LLC! Yes, we're a professional property management company—but we're also real people, trusted by the owners of vacation homes to take care of all the heavy lifting like housekeeping, reservations, maintenance, and guest care. (Because, to be honest, renting out a vacation home really can be a full-time job!)


We have local teams on the ground to take care of our homes and our guests. We like to think of it as the best of both worlds: you can enjoy a one-of-a-kind vacation experience in a unique property, only without compromising on service and convenience. You can trust that your home will be cleaned by professional housekeepers, and your calls will be answered (right away, around the clock!) by our dedicated Guest Services team. 


Check out our listings, and if you have any questions, get in touch! We'd love to help you plan your perfect getaway.

name: Brand new - hotel style - walk to Central
summary: Brand new apartment and building, walking distance to trains and buses. 150m from restaurants, cafes and bars.  At the footsteps of one of the best hikes in Hong Kong. 5 mins walk to Sai Ying Pun MTR, 15 mins walk to Mid-levels/Central area. Building has great communal facilities such as a Gym, Study/Work area, indoor and outdoor dining. Two balconies with island views. Walking distance to dozens of local and western eateries and bars. Helpful English and Cantonese speaking staff working 24hrs.
space: Guests have access to 24hrs brand new Gym facilities and helpful staff/security. Common areas include indoor and outdoor dining areas, designated 25th floor workspace with fantastic views of the harbour and coffee machine. High speed Wifi is available in all communal areas and the apartment itself. The apartment has a Queen size bed with the option of a sofa bed, ample storage space, large TV with many entertainment options (Netflix, Sport, Subscription TV). Kitchen complete with stove, oven, steamer, washing/drying machine, ironing board, fridge and Freezer. Airconditioner in both the living room and bedroom. Bathroom complete with shower, toilet and sink.

neighborhood_overview: Awesome location on Hong Kong island. The Sai Ying Pun area is a very trendy and upcoming neighbourhood. The building is 60seconds walk away from High Street with an array of bars, restaurants and cafes can be found. Restaurants are open late, with many wine bars available. From the apartment it is a 45 min hike to the top of the iconic Hong Kong Peak with many back country trails just a few minutes away. Grocery stores and local style markets are minutes away should you want to eat In. Local food options are endless and are great to visit.
transit: Getting around is very easy, with cheap taxis often driving past the apartment entrance. Train is 5 mins walk from the building, tram also 5 mins away. Public transport readily available and we recommend you download HK Citymapper for the area.
access: Guests are able to use all communal areas within open hours. Gym 24hrs, workspace and outdoor areas open 8am- 10pm.

reviews.comments:
My friend and I stayed for 5 nights with Tanielle and I have to say we were both VERY happy with the apartment. The check-in was a breeze despite checking in at 3am. On top of that, Tanielle left us some surprises on our arrival and that was a pretty nice touch of hospitality there. Much appreciated Taneille!! 

Location wise, the apartment is perfect. Nicely tucked away in a quiet neighbourhood, yet just a stop or two away from the central buzz and party scene. If you're into nature, there's a Victoria's peak just nearby. However though, I think there are better hikes elsewhere and Tanielle will easily recommend some :) 

There's 7/11, an international market and several local small eateries nearby (if you need something more international, there're Macdonalds and Starbucks). 

The apartment was clean and comfortable. There's basically anything you need in a home and everything was working well - from TV, washing machine, detergent, hot water, air conditioning, iron, kettle, stove etc. And of course we love the (Hidden by Airbnb) Home. Try saying bye to (Hidden by Airbnb) when you leave to get a cute response. 

Will definitely recommend anyone to stay here! I think it'll be comfortable with 3, but if you don't mind a little squeeze, 4 or 5 might be ok. Thanks again Tanielle!

Nº 87451/AL. Porto is the second-largest city in Portugal, after Lisbon. Located along the Douro river estuary in northern Portugal, Porto is one of the oldest European centres and registered as a World Heritage Site by UNESCO in 1996. Its settlement dates back many centuries when it was an outpost of the Roman Empire. Its Latin name, Portus Cale, has been referred to as the origin for the name "Portugal", based on transliteration and oral evolution from Latin. name: Gorgeous flat 4bed 5min to tube in lovely Eixample
summary: Welcome to my home! It’s a lovely four bedroom apartment with amazing character. Located in vibrant Eixample, you’ll also be within easy reach of the best of Barcelona's attractions. The nearest tube, Universitad, is only five minutes walk away, and connects you to Spain Square and more, via the red line. With beautiful wood flooring and a tasteful decor, my place has everything you need for a comfortable stay and a unique experience!
space: We are very excited to open the doors of our home to fellow travelers. We like to travel and find this is the best way to stay and get to know a new city with family or friends. our four bedroom apartment is spacious, with beautiful and tasteful decor and a relaxed feel. It’s the ideal place to come back to after a day of exploring. Since you will be in the wonderful Eixample, great transport links mean you’ll be right in the hub of the city but able to escape the hustle and bustle!  The living area has a lot of our personality reflected in it: it is bright and airy, with a large, comfy sofa, and flat screen TV, you will be able to sit back, watch your favorite shows like you always do and make yourself at home! Wood flooring, gorgeous design and large windows add to the room’s charm, and soft throws and pillows and tasteful artwork make lovely finishing touches.  The space includes a dining area with table that seats six in comfy chairs, so you can enjoy a meal with family or friends

The living area has a lot of our personality reflected in it: it is brig
neighborhood_overview: You couldn't be better located. The apartment is located in Eixample, the most iconic neighbourhood in the centre of Barcelona. You will be located in an charming area with the best of Barcelona’s modernism alongside elegant shops and boutiques. Main landmarks include Gaudi’s awe-inspiring Sagrada Familia and Plaza Catalunya, where shopaholics will find an array of commercial chains and boutiques offering all the latest trends.  You’ll have plenty of opportunities to try some typical Spanish and Catalonian gastronomy in the restaurants which populate the area. They include the revered Teoric Taverna Gastronomica, where gleaming reviews are proof of the high quality Mediterranean dishes on offer and Don Kilo Barcelona, an extremely popular restaurant serving Italian classics.  This neighbourhood is well-connected to the main city attractions and offers great public transport connections, so enjoy the area knowing that other exciting Barcelona neighbourhoods are within easy reach!
notes: According to the Law, you will be asked at the moment of the check-in for your IDs. Hope this is not an inconvenience.  In the building, there will be some apartments making some minor refurbishments, you might find some disturbances because of this. We apologize in advance for this.
transit: Universitat is the nearest station to the apartment, just a five minutes walk away down to Gran Via, which is a main street in the city that will lead to Plaza Catalunya. This connects you to the L1 - red line, meaning you can get to iconic Barcelona sites in no time at all, such as Plaza España (Spain Square), The Sagrada Familia Temple, Las Ramblas or the many beaches in Barcelona. There are also plenty of buses such as V9 that stop just down the street that will take you all over the city and you can make connections to lovely places, such as Mount Tibidabo, the Acquarium or The Casttle in Mountjuic.  Exploring all of the attractions of Barcelona could hardly be easier!
access: You will have access to the entire apartment. Please keep in mind it is very important to be respectful towards our neighbors. Thank you!
interaction: My friends at Hostmaker are looking after my home while I am away; they are a short-lets management service team who know Barcelona like the back of their hand! I trust them to look after you and give you a warm welcome! If you have any questions about your stay, please get in touch through the channel platform.

Nas sextas-feiras, há uma feira livre 2 quarteirões  do apartamento, onde você pode saborear todos os diferentes frutos do Brasil. name: Copacabana Bela Vista Apartment  2 - Ocean View!
summary: Location! Location! Location! Spacious apartment with 2 bedrooms, 2 baths and a large kitchen. Beautiful sunrises and cool ocean breezes. Complete and unencumbered of the ocean and beach culture of Rio. Excellent restaurants nearby and the outdoor life at your feet. Convenient to transportation, shopping and tourist attractions. Excellent for families and couples! I am an AIRBNB Superhost for last  9 quarters with track record of happy guests! Apartment also available with a third bedroom.
space: You are in the epicenter of the Leme/Copacabana neighborhood. Everything that happens in Rio happens outside our window: parades, marches, half marathons, cycling tours, you name it we see it. We saw the The FIFA Fan Fest, Rolling Stones concert, Pope Francis, Lenny Kravitz, and the annual New Year’s Eve fireworks from our window.  There are two elevators accessing the apartment: the front social elevator (recently updated) which services only one apartment per floor and the rear service elevator with entry through the kitchen. The house features new sofas, art work, persian carpets in the living room, and antique furniture (including TV cabinet previously owned by the legendary Brazilian crooner/singer Roberto Carlos).  There is an ultra comfortable hammock in the living room which is perfect for an afternoon nap.  The living room and bedrooms come with ceiling fans, air-conditioning, TV, cable (including access to  international channels such as CNN, RAI, TVE, DW, NHK and others) and

neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is great.  It is very safe and much more peaceful than Copacabana.  There are some outstanding restaurants in the area and some night life as well.  You can rent bikes across the street, rent a paddle board at the other end of the beach,  or go for an ocean swim.
notes: Cleaning is charged separately. Three day minimum.   Note the apartment is actually three bedrooms, but one of them can be closed off.  If you need to see the three bedroom alignment, please see my other listings.  Also, note that the more information you have completed in your profile (profession, social network linkages, verified ID), the more likely it is for me to approve you at the outset of your inquiry or request to rent.  Any other personal details you can provide in your inquiry would be appreciated. I have written a very handy guide telling you about the best places to eat in the immediate area as well as those that require transportation.  The guide also includes how to get to the major attractions, night life and some of my favorite things to do or places to see. Car parking is available on the street, but garage parking can be made available for longer stays. Please contact me prior to reserving for details. .
transit: A couple of blocks away, you can catch buses to any part of Rio day or night. 10 to 15 minute walk is the subway.  Taxi stands are a minute away.  From the two airports (Galeão and Santos Dumont) you can take a taxi or a luxury  bus that leaves every 20 to 30 minutes.  You can take this same luxury bus back to the airport.
access: Access is provided the living room, kitchen, two front bedrooms, and bathrooms (one attached to the master bedroom).  The kitchen has a refrigerator, stove, microwave. washer, dryer and filtered water dispenser. The kitchen comes equipped with mixer, toaster, coffee makers, blender, sandwich press, dicer among other devices and utensils (even a utensil to roll sushi).
interaction: I am always available via the phone, cellular, email, social media.  You can also contact my assistant Charlotte.  You can ask about anything: where to go, what to do, what to see and how to participate in many of the event which make Rio the “Marvelous City”! I can act as your informal concierge to ensure you enjoy your stay.
house_rules: English: Please READ rules before booking the property. - No guests are allowed in the apartment without prior written consent of owner or property manager.   - A list of registered guests need to be provided at the time of check in. This list will be kept at the lobby front desk to ensure your safety and the safety of the building residents. Upon request guests will provide copy of passport or identity card. - Please respect your neighbors between the hours of 10PM and before 9AM by avoidance of loud music, loud talking in the hallways or otherwise noisy behavior.  - Please turn off lights, air conditioning or other energy consuming appliances when leaving the apartment.   - When coming back from the beach, please rinse off sand from legs/body and shake out beach cloth/towels prior to entering the apartment.  - While we charge a cleaning fee at the end of your stay, this is meant for heavy cleaning (mopping, washing linens and towels, vacuuming, dusting, refrigerator cleaning,etc) , w

host.host_about:
I live between Rio de Janeiro and the San Francisco bay area in California.  I am a public radio DJ with a Brazilian music radio program for the last 30 years.  I am also a story teller and have a knack for making people laugh. 

I love the outdoors and especially cycling up to the Christ statue or in the hills above Silicon Valley.  I am very familiar with the musical scene of Rio and can be your guide or give you the information you need.

I am a native English speaker and speak fluent Portuguese and passable Japanese.  I also can make myself understood in Spanish.

My philosophy as a host:  My parents were very successful small business owners with a carnation farm and later a flower shop. They had their business listed in the best of Silicon Valley and even had local TV coverage.  Out of hundreds of similar businesses, they were able to differentiate themselves on how they treated and interacted with their customers.  They worked hard to give that little extra that made people want to come back.  My goal as a host is to treat as you my parents would have.  Let me show my definition of hospitality.  

Moro entre o Rio de Janeiro e nos suburbos de San Francisco, em Califórnia. Sou um DJ de rádio educativo com um programa de Música Brasileira para os últimos 30 anos. 

Eu gosto de pedalar na floresta da Tijuca subindo para o Corcovado ou nas colinas de Silicon Valley em California. Conheço bem a cena musical do Rio e possa o seu guia ou dar-lhe as informações sobre o que você deveria fazer na Cidade Maravilhosa.

Eu falo inglês e português fluentemente. Eu também entendo bastante espanhol e japônes para comunicar.

Minha filosofia como anfitrião: meus pais eram proprietários de pequena empresa muito bem sucedido com um sítio de floricultura e depois uma loja de flores. Eles tinham seus negócios listados no melhor de "Silicon Valley" e até tinham cobertura de TV local. Das centenas de empresas similares, eles conseguiram se diferenciar com o atendimento único aos seus clientes. Eles trabalharam um pouco mais para fazer os clientes sempre voltar. Meu objetivo como anfitrião é tratar como você teria os meus pais. Deixe-me mostrar minha definição de hospitalidade.

reviews.comments:
John's apartment is in a perfect location and has a faultless view of Copacabana Beach. The rooms are much larger than the photos suggest and we had everything we needed (reliable wifi, kitchen facilities, laundry, etc). John was available to assist us as necessary and even supplied a translator for our arrival.

We will definitely use John's place next time we are in Rio.

I book this AP for 5 people and I could not be happier. Absolutely great spot and the apartment is one of the best in Rio. The rooms are great and the view is simply the best. I was waking up early in the morning like 4.30 just to watch the sun rise.
John is an awesome host. Altho he was away we were always in touch via (Hidden by Airbnb) , (Hidden by Airbnb) , email...
He made us feel at home and welcomed us with a lot of care.
That will be my place for wgen I get back.
Charlotte his friend looked after us full time and we also had her as our tour guide. Very expensive per hour, $150 but it was easy and worthwhile. 
Thank you so much John and hope to come back to Rio soon.

El departamento es increíble. Muy comodo y hermoso todo. Una vista inigualable. Excelente ubicación. La pasamos increíble. La atención de Jhon siempre fue excelente !!!! El departamento tiene todo. Es mucho mejor de lo que se ve en las fotos. Quedamos encantadas con mis amigas.

El departamento es tan lindo como se ve en las fotos.  La vista es espectacular. Muy lumimoso y cómodo. Tanto John como Charlotte que nos recibió super amables y atentos a toda necesidad. Excelente estadía.

This comfortable apartment is in a beautiful location with a wonderful view and has a kitchen equipped with everything you might need, including laundry facilities, to feel right at home. Air-conditioning is a useful benefit when temperatures are high. There is a wide variety of good restaurants within easy walking distance and some, including a few close to the apartment have samba music on the weekends. Noise can be a challenge if early sleep is a prerequisite!  John tries hard to be a helpful host, seems to know Rio quite well and has created a useful advisory on local restaurants and tourist destinations in and around the city as well travel alternatives for visitors. John lives in California and this was the first time we had rented from a landlord who lives abroad. When something needs attention, as will be the case from time to time, it is harder to reach him, being in another country. However, he is attentive through his intermediaries when he becomes aware of an issue. The condo is on the seventh floor of an older building with two elevators which are not always reliable. We had an unfortunate and stressful experience through being stuck in the main elevator for almost 90 minutes. It is now out of commission for repairs, so hopefully the problem we experienced will not occur again with any residents or future guests. We had to use the service elevator at the rear of the building for a part of our stay. It is also old and, based on our experience, we naturally wondered about its reliability and maintenance record. Thankfully, it didn’t give us any difficulties. 
Putting aside a few unfortunate experiences with this rental, we enjoyed the apartment and the location and appreciated how responsive John tried to be as a caring airbnb host.

John and his wife Maria were very accommodating! They were always super responsive with communication and were always willing to provide assistance/advice when needed. The home is absolutely beautiful and overlooks the ocean from both the main living area and the master bedroom. The views are amazing. I would highly recommend this place!

Want to confirm that everething was wonderfull with appartament. Beatifull view we've seen on the pictures was really better rhan expected! The support of John and his team was perfect. Begginning from personal John's guide to the Rio and ending with catching of Taxi in early morning. 
Appartment is fully equipped with everything you awaited.
Fresh fruites are unexpected feature we wouldn't belive. ;)

The apartment is fantastic and is exactly as shown in the photos.  The corner views of the beach are unbelieavable and the the location is truly ideal with restaurants, cafes and a supermarket (and the beach!) literally steps away.
John and his team were fantastic....they explained every thing about the apt and the neighborhood clearly and quickly when I arrived and were super quick and responsive with any questions I had the rest of my trip.
I would HIGHLY recommend John and his lovely apartment to anyone!!

El apartamento de John en Rio no pudo ser mejor. Cómodo, espacioso, limpio, callado y con una vista frente al mar excepcional!  El barrio perfecto. Restaurantes, bares, mercado y mucha playa. Charlotte estaba esperándonos  y fue muy amable en indicarnos puntos de interés. Volveria otra vez.

John's place is great for anyone who is experiencing Rio for the first time. In addition to his incredible host guide full of tips and local recommendations, he and his assistant, Charlotte were always readily available to answer questions. I think the pictures speak for themselves in that his apartment is absolutely beautiful, with a pretty incredible panoramic beach view. The apartment had everything we could have needed and moreover we definitely appreciated the amazing coffee and fruit upon arrival! We felt safe and at home throughout our stay and only can't wait to return to Rio again soon!

John is by far the best host at Airbnb!!

John is very patient and listens to his guests needs and requirements. He is very knowledgeable and gave us very detailed instructions about the place, made us feel at home and treated us like his family. 

We reached Rio late in the night, he was available online for assistance and also left a welcome basket (with basics - fruits, milk, bread, juice, etc.). We had an amazing experience in Rio and it is largely thanks to John!

The place is gorgeous. It right across the beach and very conveniently located. It was one of the best vacation ever!

John的公寓位置非常棒,无论是客厅还是卧室都可以看到无敌宽阔的180度海景,跨过马路就是沙滩,离面包山很近,离著名的Marius海鲜自助餐厅步行就5分钟的距离,整个区域也很安全,晚上吃完晚餐还可以下楼散步,奥运的沙滩排球比赛场地就在公寓前的沙滩｡John的公寓设施非常齐畚,厨房,洗衣干衣,一应俱全,wifi网络速度也快｡John的人非常好,预定前John不厌其烦地回复我N多个问题,预定后,我两次修改订单,John在他可以的范围内也非常乐意地接受｡我们的预订是不带早餐的,但是John还是帮我们一家四囗准备了早餐,新鲜的面包,牛奶,水果｡整个在里约的行程,John都非常细心地帮我们计划,哪里值得去玩,哪里值得去吃,推荐的都很不错｡John也非常有爱心,我们的两个小男孩在公寓里大闹天宫,他也不嫌吵闹,反而跟孩子们一起玩｡我们一家四口都认为John的公寓是我们整个巴西旅程中最舒适的,John也是旅途中我们遇到最好的房东,当然我们也成为了朋友｡总之,选择John的公寓是在里约最明智的选择,N个
La atención de charlotte y de john fue excelente y la ubicación y viste es de lo mejor. Gracias por todo. Nos vemos pronto.

The view of the apartment is truly a million dollar view.  It's simply does not get better than this.  The moment we stepped into the apartment, we were drawn to the spectacular view of Copacabana and the mountains.  We're a group of four adults traveling together so having 2 bedrooms and 2 baths is essential.  One of the bathrooms is actually ensuite.  The apartment has all the amenities with washer/dryer, fully equipped kitchen, bottled water dispenser  and beach gear.  There were welcome fruit basket, bread, spread and juice in the refrigerator.  The location could not be better:  the apartment is right across from Copacabana beach and adjacent to the Hilton hotel.  We didn't use public transportation but it is nearby.  We found Uber to be convenient and cost effective especially with sharing the cost amongst four of us.  We felt safe using Uber. Even a taxi ride from GIG to the apartment was very reasonable.  I believe we paid 20 USD.
The host , John Ii, is one of the most thoughtful, thorough, and gracious airbnb hosts I have ever met.  He will take care of you: from providing information on restaurants to transportation or anything you may need.  He lives in the Bay Area so communication with him was easy, especially for California residents.  I can't say nice enough things about John. He is just great !

The condo was marvelous! It was breathtaking and the location was picturesque. We felt like we had stepped into paradise! It had everything we could need and was located directly across the street from the beach. An adundance of restaurants are in the area. We couldn’t find fault in John's place or our time in Rio. John is an exceptional host. He is a wealth of knowledge in regard to all things Rio including: food, local escapes, arranging tours, and anything else that you may/may not have thought of doing while in Rio. Because of John's hospitaliity, we will be visiting Rio again!

name: Nostalgic & Simplicity Style 2BR Darling Harbour
summary: Overlooking picturesque Darling Harbour, Cockle Bay and Sydney CBD's striking skyline from rooftop. Minutes walk to the International Convention Centre, 5 minute walk to The Star Casino, 10 mins to Sydney's Fish markets, world class Restaurants, Shops, Public transport and Major attractions. Building includes resort style facilities like 25m rooftop pool, spa, gym and sauna. Darling Harbour is Sydney's premier entertainment precinct,  It doesn't get much better than this!
space: Very spacious apartment and quite,  two picturesque  bedrooms with balcony access, two spacious bathrooms (one is an ensuite) and large living and dining area (total 110 sq/m approx). There is unlimited Wi-Fi and internal laundry,  a full kitchen with all essential appliances.  Renowned cafés and restaurants all at your door step, Cloes Grocery Store is around the corner, 24 Hr Convenience Store is across the Road, Harbour-side Shopping Mall next door . 24 hr Food and drinks available in Star City casino close to the apartment. 24 Hour Reception, anytime check in after 3 pm. storage place near the reception for early arrivals and late departures. There is also a parking spot that you may use free of charge in the underground secure car park.
description: Overlooking picturesque Darling Harbour, Cockle Bay and Sydney CBD's striking skyline from rooftop. Minutes walk to the International Convention Centre, 5 minute walk to The Star Casino, 10 mins to Sydney's Fish markets, world class Restaurants, Shops, Public transport and Major attractions. Building includes resort style facilities like 25m rooftop pool, spa, gym and sauna. Darling Harbour is Sydney's premier entertainment precinct,  It doesn't get much better than this! Very spacious apartment and quite,  two picturesque  bedrooms with balcony access, two spacious bathrooms (one is an ensuite) and large living and dining area (total 110 sq/m approx). There is unlimited Wi-Fi and internal laundry,  a full kitchen with all essential appliances.  Renowned cafés and restaurants all at your door step, Cloes Grocery Store is around the corner, 24 Hr Convenience Store is across the Road, Harbour-side Shopping Mall next door . 24 hr Food and drinks available in Star City casino close to the
neighborhood_overview: Ferry, Bus and Light Rail just across the road. More information --> Ferry takes you directly to Opera House, Harbour Bridge and The Rocks. -->Bus takes you directly to Bondi Beach. --> Light Rail takes you directly to Paddy's Markets or a 15 minute walk. Don't forget to buy an Opal card for bus and light rail travel before your trip
transit: The TripGo app can help you with transport timetables.
access: Full access to the entire apartment and one car spot Full access to all the amenities that are located on the top level of the building. They include the heated 25 metre pool, sauna, spa and gym
interaction: I'm available on my phone at all hours of the day to help you with anything you need

host.host_about: Welcome to Sydney, and I'd like to provide you my apartment as accommodation!

reviews.comments: The location is amazing. Right off the Harbour, and close to a lot of restaurants. The building is also nice with a pool and hot tub. The amazing kids playground at darling quarter is one kt a km away. The apartment is spacious and clean. Great host and very quick to respond. Highly recommended.

This stylish apartment has all you need. From a beautiful view to a exquisite dinner, you could last days without worrying about your home. Two bedrooms accompanied with a gym and swimming pool add extra if your traveling with others! You can walk around the Darling Harbour to find the prodigious tastes of Sydney right as you enjoy you stroll with it.    Highly recommended location and stay!

If you're heading to Sydney and hoping to stay in Darling Harbour, Angela's apartment is ideal. The kitchen contained all of the equipment you could need and the supermarket is just a minutes walk away. The location was great. The apartment was tidy & quiet. Great value for families wanting to stay close to some beautiful sights and tourist attractions. We would highly recommend Angela's apartment.
Very good
位置十分方便｡
The location is fantastic! The swimming pool was a real treat, we enjoyed staying in the apartment. Angela was a great host.
You cant find a better place to stay if you go to Sydney!
If you don’t feel disturbed by very simple furniture and quiet noisy sleeping rooms you can book it. If you expect a flat on a high floor with Harbour view this is not the right place.

The location of this apartment is amazing, it is right next door to Darling Harbour. So that is the best feature by far! It was clean and had 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. There is a large baby cot in the main bedroom which takes up a lot of space if you are not needing it!
It was clean and well cared for. 
The swimming pool and spa on the roof is fantastic!!
Compared to other places I have stayed in, this one seemed to be pretty basic as there was really no added touches. But it’s functional and a good apartment

Overall fantastic location and very responsive host BUT the apartment itself does not live up to the photos. The apartment needs some maintenance issues taken care of which we see previous guests have also mentioned.

On the positive side the apartment was in a fabulous location - close to attractions, restaurants and shopping. The check-in was seamless, despite my concerns about picking up keys from a convenience store. The apartment came with parking -  a real bonus in this area of Sydney. It took me 2 turns to find the carpark, but that was my fault I should have watched the video Angela provided on the day rather than a few days before. The apartment was very well equipped - dishwasher, washing machine and dryer etc. The beds were very comfy. Really good Wifi. 
On the negative side I was disappointed that we were only given one bath towel each (for a 4 night stay) and a fairly thin towel at that. No hand towels or face washers. The apartment was clean but could probably do with a spruce up as it looked a little tired. 
My big problem was the TV. It didn't work. When my husband telephoned one of the contact people he received a telephone call back saying that he couldn't help us and would get someone to look at it the next day - a bit too late as we were leaving the next morning. He also told my husband that he had spoken to the Concierge at the building and that a number of apartments were have antenna problems. We then tried to tune  the TV again and were able to "find" over 200 channels - but all of them were locked, including the free to air channels. 
My husband contacted the second contact person and he got back to us and said he couldn't understand why we were having problems as the family that had moved out that morning didn't have any issues. This was a complete lie - we had been in the apartment for the last three nights. 
I don't like people lying to me. Why not simply say that you can't rectify the problem, apologise for the inconvenience and leave it at that.  It wouldn't have been any big deal.
Finally I don't like hosts asking me (on several occasions) to give them a 5 star rating. I only give honest feedback.

Kind hospitality greets you while this spacious apartment gives you the slightest touch of home. While summer dawns on fabulous Sydney, the upstairs pool will show much of a necessity while you enjoy your stay. The bathroom functions well and the bedrooms feel as if your own! While you enjoy your stay, there are many tastes still yet to find. A sublime holiday stay for everyone and anyone!!!

As you enter this comfortable apartment, it gives you a hearty welcome as you discover the many wonders of Sydney. Other add on's of this visit include a gym if you need a work-out and a wonderful pool that proves a fundamental as part of the torrid atmosphere of the city. The bedrooms are absolutely stunning! All the sheets are clean and the room itself is magnificently spotless. It is located at a perfect spot, with the closeness of the best 5 star hotel! A clear cut stay that's worthwhile!
Everything is perfect, I have to say thanks to the host.

As the many attractions of Australia open, this vast apartment will give you a lifetime experience. The building is next door to the harbour and many exquisite restaurants that will light up your visit! If the hot sun bothers you too much, you can easily go to the pool that also gives you a beautiful view of the city. I recommend this homely apartment to everyone and anyone!
Perfect accommodation, love to stay again

reviews.comments: Great value and location close to the airport, plus the host is great!!
Such a quaint, quiet place — enjoyed it very much.

name: Bronte B&B Studio
summary: Under a towering white mulberry tree is a delightful,  private studio with bathroom for two people to enjoy a sojourn in beautiful beachside Bronte. The ocean beach,  local cafe & restaurant strip plus bus stop for Sydney CBD are an easy stroll.
space: The wooden floored studio consists of a bedroom with a queen size bed, a comfy armchair, table, two chairs, a cupboard, shelves with a sink, microwave, fridge, toaster, Nespresso coffee machineopp  and crockery. There is a flat screen TV, iPhone dock and Wi-Fi. The bathroom has a shower, toilet and basin.
description: Under a towering white mulberry tree is a delightful,  private studio with bathroom for two people to enjoy a sojourn in beautiful beachside Bronte. The ocean beach,  local cafe & restaurant strip plus bus stop for Sydney CBD are an easy stroll. The wooden floored studio consists of a bedroom with a queen size bed, a comfy armchair, table, two chairs, a cupboard, shelves with a sink, microwave, fridge, toaster, Nespresso coffee machineopp  and crockery. There is a flat screen TV, iPhone dock and Wi-Fi. The bathroom has a shower, toilet and basin. The studio has its own verdant garden of orchids, avocado trees, banana palms and passionfruit vines. It is surrounded by a hedge and is private from the main house, set 20 metres away across the garden. There is a large outdoor timber topped table to spread out on. The access is level from the street. Follow the brick paved drive way to the back gate to the garden. Guests can conveniently come and go without disturbing others. Your hosts, Sus
neighborhood_overview: Bronte was recently featured in the New York Times travel article, 36 hours in Sydney. “About a mile south of the more famous Bondi Beach, along a breathtakingly beautiful waterfront walkway is Bronte Beach, a boomerang of golden sand nestled between wind-worn cliffs, a verdant public park and the Tasman Sea." The beach also features ocean baths. Take a mask and snorkel and walk to the next beach, Clovelly Beach, to see the protected Blue Gropers or a boogie board to the surf beaches, Coogee, Tamarama and of course, Bondi.  Our street is quiet, even when the beach is very busy on hot days.
notes: It is located around the corner from Three Blue Ducks, a casual cafe and restaurant opened by three surfer friends that is featured in the 2014 Good Food Guide as one of the best cafe and restaurants  in Sydney's eastern suburbs. There are plenty of cafes and restaurants nearby too: Vietnamese, Italian, Seafood, macrobiotic, modern Australian and much more. Food allergies are catered for if you need gluten free or lactose free breakfast. We try to be sustainable and use recycled products and the garden is watered by a combination of water captured in rainwater tanks and town water. The garden is fertilised by organic compost produced in both compost bins and worm farms. We have Australian native stingless bees that are kept away from the studio that help pollinate the garden. This means that we don't use any pesticides in the garden as we don't want to harm the bees.
transit: A 2 minute walk to the 440 bus that will deliver you into the city in 20 minutes or 10 mins to Bondi Junction where you can catch the train to the city.
access: The studio has its own verdant garden of orchids, avocado trees, banana palms and passionfruit vines. It is surrounded by a hedge and is private from the main house, set 20 metres away across the garden. There is a large outdoor timber topped table to spread out on. The access is level from the street. Follow the brick paved drive way to the back gate to the garden. Guests can conveniently come and go without disturbing others.
interaction: Your hosts, Susan and Greg, provide local knowledge of the eastern suburbs of Sydney as well as their favourite Sydney sights, what's on in Sydney, where to eat and getting around on public transport.
house_rules: No smoking.  There is a no visitor policy as it is our private garden which guests are welcome to use. However if you want to discuss please check with us about visitors well in advance.

host.host_about: Susan and Greg live in Sydney's east. Susan is a magazine journalist and Greg is a financial consultant on retirement systems and an academic. We love to travel, see movies, cook and am addicted to box set DVD shows. We like gardening, growing our own food and keep native stingless Australian bees.

reviews.comments: We had a great time staying with Susan in Bronte. The place is self contained and quiet. Susan had thought of everything.  The place really was perfect.  We can't recommend this place highly enough!

We had a wonderful time staying in Susan and Greg's garden studio. It was quiet, private, stylishly decorated and only minutes from a great little shopping village. The bed was very comfortable and our hosts were just delightful! A highly recommended stay! 
Brigita and Gerard, Hobart, Tasmania

Susan is great and a very attentive and friendly host and very informative on where things are locally and in Sydney if you don't know the area so well. I really enjoyed my stay at Bronte B&B studio. It is a lovely space in a garden setting, quiet and in a street where you can park easily and walk to the beach and restaurants. The studio is well set up with a comfy bed and everything you would need. The fridge was packed with nice things like strawberries and yogurt and it's easy to have a light meal/breakfast etc. There's also an outside paved area among the trees with table and chairs which makes it lovely.   Bronte is a great area and the cliff walk to Bondi is great. I would fully recommend this and so much better than staying in a hotel.

Bronte Studio is a wonderful place to stay. The studio is bright and beautifully presented with everything we needed. The yummy fresh breakfast was an added bonus, not to mention the chocolate. Susan and Greg are lovely hosts and were there to help with any questions. The location is fantastic, we love bronte.

Susan and Greg were very nice hosts  , they were helpful while still giving  us a lot of privacy . The Studio is really nice , is well equipped , nice bathroom , linen , clean , everything is new inside . The garden where the studio sits is beautiful, a quite peaceful location you could think you were in the countryside but its close to Bondi.

What a perfect introduction to air bnb. Susan is the most welcoming host and from the moment we arrived we felt at home. The immaculate studio is set in a beautiful garden in your own private oasis. Susan could not do enough for us and her attention to detail made our experience flawless.  The fresh flowers on the bedside, the organic range of breakfast treats & crisp comfortable linen made it hard to leave. The location is an easy walk to the local cafés, transport & beach. Everything is at your finger tips. We cannot thank Susan enough for making our stay the perfect few days away, we look forward to coming back.

The little room at the back of Susan and her family's house really is a garden retreat. This part of Bronte is very quiet as you are away from the busy streets. 
We were made to feel very welcome with email communication beforehand and coffee/tea/breakfast supplies in the mini fridge and a little chocolate was a lovely surprise. 
This place is clean and private and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend staying here. 
The bonus was being able to walk from the house down to Bronte beach through the beautiful park nearby.
This place was brilliant- lovely hosts and a great little pad to escape. Definitely will stay again

This is a great place to stay, beautifully presented, very private (including own entrance), great location (in terms of proximity to Bronte beach, the Bondi cliff walk, local restaurants and public transport to the city), and extremely comfortable. The apartment is set at the rear of the stunning backyard garden with its own outside private area with table and chairs. Hosts are engaging, helpful and interesting without being intrusive.

I loved staying at Bronte B&B Studio. Such a peaceful spot where the loudest noises are those of glorious bird-calls. The bed was very comfortable. The provided breakfast food delicious. Susan was prompt in replying to queries before my stay and then on the day was really terrific helping out with a rushed task that was well above the expected. I would recommend Bronte B&B unreservedly.

Susan's studio truly surpassed all our expectations. It is set in a corner of their stunning rear garden. The room was clean, comfortable and inviting and the light breakfast was fresh and delicious. 

Susan and her family were beautiful hosts! We would certainly stay a second time round - no hesitation.

Thanks Susan & family.

We were warmly greeted by the owner Gregory, who showed us the studio and provided useful information like where to eat, distances to regions etc. The studio was immaculate – very clean & stylishly decked out. The studio includes thoughtful touches such as: maps and travels guides of Sydney, wifi, iPod/iPhone sound system adapter, beach towels, soaps, shampoo/conditioner, hair dryer, iron. The kitchenette was complete with amenities and complimentary food: oats, yoghurt, orange juice, fruit, milk, coffee. The studio is in a gorgeous garden setting. Its quiet and located just 5 min walk from the beach and 3 min walk from the delicious Three Blue Ducks. We would definitely recommend booking Bronte B & B Studio.

We thoroughly enjoyed staying here at the Bronte B&B! Susan and Greg are lovely hosts, and they certainly go out of their way to make you feel comfortable and welcome. It is a beautiful little home, ideal for a relaxing quiet break. Everything was wonderful! We certainly will be back soon!!

I booked this studio for my parents as we were visiting Australia for a whirlwind tour that required a lot of travelling in a short space of time. I could see they were tired and needed a nice place to relax for the day before we flew the very long journey back to Ireland and I felt Susan and Greg's studio looked perfect. I had a lot of questions for Susan before I booked (and I was also booking very last minute) and she took the time to respond to each one, and very promptly too. 

My parents only stayed for one night (two days) but they really enjoyed the peace and tranquility of the room and the area. The studio is bright, airy and comfortable with lovely bed sheets and complimentary beach towels which was a nice and thoughtful touch. A lovely array of breakfast foods was left out and Susan and Greg also offered a great recommendation for a cafe nearby that turned out very well.

Bronte is a beautiful and peaceful area and the coastal walk from Coogee to Bondi is absolutely breathtaking. I highly recommend this area and this studio for those looking for some peaceful beach time.
Susan was absolutely gorgeous, so kind, welcoming, and lovely. The studio is fresh and comfortable - amazing really! we loved our stay more than we can say 10/10. Gorgeous area.

Susan and Greg were very helpful, letting us leave our bags when we arrived early and keeping in touch to let us know when the room was ready.  The studio is as comfortable as it looks - it's in a beautiful garden setting and the neighbourhood is a pleasant and safe place to walk around.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here, thank you.

Susan was a fabulous hostess. She offered advice on many things to do and see in Sydney. We loved her place - it was private, charming and sparkling clean. The garden outside was beautiful. Lastly - we could walk to the beach!

The Bronte Studio was Great. Susen and Greg were excellent hosts. They made us feel very welcome. 
The Beach is only a short walk away and the Main Street Provides everything from coffee places to Restaurants. 
We would definitively stay there again.
Great location, great accommodation and great hosts. Well priced, nothing more to ask for.

Susan's garden studio is a tranquil oasis hidden amongst the crazy world of over priced, poor quality and noisy Eastern Suburbs rentals.

It was such a pleasure to have found this place. It's the perfect place to recharge. Everything was clean and beautifully presented and the studio was stocked with everything you might need, right down to spare toiletries/ umbrella/ Tupperware! And the breakfast provisions were just delicious.

It's one of those places you don't want to tell too many people about, just in case it's booked out next time I want to visit.

Staying with Susan and Greg was the perfect airbnb experience. They checked on us on our way in to Sydney to make sure we knew where to come, met us on arrival with maps and great local knowledge about the best things to do in Bronte and surrounds and provided a tranquil beautiful sanctuary with amazing provisions. We almost ran out of fridge space! :-) the garden is gorgeous and a beautiful place to sit and the bed was the best we've slept in since leaving home months ago. Greg and Susan even did our laundry for us! Way above and beyond ... All I have left to say is stop web searching and stay here. You wont find better.

We love staying in the studio - it was high standard accommodation and everything was perfect for us. We also loved the area and it is  easy to get around by bus everywhere if you didn't want to hire a car. Susan and Greg were amazing hosts - they were extremely helpful and welcoming and even took us along to the local Starfish club one evening which we really enjoyed. If you want to stay in 5 star boutique type accommodation in a beautiful garden setting with great hosts book this studio .

Susan's Bronte cottage was fabulous! So beautiful, light-filled and comfortable. Susan has taken care to make the studio a real home away from home. When staying at an apartment while on a trip it's often the little things you remember the most that help make your trip a special one. There was muesli, milk, juice and fresh fruit waiting upon arrival. How lovely! And the location could not be better--a 10- minute walk to the beach (one of Sydney's most beautiful!), and an even shorter one to the charming main street with cafes and shops. Thanks so much, Susan. Can't wait for the next visit!

Our stay was absolutely fabulous. Susan was very welcoming and was extremely helpful with instructions and directions upon our arrival. The studio was clean and fresh and tucked away in a beautiful garden. It was perfect for a couple nights away from the busy hustle of the city. We would highly recommend the Bronte studio. Thank you Susan and family for being so accommodating.
We were made to feel very welcome. A very nice, relaxed place to stay.
Susan was very welcoming, texted us prior to arriving.  Happy for us to us the amenities and leave our bags.  Gave us a few hints of the local cafes etc.

We had a fantastic stay at The Bronte Studio. It is very clean and nicely decorated. Excellent location to explore the beaches and only 30 minutes from down town Sydney. Susan and her husband were very friendly troughout our stay and gave us some very nice suggestions for diner etc.

The place is lovely and Susan very nice and welcoming.
Everything was clean and quiet
Definitely recommend!

We had a lovely stay at Bronte B&B and Greg and Susan were very helpful hosts. It is a little haven of quiet and not far from the beach and great cafes. 
Thanks to our hosts! 
Sarah
We loved staying the B&B at Bronte. A beatiful and peacefull gardenhouse and garden and great hospitallity from Susan and her family. Bronte is a beatifull neighbourhood as well.

The Bronte B&B Studio is a little gem in a beautiful seaside neighbourhood, and yet with good transportation links to the CBD.  The accommodation is exactly as pictured, and is very peaceful, being in the garden of Susan and her husband's lovely home.  Our hosts were extremely welcoming and helpful, telling us about local restos, public transit into the city, and calling taxis when we needed a faster mode of transportation.  The breakfast provisions provided were generous and healthful, and we appreciated Susan remembering that we are vegetarians.  If you want a relaxing stay in Sydney, near a beach, the Bronte B&B Studio is the ticket, and Susan and her husband are great hosts.  Highly recommended.

The Bronte B&B Studio was just the space we were looking for after returning from a week out bush over new years. The studio is private, clean and tranquil. A little oasis in the heart of Bronte with the beach only a short (hilly) walk away. 

Fridge was stocked with juice, milk and fresh mangoes (yum!) and the bathroom with organic and cruelty free products. It was a delight to stay. Susan was great to deal with and also offered to keep our bags in the main house while we went out sight seeing as we had a late flight.

Highly recommend.

What a magical spot! Everything was perfect (except the weather!) ☔️
Lovely informative welcome - the studio was spotlessly clean with fresh flowers from the garden & a fridge full of goodies. 
Great location with nearby cafés & the beach a short walk away. 
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay & would highly recommend to others visiting Sydney. 
Thanks again

We absolutely love Bronte B&B!!!
We couldn't have found a better place to stay, hidden in Susan and Gregs lovely green garden, you feel very private. You have an area of the garden to your self. The studio have all your need for a perfect stay. The soap is lovely (Susan helped us buy some, to take home). The beakfast all organic, lovely mangos, avocado, lovely bread, everyting tasted amazinig. The area has some nice restaurants and coffee shops, bronte beach is lovely to.
You will use a bit of time in public transportation going to Bondi junction. to connect with the train and other busses. You can do amazing walks close to the ocean, and make sure to go to Coogee Beach too.
Susan was a lovely host and took very good care of us and was very helpfull, very easy to communicate with. This is such a lovely place stay and we couldn't have hoped for any better. We hope will have the opportunuty to go back.
Anders & Christina, Copenhagen, DK

We were made to feel very welcome from the start and the Studio was  exactly what we were hoping - quiet and peaceful, yet we were still close to all attractions. The Studio is located within what could be called a " secret garden"  and our privacy was guaranteed. Walk to Bronte beach (downhill there but uphill on return) and enjoy the coastal walk from Bondi to Coogee. Thanks again.

I loved staying with Susan and Greg! The studio was well-furnished, and it provided the comforts of home. The fridge was stocked w easy breakfast goodies, and I was really enchanted by their gorgeous gardens. It's also a very quiet and nice area, roughly 5-10 minute walk to Bronte Beach.  From Bronte, you can do the coastal walk through to Tamarama and Bondi. It made for a perfect weekend away to be at the beach and living like a local, and with such lovely hosts. I would stay with them again given the chance.

We had a wonderfull stay at Susan's, the studio is well furnished and the private courtyard very appreciable. The place is very quiet and you can go easily to Bronte beach and the superb walkway to Bondi.

Susan and Greg were brilliant hosts having thought of everything beyond just a comfortable stay for the three of us. There was Greg ready with maps and things to do, places to eat, Cricket kit for my 7 yr old boy and easy to remember wifi password. Susan had a mini botanic tour for us at her pretty garden early morning. And to top it all they even helped us pack!
Best hosts ever...

Me and my boyfriend stayed for 3 nights in the Bronte studio and absolutely loved it! The self-contained studio is at the back of the main house in the beautiful garden and Susan has really thought of everything you could possibly need. Susan and Greg were lovely hosts with lots of helpful advice and information about the local area (we loved Clovelly Bowls Club situated on top of a cliff where you can visit as a guest for a few very reasonably priced drinks). The neighbourhood is beautiful, with some nice local eateries where we had one of the best (and cheapest) steaks we've ever had at Eugene's! Bronte beach is only a 10 minute walk away, and other beaches (including Bondi) can be reached via a gorgeous coastal walkway. Sydney city centre is easily accessible via the local bus stop at the end of the street. We would love to return and stay with Susan and Greg again, and cannot recommend their beautiful studio enough! Thanks again :).

The hosts made us feel so welcome! We were so spoilt :) From the fresh juice, mango, chocolate and organic yoghurt in the fridge, to the beautiful soaps, shampoo and fresh white linen. They gave us directions to good local cafes and walks, we barely used the car as were in great walking distance to the beach and shops. Came home so relaxed, will definitely be back! Thanks guys

Our recent stay with Susan and Greg was every bit as good as we expected. We arrived quite late in the evening which wasn't a problem for Susan and Greg and they made us feel very welcome showing us around and giving us tips on the local area.
The studio was very clean and the fridge full of fresh fruit, Juice Yoghurt etc all organic which went down a treat for breakfast.
Greg brought us fresh bagels and bread from the local bakery a couple of the mornings which was a nice surprise.
They also offered to do some laundry for us which was very thoughtful and a great help as we had been in Australia a couple of weeks by the time we stayed in Bronte.
For anyone looking for a peaceful retreat in a lovely garden setting in a nice residential area, this is the place to stay.

Thanks to you both

Cheers

Tony & Pat
While the weather let us down, we were really happy with this place, and touched by Susan's hospitality. The studio was thoughtfully set up, and had a really nice feel. We would recommend it to all.
Superbe. Tout était parfait. L'accueil chaleureux de Susane, le magnifique jardin, la décoration, tout est fait pour se sentir à la maison tout en étant indépendant.
It was a pleasure staying at Susan's and Greg's garden studio. A beautiful retreat with respectful hosts. A lovely experience. Thanks!
We had just a perfect time in susan and gregs garden. They are so helpful an welcoming.
Quiet, clean and relaxing place to stay. Will be staying again and highly recommend to any couple looking for a place to stay in Bronte.

Susan was extremely hospitable welcoming Katie and myself to her beautiful B&B studio. We enjoyed  breakfast in the sunny private garden and the recommended cafes and restaurants in Bronte and close by Coogee. Our stay was topped off with the fantastic costal walk through to Bondi beach. 

Would highly recommend.

Thanks a bunch Susan!

Exactly what it said it would be and more. Really lovely private space in the garden of a family home. 10 minutes from the beach (up a steep hill) but a lovely walk and fantastic beach so well worth it. 

Susan and her family were the best Airbnb hosts we've had. Around just enough to give exactly the right amount of support that we needed without being too much. But also going above and beyond the call of duty bringing gorgeous breakfast food and even helping us with a bit of washing for our 8 week old baby which was so so helpful. 

Overall it was a really lovely experience with great people. Highly recommended. We'll be back for sure!

The studio was beautifully set up and very comfortable.  Susan and Greg were very accommodating and looked after me really well.  The neighourhood was in a great location, close to the beach, shops and public transport. I would return in a heartbeat!

We had such a relaxing time- the garden outlook was beautiful and it was like being in the country in the middle of Sydney! The bed was lush and room cozy (we needed the heater as it was freezing in Sydney this weekend!)
Susan was such a lovely host- she was very welcoming, provided us with great tips for local eateries and everything was within walking distance. We would definitely visit again.... Thank you Susan.

My partner and I Loved everything about Bronte b&b; the hosts were lovely, the accommodation perfectly clean and wonderful+, the neighbourhood quiet, picturesque and central.  Would definitely visit again.

It is quite apparent as to why Susan has the title super host!Our stay was one of the most pleasurable we have ever experienced in Sydney and we look forward to staying with Susa again pending availability.

The apartment was lovely and had a lot of privacy. Love that the view from the bed was the garden itself and there are tables outside you can have breakfast at. Amenities were provided and Susan even stocked the fridge with breakfast. Susan was very helpful and even remembered to book a cab for me to the airport when I completely forgot. Neighbourbood is wonderful and safe. Location is near the beach (only 5min walk) and walking distance to the supermarket, restaurants and cafe. Great stay and a highlight during my trip to Australia. Bronte and Susan's apartment is highly recommended!

Susan and Gregg are the perfect hosts, not only with their warm welcome and lovely local bread, yoghurt and fruit, but their considered expert knowledge both locally and the wider Sydney area. Their studio matched the expectation and was snug, private, quiet and well presented, we liked it so much we stayed twice! Bronte is a perfect location for stunning coastal walks, funky eats(3 blue ducks and the Pavilion mm!) and easy bus and train, best of all is Susan and Gregg as hosts!
We had a very enjoyable stay at Susan's studio. The studio was extremely comfortable, private and in a great location. We would be happy to stay again

Beautiful home away from home! Susan and Greg are fantastic hosts. Incredibly helpful and provide a really wonderful experience. Nothing is a problem and they went out of their way to accommodate us and our baby girl. Loved the location, morning walks to the beach, plenty of great cafes near by, especially love the stunning oasis of a garden setting. Impeccably clean and well equipped. This will be our regular Sydney place to stay. Thanks so much.

Susan's studio was great,bright for us. 
Wonderful sunshine ,lovely garden and beautiful Bronte beach ;-) 
so warm welcome when I'd came there. 
Have good time and enjoy at stay
Thank you so much
Lovely
Susan again made our Sydney stay memorable.We can't recommend her highly enough.she is a deserved Super Host!

Staying at Susan and Greg's is like staying in a boutique hotel with your own little private patio. The studio was comfy and pristine clean and had all you need for breakfast and tea at hand. Plus you get wonderful granola, proper orange juice and gourmet yoghurt, and even fresh bagels on our second day in! Our hosts were so welcoming and helpful and even offered to do our laundry. 
The location is perfect for exploring the Eastern beaches of Sydney (great coastal walks from Bronte to Coogee and Bondi) and there are also regular buses to the city nearby. We loved it and definitely recommend!
Susan's studio is lovely and made a perfect nest for us during our stay in Bronte. Susan and her friends' welcome was nothing but warm. Highly recommended.

Our stay in Bronte was lovely. Communication with Susan was easy and clear. Susan and Greg were welcoming and very respectful if our space and privacy. We knew they were around if needed though felt we had our own space too. A great little pad in the gorgeous Bronte. Highly recommended . Thank you

Hubby and I loved our stay at Greg and Susan's B & B.  The cottage is private and surrounded by lovely gardens. Light breakfast provided was just right, delicious and healthy.  We really enjoyed being able to walk to beaches and great cafes.  Thank you Greg and Susan for your hospitality and the unexpected little touches that made our experience so enjoyable.
Very warm and welcoming hosts. Lovely spot in a terrific neighbourhood.

We had such a wonderful and memorable time at Susan's cosy Studio in Bronte Beach. Susan and Greg gave us a very warm welcome and spoiled us throughout the entire stay. The Studio, which is seperated from the main house, provides everything you would need and makes you feel home from the very beginning. It is perfectly located if you like to combine your visit to Syndey with a day, or two, at one of the city's most beautiful beaches. We hope to be back soon!

We absolutely loved our stay at Bronte B&B Studio! Susan was so accommodating and the studio was clean and fresh and tastefully decorated. We loved all the extra touches - fresh fruit and yogurt in the fridge, lovely organic teas! It's a nice short walk to the beach and there are lovely cafes and restaurants nearby. We will definitely be recommending the studio to our friends and would stay there again when we are next in Sydney.
Every detail was perfect and this was a great stay in what was a very busy week for me.  Susan and Greg made me feel completely at home.  Plus, it was really excellent value.  Thank you so much.

Thank you Susan and Greg, for being such friendly hosts and for a pleasant stay in your lovely, quiet, peaceful, comfortable studio garden retreat near Bronte beach. Would be pleased to stay there again and to recommend it to others

Susan was a fantastic host, she's been very attentive in every detail of our stay, from the first contact to saying goodbye.
The place was really lovely and nested in Susan's gorgeous garden, which in itself is a little heaven. 
The small details, like a lovely breakfast, international power plug adapters, and beach towels were simply delightful.
We had a wonderful time and I highly recommend her place.

My husband and I stayed at Susan's and Greg's studio over three days in early November.  When walking through the back garden towards a small building at the back, we were stunned by the subtropical beauty of its setting, with a huge purple jacaranda tree and flowering hedges.  The view from the inside towards a private outdoor dining space was no less spectacular.  

The photos of the interior were very accurate: a light, very nicely decorated and comfortable room, with a well supplied kitchenette (the bar fridge thoughtfully hidden in a cupboard blocking out any possible noise), and an en suite  bathroom. 

Both, Susan and Greg replied to our messages promptly before our arrival and were very welcoming when we got there.  At the same time, while available if needed, they left us to ourselves respecting our privacy, which was greatly appreciated.  

Susan was very generous, supplying not only maps and guides to the area, as well as her personal recommendations regarding local cafés, but leaving ample gourmet breakfast provisions in the fridge, and a surprise basket with fresh bagels, organic butter and Yarra Valley jam on our doorstep the next morning.

Its location was our original reason for choosing the studio: in the heart of stunning Bronte, within easy walk to the beaches and the annual Sculpture by the Sea exhibits along the shore between Tamarama and Bondi.  What a treat!
The studio was exactly as described a lovely private place to stay. Every thing was clean and tidy and Susan was really welcoming and helpful. A great place to stay!
A beautiful studio set in a gorgeous garden with all the little thoughtful touches needed to make a truly special stay. Thank you again.

Susan & Greg were incredibly welcoming and generous. The location is perfect-quite,close to great beaches and local shops and restaurants. The studio was spotless and well equipped with everything you need )plus everything that Susan knew you would need but you forgot). 
The fridge& kitchen was stocked with goodies that made it feel like Christmas-such a treat.
The shower is great, bed super comfy and the space very private. 
It was a perfect weekend stay and I am thankful that Susan responded promptly to my last minute request. Beautiful studio, lovely hosts!! 
Looking forward to staying again soon.

We had a fantastic time at Susan's place. She was there to greet us when we arrived and showed us to our room. The room was perfect. Extremely jeat and tidy and had absolutely everything we needed. It was quite private amd very close to the beach and shops so getting around was easy from her place. Will definitely be heading back again in the future!

Our stay at this charming cottage in Bronte was very pleasant.
The place was spotless with very nice hosts that went out their way to make us welcome.
we would stay here next time and recommend it to friends.

Susan's studio in Bronte is a jewel. Located in her beautiful garden, the studio was just the perfect place for our stay in Sydney. Super well equipped with everything you need. Not only is the place beautiful, Susan is also the perfect host. Very sweet, caring and always there to help when you need anything. Thank you.

Susan and Greg are some of the most caring, welcoming and thoughtful hosts I have met. Their studio is the perfect place to stay near Bronte beach - light, airy, very clean and well appointed with a super comfortable bed, roomy bathroom and the comforts of home. I awoke every morning to the sound of birds and an ocean breeze, and loved relaxing in the beautiful garden space which they have lovingly created. It offers the quintessential Bronte neighborhood experience - 10 mins stroll to the beach, close to the best restaurants and is located in a lovely street full of native flora.

But what makes this home really special are the hosts' thoughtful gestures - everything from the breakfast items they left me, through to local tips and suggestions, as well as an invitation to join them for festive celebrations. They are both natural hosts - available if you need assistance but also offer guests privacy and personal space.

This is the perfect place to stay at one of Sydney's best beaches (as a single or couple). I look forward to enjoying Susan and Greg's hospitality and friendship again very soon!

I think this was my favourite place to stay ever. The weather was very rainy when I stayed but this was the perfect place to hide out, relax and get over my jet lag. Lovely quiet spot. The facilities were fantastic and I arrived to fruit, milk, orange juice, yoghurt...chocolates! The place is beautifully decorated and everything has been thought of! Susan and Greg were just great. Always to hand and very attentive (even doing my washing) but they gave me my space and the accommodation is very private. Couldn't fault it. Thanks so much!

Bliss! We had such a lovely time in Bronte and that was all thanks to Susan & her husband and their studio setup - to say we highly recommend this place would be an understatement. 
The location made for a convenient base to access both the city and the nearby surrounds of the eastern suburbs. 
The studio itself had all the facilities we needed for our stay with the decor and lighting creating the relaxing coastal oasis that we were after - even a tasty local breakfast was provided as a bonus! Thank you Susan, was so lovely meeting you and feeling so welcomed into Bronte.

Susan and her husband Greg were great! They gave us great advice on the area, did a load of laundry, and had yummy treats for us to eat.The studio was so comfortable, clean, and i loved how open it was. Thank you!

We had a lovely time at Susan and Gregg's beach studio. We were made to feel very welcome, the studio was immaculate and every morning we had a basket of fresh bread and jams left outside our door.

The studio is nestled under trees which keeps it cool, along with the ceiling fan above the bed.

Bronte is a peaceful suburb that is perfectly positioned for everything. The Bondi and Coogee walk is a must and Bronte is on route along that walk.

Thank you Susan and Gregg for being a wonderful part of our three week Oz adventure. :-)

Nature brings out the best in us and this garden studio does exactly that. The studio lies at the bottom of a very grassy garden surrounded by large trees. We loved opening the double studio doors to let the morning light stream in through the leaves. Valentine's Day was a delight with warm bagels, churned butter and strawberry jam delivered to our door. We had planned to go out for breakfast but it was too good to resist and we felt better for staying at home with each other. Bronte cafes, restaurants and beach just a stroll away and we found ourselves talking about moving there. Susan and Greg are awesome hosts. We think this place is pretty special. N

We had a lovely time staying with Susan and Greg. They made us feel so welcome, introducing the apartment thoroughly and the local area too. They even helped us with local taxis and arranged a travel cot for our little one.

The apartment has great links, with amazing walks to Bronte, Bondi and Coogee. We ate in Susan and Gregs wonderful oasis garden one evening and in local restaurants.

The apartment was very clean, practical and just like the description.

Would definitely recommend this place!
I had a very pleasant stay.

We felt very welcome from the first moment. Our little house was in the end of  a wonderful garden. We felt very private. The location is fantastic in a quiet place, close to the City and 8 minutes walk to the beach with a wonderful oceanpool to swim in. Susan and Greg are great hosts, very caring and helpful they even did our laundry. They also invited us to a local jazz house and we had a great time together. It seems like the Airbnb spirit comes from their hearts. We  loved our stay and would come back if we get the chance. It's highly recommended!

Such a wonderful place to stay and a wonderful location. Susan and Greg were lovely hosts. They pointed us in the right direction for best places to swim and eat and left us to it. We had a relaxing three days/two nights and managed to get in several trips to the beach. The flat itself was quiet, spotless and very comfortable. Whilst we stayed before arriving here in a hotel in town, this place was better, more relaxing and a place we are already thinking we would like to return to.

I really enjoyed my stay at this Bronte home.  It was exactly as described - only better.  It was a safe haven - and easy walking to the best bakery (Iggy's) I've been to, as well as a juice bar, coffee shop and a couple of great restaurants.  Also not such an easy stroll to the paths along the coast (just because of the hills!) but no distance at all.  Highly recommended.

My boyfriend and I had a lovely 2-night stay at Susan and Greg's Bronte beach cottage. They have thought of everything to make it seem like home! We really appreciated the delicious and thoughtful breakfast, and also enjoyed being so close to great restaurants. We didn't miss having air conditioning despite the hot weather as there was a refreshing breeze and we were able to keep the windows open.

What a find! Bronte B&B surpassed our expectations. It was relaxing, comfortable and had everything we wanted and more! Susan and Greg were delightful, giving us our own space but there when we needed anything. If we ever return to Sydney we will know where to stay!

Very nice as usual.
Everything was ready and Susan is always very friendly.
Beautiful studio at the end of a pretty garden. Well equipped and had a very nice stay. Would love to go back if back in Sydney. Highly recommended.

Susan was very considerate, warm and welcome, so as hubby :) Garden flat is at the rear of lovingly maintained older style house. Room is as you see in the photo and very tastefully done. quality bedding, loved the floor tiles in the bathroom, leafy garden to enjoy quiet time and reading. Friendly cat sits on your lap. Beware of mozzies though. I am usually the last person to get bitten, but I attracted plenty in the garden. The suburb,shops and Tamarama beach has "local" feel and lot less commercial than places like Bondi and Coogee. Easy bus ride to Bondi junction and city. Very nice coastal walk we enjoyed. We had a nice time.

Susan's Bronte B&B Studio is a wonderful place to stay if you have the chance. The studio is very nice, clean, and secluded, just as pictured. It makes excellent use of a small space. Susan and her husband are very friendly and welcoming. She was great with communication, and really helpful in providing information about the area. She was very generous in providing tasty breakfast/snack food and drink (specific to our vegan diet) during our stay. The neighborhood is lovely, and the beach is just a short walk away, downtown a longer walk (or bus).

We very much enjoyed Susan and Greg's Bronte B&B.  The location was ideal for beaches and the coastal walk.  There were also neighborhood shops and restaurants within an easy walk.  We appreciated that beach towels and breakfast were provided.  We also appreciated their flexibility about check out when our plans changed.  The studio is just like it looks in the pictures and the garden is a very peaceful place to wake up in.  We recommend to anyone looking for some quiet, peaceful time in a great area.

The garden bungalow is amazing, a little oasis.  Super cute and very comfortable and stocked with everything you need.

Susan is a great host.  She was awesome about letting us drop our bags off early, and even offered to help, if our daughter who is studying abroad for a semester  in Sydney, needed anything.  Highly recommended.

We arrived and were pleased to see the house was on a good street with lovely gardens. We were welcomed warmly by Greg. The studio was warm, clean, with lovely provisions. In the morning I found fresh bagels and jam on the step so I could relax and not have to go to the shop!  Walking to Clovelly and Bronte was a delight. We enjoyed breakfast in the Garden. Thanks for a lovely stay. Regards Anne and Rodger

Susan's Bronte B&B is absolutely perfect! Susan and her husband were extremely welcoming and lovely people to have a chat with. Her room in Bronte is located at the end of their beautiful backyard, separate from their house and is precisely as described on Air BnB. The room is bright, spacious, super clean and has all the amenities that one could possibly need whilst away, with a big comfortable bed to boot! Susan had thought of everything for the room, from an iron, insect repellent to breakfast, a fruit bowl, tea, coffee (real coffee) and chocolate!! They are a short walk from cafes and restaurants and Bronte beach and a longer walk to Bondi. Highly recommended host!

This was a perfect place to stay, and was just as we imagined it. It's in a nice quiet spot yet the beautiful beach and coastline are handy and access to downtown and anywhere else is easy and quick by bus and train (with an Opel card each). The buses often run every 10 minutes. The coastal walks to either Bondi in the north or Coogee in the south are recommended. 
There were some good choices for restaurants locally or towards Bondi Junction. 

Susan and Greg were great hosts and were helpful in every way. I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again when visiting family in Sydney.
So comfortable and homely. Susan really has thought of everything to make your stay truly wonderful.

What a stunning place to stay! Both Susan and her husband Greg were there to greet us upon arrival and showed us to the quiet, clean and well appointed studio. They were more than happy to help with directions, restaurant suggestions etc. There were so many lovely little touches in the studio, plenty of supplies including T2 tea, chocolate and fresh orange juice.  Their studio is really close to everything Bronte has to offer and I wouldn't hesitate recommending this to anyone visiting Sydney and the area.

This was such a beautiful place to stay - everything was so thoughtfully appointed and lovely and it's in a great spot. There was delicious muesli, fruit, yoghurt and other treats for us to eat. Susan and Greg were very generous hosts - they even dropped over fresh bagels on Sunday morning! We would love to come back again - we had a wonderful time.
Thank you Susan and Greg. Your studio is perfect.

We had a great long weekend here.  It's a very nice studio but definitely suits a stay during finer weather so that you can take full advantage of the outdoor table and chairs.
Excellent location - close to shops and beach, and easy street parking.
Lovely hosts.  Thank you!

We only stayed one night but it was a lovely clean and comfortable studio. tucked away at the end of the garden it was quiet and private. Everything was provided that we needed. The Nespresso was great when we didn't want to go out for coffee! The studio is easy walking distance to Bronte beach, pubs and restaurants. We didn't actually get to meet susan, her daughter checked us in. but communication with her via Air BnB was easy. I would definitely stay again if I go back to this area.

We had a marvelous stay at Susan's beautiful cottage. The attention to detail, tasteful decor, gorgeous garden and warmth of our hosts was very much apprecited. Beats a hotel room! Wonderful location and very convenient to the best of Sydney's eastern beaches. Susan and Greg - you are a super Super hosts! Look forward to returning soon. Catherine
