Wow! Susan and Greg, thank you for being such wonderful hosts in Sydney! We truly felt welcomed and at home in Bronte Beach-- and would recommend your place to anyone visiting-- hands down! The cottage was incredibly comfortable and was the most magnificent starting point for jogs along the beach, brunch at the beach, and short rides into Surry Hills/downtown Sydney for sightseeing and evenings out. Thank you both for the tips and the wonderful hospitality!!

What a gem! From the minute we arrived, Susan makes us feel very welcomed. 
Loved everything about the place. Susan is the perfect host, everything is well thought of - the good food guide books to the beautiful tea cups, really make you feel right at home. 
Highly recommended.

we stayed at Susan's house for two nights. It is our best experience in AirB&B. House is just look like pic. so clean and comfortable with big garden outside. you will get everything you need in Susan's house. Especially, Susan is a amazing host. she is so kind and helpful. She made breakfast for us, which is amazing and delicious. Thanks Susan for everything during our stay. You make our travel to Australia more meaningful and fruitful.

Susan's place is beautiful and she makes you feel like just a friend that has come to stay. The studio has absolutely every little thing thought of. Parking is easy, public transport right around the corner and great cafes and shops just a 5 minute walk. I definitely recommend it. You have easy access to everything but your own little garden oasis to escape back to.

Susan made me feel very welcome when I arrived, asking me in for a coup of tea and some dessert! The studio was very lovely to stay in with lots of thoughtful touches like a variety of tea, beach towels for swimming and tide time charts. I had a lovely time staying here and would definitely recommend it.
Absolutely going to book here again. Susan and her partner were very accommodating and even dropped off breakfast the morning after our first night.

Staying at Susan's is the best. She is SO thoughtful and caring, supplying a gorgeous organic breakfast of fruit, muesli and juice. ( and chocolate!). The location is fabulous, just a short walk past amazing realestate to Bronte beach and pool. Our electric blankets were on and the place heated on arrival. Susan knew we are going through tough times with family illness and surprised us with a beautiful breakfast basket on Sunday morning. She is a treasure and we are honestly disappointed if we are unable to stay there. Jenni and Steve
We continue to chose to stay here because Susan is so caring and thoughtful. Everything is taken care of and all the extras like the tea selection, the chocolate and the fruit are lovely
Very welcoming holiday stay in Bronte. Susan and Greg's little oasis at the bottom of their garden gave us privacy and allowed us to relax. Very comfortable studio unit.

Susan's place was fantastic! Bright and lovely, in a great location. I stayed for three nights while in town for work. I had a hire car with me, and street parking wasn't an issue. Would definitely stay in this gorgeous studio again!

We absolutely loved our stay in Bronte. I would highly recommend staying here for a perfect weekend away. Susan and Greg were lovely. They greeted on arrival and made sure we were comfortable. Susan left me her umbrella as it was raining the day we arrived. They provided us with great tips on what to do and where to go in the area. The studio is beautiful. We were provided with tea, coffee, orange juice, chocolate and other breakfast treats. Fresh bagels were delivered to our door on the first morning. The studio is very private  and comfortable- it has everything you need and more. The wifi works well, which was important as I worked on the first day we arrived. The location is perfect. It was a lovely short walk to local cafes and to beautiful Bronte beach. We walked to Bondi along coastal walk one morning and to Coogee one evening. It was a short uber to Bondi and Coogee for a night out. I would recommend for anyone to stay here and I am now completely in love with the Bronte neighbourhood. Stay here and you'll feel like a local!

We arrived to Susan's place a little tired from a long travel day, but we were so relieved to arrive to Susan's Bronte Studio - a relaxing getaway! The pictures portray the little studio perfectly. Plus, the little yard and garden area makes the cottage even more quaint. I highly recommend the Bronte studio if you want to easily access Bronte beach and also Bondi! We went surfing and swimming at Icebergs (only 10 minutes away!) Don't hesitate. Book it! (If it's available.) :)
The ideal retreat. Thoughtful touches. Excellent linen.  Lovely setting. Friendly hosts.  I'll be back.

My wife and I were made to feel very welcome - even a special delivery of local bagels with jam /butter to our doorstep the next morning . The  studio is at the back of a long and beautiful garden ( the smell of night jasmine was remarkable ) .Susan showed us the local secrets - Three Blue Ducks cafe and the pathway down to Bronte beach : the bus stop ( straight to Bondi Junction ) is close also . Cant commend it high enough if you want to be on this side of town - very quiet as well

I had a wonderful stay at Susan's B&B in Bronte. It was a beautiful studio, which opened onto a lovely view of her garden. It had all the amenities for a comfortable and relaxing stay. We enjoyed the light breakfast each morning. Only a 10 minute walk to the beach and bus stop into town at the end of the road. I will definitely be back and be recommending to friends and family!

Susan is a wonderful host! The studio is lovely and has everything you'd need for a comfortable stay. Very clean, and a very comfortable bed which is a huge plus. The garden rounds the whole place off and makes it that much more charming. Susan is very kind, and prompt about responding to any questions you might have. If I'm in Bronte again someday I'll definitely stay at her studio.

Susan was very hospitable even before we arrived at her place.  She was very thoughtful to contact us to provide information needed to get to her place.  Susan also provided suggestions for dinners and cafes to hang out around the Bronte area.  She even provided options for vegetarian!   The studio is exactly what you see in the pictures with a lovely garden.  While we had to walk pass the main house to get to the studio, it was very private at the back of the house and even your own garden.  My only regret was the weather, that it was too cold on the days we were there for us to hang out in the garden to enjoy our wines :)
Utterly delightful and a home from home in every way. All the comforts and lots of additional touches that made the stay special
Susan's place is perfect. The studio is very comfortable and private, and Susan was a great host. Location is great, just a short walk to the beach. Will definitely stay again!

After traveling half way around the world it was lovely to experience a warm family welcome that made me feel at home straight away! The studio is exactly like on the pictures and was more comfortable than I've could have wanted! I would recommend it to everyone!
Perfect stay! Studio was everything we could have asked for. Clean and with everything we needed. Waking up to the best bagels we've ever eaten on our door step was quite the treat. Thank you!
So much attention to detail in the unit and precisely as advertised. It was such a comfortable place to stay. Susan went above and beyond to make everything enjoyable and easy, too.

Susan is a fabulous host, she did everything to  help my European guest welcome and able to enjoy his stay. He loved staying with Susan and  is very keen to come back to Bronte....organic chocolate, beers, fresh bagels....comfy bed, fab location, warm and helpful host, what more could you want?
erica
Had a lovely short stay at Susan's place. She even took the trouble to forward my forgotten phone charger to me!  Thanks Susan
This is a super air BnB in a great location we recommend it unreservedly

Susan's place is a fantastic studio in Bronte. We loved our first AirBnb experience. They have set the bar high. We would highly recommend it to people who want to immerse themselves in the area. Take your walking shoes and soak up the atmosphere! Also so close to local restaurants and public transport. Thank you
Susan and her partner were extremely accommodating. Immaculate place with a short stroll to the beach and cafes. Thanks for a wonderful time.

Susan made us feel at home with plenty of information about the area and we had a few lovely chats under the mulberry tree. We really appreciated the breakfast spread! The apartment is great for exploring the Bondi-Coogee coast and provides a tranquil space close to the beach and related activities.

Susan was fabulous - everything was super-smooth, and she had provided everything I needed. A lovely, relaxing little flat at the end of a magical garden. The beach is a short walk away and a bus very close that links up with the trains. I will definitely be back.

Susan and Greg were excellent and inviting hosts.  My stay here was wonderful and over & beyond what I had expected.  Staying at this studio bed and breakfast was a 10/10.  Here you will have peace and quiet with a lush & scenic backdrop.  You will have all the amenities to live comfortably as well as all the amenities needed going to the beach.  They've thought of everything!

Susan and Greg met me at the property and gave me a run down of some places to eat, the best beach areas to head to and walking paths. I hadn't realised that a light breakfast was included so there was organic yogurt and milk provided, some fruit and muesli so was nice way to start the day and enjoy it in their courtyard. The bungalow was clean, well appointed and a thoroughly relaxing place to stay only a short walk from cafes and the beach. Susan and Greg themselves were friendly, helpful and generally lovely people.

My husband and I loved staying at Susan's place. She thought of everything to have there in the kitchenette and we found everything so clean and tidy. The location is great and so close to the shops and cafes around Bronte (an adorable and safe suburb)! Susan and her partner had great suggestions and were always available for communication. 
It felt very homey coming back at the end of the day and we definitely recommend staying here!

Susan's little flat was lovely and private, clean, comfortable and in a great location if you want to explore Sydneys beaches while avoiding the crowds at Bondi. We walked north on our first day and south on our second, both highly enjoyable and a great way to soak up local life. The apartment is incredibly well equipped with everything we needed, check in was great and we particularly loved the little court yard for tea/drinks in the shade in the afternoon. Would definitely stay with Susan again next time.

Susan was a wonderful and accommodating host and although we never met her she provided excellent communication. The studio was clean, spacious and comfortable and within walking distance to the beach, cafes and bus stops. This is a must if you are looking for a quiet beach escape!

This space is bright and airy with everything you need. Very secluded, yet Susan is on hand if necessary. Lovely walks to beach and great coffee shops nearby. Public transport close too. Had a lovely stay and enjoyed the breakfasts.

Staying at Susan's was absolutely fabulous. The place is immaculate, really comfortable and the linen is spectacular. The place has really nice towels ( including great beach towels)
Susan also provides you a very nice Organic Breakfast, yogurt and really good muesli. 

All in all this is a 5 star stay. Susan is very welcoming and the room has all the privacy and quietness in the world. Very recommended.

It was an absolute delight staying here. So close to Bondi and Clovelly. The cottage is so comfortable and the attention to detail was excellent. The bed was super comfortable and there was even a light breakfast for us to enjoy. I highly recommend this property!

Susan's backyard studio is a true gem. With its own shady garden it provides a nice resting area when returning from Sydney city trips. The place is 5 minutes from Bronte beach and all its small shops and restaurants. Absolutely beautiful.

Best Airbnb stay ever! We like to think that we're pretty good hosts, but we can learn from Susan and Greg. The place is gorgeous, at the back of an enchanted garden (with a private entrance), but totally private. Perfectly set up and equipped for a couple. But it was the personal touches that made it so great: Coffee, tea, milk, juice, bagels delivered to our door, and Susan and Greg were really kind and friendly while giving us all the space we needed. The location is also perfect. Beautifully quiet street, a couple of minutes from a great cafe (Three Blue Ducks) and a fabulous fish restaurant (Moxhe - don't miss out on this one!). Bronte Beach and the gorgeous Bronte-Bondi walk less than ten minutes away on foot. Can't wait to be back for another lovely stay.
We'll be back very soon!  Wonderful place to stay!
We so enjoyed this apartment and fell in love with Bronte. Verycomfortable, private, peaceful and very convenient for the beach and cafes. We didn't want to leave! Thank you so much.

We have stayed at Susan's place several times so this is a place we like very much. The house has a great location, close to public transport and restuarants, and the garden is very exsotic. Susan and Greg are excellent hosts. Very friendly, almost like 'old friends'. This place is highly recommeded.

We have had the chance to stay 4 weeks in this lovely cottage house. It was perfect so near by everything , beaches , wonderfull Iggis bakery , restaurants .
We Highley recommand this place too if you would like to stay quite and in a wonderful garden with a lot of birds and a lovely cat called sunday .next time in Sydney we will stay here again .
The studio was bright and spacious, with beautiful decor. Susan was very hospitable and offered some wonderful tips about the area.

Susan has such a lovely calm oasis studio in the bottom on her garden in Bronte.  It was a wonderful place to stay for 3 days. Very clean, quiet and excellent location near lots of cafes, bronte beach and buses to Bondi and beyond.  We had a great stay with Susan and her partner Greg who were both very accommodating.  We would absolutely recommend her place in Bronte and we will be staying here again on our next visit to Sydney for sure!
Susan was fantastic. They made us feel like family and it was truly a home away from home. The attention to detail was wonderful and the everything was spotless. Will stay again for sure!!

Susan's studio is perfectly located in Bronte.
The garden is just superb and the studio was so inviting and comfortable.
Faultless.

Susan's studio was just divine! Set in a secluded garden but a short walk to restaurants and the beach. She was a great and thoughtful host, with all amenities and then some - anyone would need. A delight.
Beautiful place is a perfect location & very kind, friendly hosts. Perfect . .
Place was perfect
Susan was a brilliant host and the little touches in the room (e.g. Fresh flowers) made all the difference.

Sehr schön, immer wieder gern, tolle angenehme Ausstattung mit Coffeemaker, Milchaufschäumer, Kühlschrank, Wasserkocher... eben alles, was man auf die schnelle braucht. Der Garten ist ein Traum und entspannt von hektischen Großstadt-Touren. Zu Fuß nur wenige Minuten zum Strand und dem schönen Bronte-Bondi-Walk. Wenn es nachts mal kühl werden sollte, ist eine gute Heizung vorhanden. Werde die Unterkunft wieder gern buchen.
Beautifully appointed studio with everything you need to enjoy your time in Sydney set in a lush and inviting garden.
We had a fantastic time, great location and easy walk to beaches and transport. A lovely basket of breakfast goodies was left at the door to enjoy. Highly recommended.

Definitely highly recommend if you like quality linen and towels, delicious complementary breakfast, coffee machine, private outdoor space and fabulous  location in Bronte. Susan is a great host and this place has all the extra touches for a very comfortable stay.

Susan was a superb host. Her communication prior to arrival was excellent. The studio was clean, very comfortable and modern. Her place is within walking distance of cafes and the beach and very quiet. Highly recommended.

Susan and Greg provide a beautiful space which misses nothing a hotel provides (ok maybe room service but I didn't want that) yet with extras such as privacy, quietude and a beautiful garden setting.  I also really appreciated Susans timely responses made in a very professional yet greatly warm way. Highly recommended  ("
We had a lovely weekend at Susan's studio. Great location for exploring Bondi, Bronte, Clovelly and Coogee. Very clean, warm and comfortable and looks exactly as pictured.
Wonderful area, the place was super clean and homely, great court yard for breakfast and the hosts were wonderful, so welcoming. A real treat to stay here.

This is a great little place. We spent 3 nights here and loved it. It's situated in a suburban area, about 10 minutes walk down the hill to Bronte beach and to the path which is part of the sublime Coastal Walk which runs from Coogee to Bondi. Its also about 200m easy walk to the local shops where there are several great restaurants, a fabulous sourdough bakery, a pharmacy and delicious coffee. This is also where you catch the bus which runs very regularly and goes into the city and to Central via Bondi Junction. We just left our car parked outside the house and used the bus during our stay which we found very easy and convenient.
The accommodation is a small separate studio tucked up the back of Susan and Greg's beautiful garden. It has a generous paved area outside with seating which is under a beautiful big old tree which must be gorgeous in summer. 
The position of the studio creates a sense of space and privacy. The studio itself is small but roomy. It is fresh, modern, tastefully decorated, exceptionally clean and very comfortable. Every detail has been thought of, from the shampoo and conditioner supplied, to the iron and mini ironing board, the spare towels, the beach towels, tissues, crockery and cutlery, to the lovely simple breakfast, coffee, and herbal teas. There is a reverse cycle A/C, TV and radio. The bed was very comfortable and the shower was great.
Susan was lovely to deal with, friendly and helpful, and very quick to respond. She and Greg were very welcoming and helpful but then left us to ourselves which is what we like. The studio feels private and separate from the house and is very quiet. We would highly recommend this studio and would be more than happy to stay here again.
Beautiful spot to stay - easy walk to the beach and Susan and Greg we're very easy to co-ordinate with.

Susan was a great host. She was very flexible and accomodating fir us in our stay. The property is clean and I a great location and we would definitely stay again. Highly recommend.
Steve
Just a lovely welcoming little BNB.

Susan and Greg's place was perfect for our stay. It was cozy and warm, and private. Greg greeted us when we arrived, and provided a map of local options, and even some breakfast foods and snacks for us while we stayed at the studio -- so sweet! We love Bronte and would absolutely stay here again.

Beautiful independent studio, easy access to transport, to the beach, and the Bronte shops. We had a lovely stay, the hosts were very welcoming and friendly. The studio is very quiet, at the back of Susan's lovely property, with its private entrance at the back of the garden . It is nicely furbished, and with all amenities, and lovely touches such as fresh fruits, fresh flowers, and good products for breakfast (and no problem with accomodating for dietary requirements). A great place to stay!

great quiet location
well equipped private studio
Delicious breakfast
short walk to cafes and public transport 
close to amazing Bronte to Bondi walk
Susan is a very helpful and accommodating  host

Susan & Greg's have created a gorgeous little studio at the bottom of their garden in lovely Bronte. It was super comfy, very clean, warm in winter with lots of natural light. A light breakfast is included and it was a lovely touch - the fridge and pantry was stocked with teas, coffee, milk, juice, yogurt, fruit, cheese, cereal and porridge. Greg even dropped us a basket one morning of freshly baked bagels, butter and jam. Just fabulous! 
Susan and Greg were lovely and very approachable. We spoke about our mutual interest in bees and gardens and Susan was kind enough to leave us some of her books to read. 
We can't speak highly enough of this airbnb experience - we will definitely be back the next time we visit Sydney.
The Bronte Studio is the perfect getaway. Close to beautiful beaches, the quaint standalone sits in a beautiful backyard garden with easy access to the street.
My partner and I loved staying at this lovely Bronte studio for the weekend. Conveniently located, every amenity thought of, and Susan and Greg are welcoming. I would highly recommend.

I had a wonderful stay with Greg & Susan. Their Gorgeous little Chalet was just ideal for my stay. Greg & Susan certainly do accommodate for everything & so neat & clean . So close to shops, beach & cafés. I certainly would recommend their place for anyone wanting to stay in Bronty
Leone

Susan's place is perfect for a weekend near the beach. Set in a beautiful backyard she has thought of everything, including breakfast, which is often overlooked with BnB. This was one of our best experiences staying at an Airbnb and we would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a 5 star experience of Sydney.

Susan's place is a little cottage at the end of a beautiful backyard that offers lots of privacy and a comfortable stay for a couple.  Our hosts provided lots of extras that were unexpected but definitely appreciated.  Susan's place is close to bus transport and a short walk to Bronte beach and the coastal walking track from Bondi to Coogee.  I would have no hesitation in recommending Susan's place to couples looking for accommodation in Sydney's eastern suburbs.
Perfect for a mini break and a fantastic alternative to a hotel. Clean, comfortable and very welcoming. It was a oasis!

Susan’s place was everything listed and more! She made sure that we could check in early after our long flight from the States. There were breakfast items in the refrigerator that worked very well for our mornings. She also provided fresh bagels that helped us make it through until lunch that day. The room was very very nice, secluded on the property and very quiet. It had everything that we needed and more. It is located close to a number of great restaurants and the beach! Just all around one of the best stays we had with fantastic hosts!
Very well equipped secluded cottage. Very clean & very thoughtfully and thoroughly equipped. Beautiful area very close to beach & great cafes

Can't say enough good things about our stay at Susan's guesthouse! The place is beautifully decorated and was very clean when we arrived. Everything we could think of was provided, including a map of the area & info on restaurants  (5 minute walk to restaurants and the coast!). Susan was always easy to get in touch with & quick to respond when we had any questions. Above all else, Susan & Greg's hospitality was what stood out the most. They were so thoughtful (bringing us bagels one morning, lending us peroxide when my husband came down with an ear infection). I don't think we've had a more pleasant Airbnb experience. Highly recommend staying here!

This is a great studio guest house. It is exactly as pictured. Susan and her husband were great hosts. The help arrange my early arrival and very early departure (booking a taxi for me). You really have a private space and gardens which makes for a nice quiet stay. I appreciate the espresso machine and coffee packs, also the milk, yogurt, juice, fruits, berries and granola. I would definitely stay again. It is in walking distance to great restaurant and coffee shops, and Bronte Beach.

It's a lovely place to spend few days in Sydney - it looks fantastic, very thoughtful details and delicious breakfast to enjoy outside with the cute kitty Sunday. Susan and her husband were super nice too, gave us lots of tips for Sydney and the Blue Mountains - great hosts!would love to come back!

Отличное место, если вы хотите быть поближе к пляжу. На улице нет проблем с парковкой, можно смело арендовать машину и оставлять ее рядом с домом. Сам район подходит для спокойного отдыха. 
Домик - замечательный, чувствуешь себя по-настоящему в гостях, уютно, чисто, свой дворик!

A beautiful little spot of Sydney and a charming place to stay. We truly loved our stay at Susan and Gregs apartment at the end of their garden. We travelled with our 10 month old boy and the place was just perfect and had everything we needed. Greg brought us fresh bagels each morning which was a nice touch. Bronte is fab, with cool restaurants, coffee shops close to the beach and beach pool and also has excellent bus links to Bondi Junction and the trains. Thanks so much for having us guys! Alex, Lou and Flynn

Susan and Greg’s Place is fantastic-a perfect base in Bronte, a short walk around the coast from Bondi Beach. Wish we could give them a 11 out of 10 rating!

The studio is beautiful, clean and has everything you might need. There has been a great deal of thought put into the detail. A delicious breakfast is provided and regularly topped up to give you a great start to your day.

Susan and Greg are incredibly friendly, helpful and welcoming. They go above and beyond to make sure your stay is comfortable and that you have everything you might need.

The jacaranda tree in the garden is a perfect setting in November and there are great cafes and restaurants nearby in Bronte - definitely check out the Three Blue Ducks!

Great studio, great hosts, great holiday!
Terrific place/excellent host.

The studio is a beautiful, clean, private and peaceful place. Located in the backyard of Susan's lush garden you literally feel nested among the birds singing all day long. We couldn't meet Susan and her husband in person, the more we appreciated the caring and communication prior to our arrival as well during our stay with the co-host Jeni. We loved staying in Susan's studio and the Bronte neighbourhood and recommend it to everyone who appreciates a down to earth yet bright spirited environment.

An excellent recommendation from friends.The accommodation was great with all that you could want and spacious,set in a lovely garden.The location was ideal for the beach at Bronte and walks to nearby beaches.The buses to central Sydney were ideal with only a short journey time.If we ever return to Sydney we would definitely use again
Our second visit to Bronte and to this studio. We do love it. Thank you for everything you do to make our stay so lovely.
Susan's place was charming and delightful. Just what I needed and as advertised. An excellent host
Wonderfully private garden setting with everything you could want.
Just do it!

Lovely, quiet retreat for two. We spent some wonderful days here around new year's eve and enjoyed the nice beaches in walking distance. Public transportation to Sydney downtown is also nearby. The studio is decorated with heart and we even got offered a small breakfast and wine and many good recommendations for our stay in Sydney.

We had a thoroughly enjoyable stay at Sudan’s studio and particularly enjoyed the garden setting. The studio met all our needs and we really appreciated the variety of breakfast items including the organic bagels Susan went out to buy for us one morning. Thank you Susan for a lovely stay!

This place is the perfect quiet retreat, nestled in a beautiful garden setting. 
The studio is clean, cosy and modern, and Susan and Greg are very thoughtful, friendly hosts.
It’s within walking distance to plenty of good places to get a cuppa or a meal, and of course the beach. 
And if you want to go further afield there’s a bus just down the road.

The place was fantastic
Would recommend to anyone

This place is simply gorgeous and so are the hosts! The studio offers everything you could ask for, privacy, TV to watch the Aussie Open, nespresso machine for an extra coffe or two, a fridge to cool drinks, a sparkling clean bathroom, AC, wifi, etc The garden is lush and the walk to the beach is not too bad. Breakfast places are near by and a trip to Bondi or Coogee does not take too long either.
Highly recommended!

You will love this place! A quiet, secluded and beautiful garden setting. Close to some excellent cafes and restaurants. A lovely short walk to the beach. The hosts were so hospitable and accommodative of our late arrival and late departure. This helped make our stay just perfect. A simple yet fresh and healthy breakfast of muesli, milk, yoghurt and fruit was included, along with an extensive assortment of teas and coffee, sparking water and sparkling wine. The studio apartment is fully decked out with air con, clothes hanging space, kitchenette with everything one may need, iPod dock with remote control, a giant shower head, beautiful towels, linen and other finishes. I only wished I could live here. We will definitely be back for another stay!

We spent a wonderful 8 days at Susan's flat at the bottom of the garden.  It's like a fairy bower with a large mulberry tree and a small terrace for outdoor eating.  The accommodation is small but immaculate and stylish, with a terrific shower head, quite the largest we have ever seen.  All mod cons, even a hair straightener so we wanted for nothing.  Susan and Greg are the most charming and considerate hosts.  Their hospitality is outstanding as are the fabulous surroundings of Bronte Beach nearby.  We would return in a heartbeat.
Sitio precioso, muy bien atendidos

If you're looking for a great place to stay while in Sydney, look no further. We spent a wonderful 10 days at Susan and Greg's place, they're friendly hosts who are available when you need them. Everything has been thought of at this lovely studio, all amenities are there. Just a short stroll from Bronte Beach and the local shopping strip with a couple of great restaurants. A special mention here for Moxhe, try it out if you can. Public transport to Bondi Junction and the city can be found just around the corner.
All in all this place is worth the money and we should like to come back in the future.
Gorgeous little studio set in amazing gardens. Bronte beach and some lovely cafes are only a short walk away. Susan and her husband were great hosts, making us feel very at home!

A beautiful apartment in a magical setting
If you are thinking of visiting Sydney then Bronte is to be highly recommended as a place to base yourselves and the only place to stay in Bronte is in Susan and Gregg’s stylish and comfortable apartment. 
The room is thoughtfully decorated in a simple modern style and has a great shower room included. It sits within their lovely shady garden and is a hidden gem. 
Great hosts supplying knowledgeable tips for trips and eating - don’t miss Three Blue Ducks or UYen Vietnamese restaurant; Char Rotisserie and Iggy’s Bakery in Bronte nearby. 
Bronte is on the Bondi to Coogee cliff walk and is one of the most beautiful bays - only a short walk from the apartment - though a steep climb back!
A hire car is useful though buses trains and especially the Rose Bay Ferry are easily found. Opal cards give hassle free access to these public transport options to the City - but take the ferry for the best views and experience. 
Your hosts will deliver fresh bedding and often bagels as well as jam and honey for breakfast - though gong out for breakfast and brunch is clearly a Sydney institution given the quality and choice available - Shuk or Lox Stock and Barrel both in North Bondi and Three Blue Ducks in Bronte.

Susan's place is a gem! It is super clean and fresh and has everything you need for a get-away. The lovely touches such as fresh fruit delivered on the door step in the morning and delicious supplies added to the experience. It was a little oasis in a great part of Sydney. The place is within walking distance to shops (3 -4 minutes) and within a 10 minute walk to Bronte beach with even more cafes. Susan was always available via phone when needed.
Bronte beach is spectacular part of Sydney and so is Susan's place.

Wonderful studio in a secluded spot at the rear of a beautiful garden. We had a private outdoor table. Delicious breakfast with yummy muesli and fresh fruit. Lovely soft towels and even beach towels were included. 

The studio is a short 8-10 minute walk to Bronte beach and the coastal walks to either Bondi or Coogee.

Cafes and restaurants are only a few minutes walk away.

Our hosts are friendly with a wonderful welcoming. Highly recommend this as a place to stay. We look forward to returning.

A fantastic studio, in a great location. In a  quiet and peaceful garden setting, a few minutes from Bronte’s best coffee shops and bakery. This studio is only 8ish minutes from the beach and he coastal walks to either Bondi or Coogee.
Highly recommend at stay in this studio.

We loved the proximity to shops, cafes, yoga studio! and the beach. Susan's house is very peaceful and quiet despite being so close to the beach and bustling shops. There is an amazing bakery just around the corner whose bread is outstanding. Susan and Greg are very friendly, generous and thoughtful, we had many lovely chats together, as well as being given a lot of personal space. They have a big lawn with established trees and birdlife, perfect for spending time on with our baby. 
youll definitely enjoy your stay here, it is a very special spot.

In our opinion this is a great location to explore Sydney.  Within easy reach of the beaches without being in the fast lane pressure cooker of the CBD.
Public transport is so easy with the OPEL card. Just park up and explore.

Bronte B&B studio is cute, clean and comfortable with everything you need for a weekend away. It’s in a great location – quiet and peaceful while still being only a couple of minutes’ walk from the beach, shops, cafes and public transport. Susan and Greg were great hosts giving us local tips and delicious treats from the nearby bakery.

Than You for a Brilliant stay.  We loved your Studio Apartment and found it to be perfectly out fitted with everything you could need for a comfortable stay.
The bed was extremely comfortable, the linen spotless and the towels fluffy. The Teas and coffee provided along with the Breakfast goodies and fruit perfect. Susan was extremely helpful with any  knowledge of things to do and places to go. Very happy to recommend to all the Bronte Studio Apartment.
Superb hosts. Very cute private cottage located in the garden. Fantastic location and amenities. Love Bronte and the cafes/restaurants along McPherson st.
Beautiful room in a great location. Some very nice touches and surprises.
Well presented, comfotable granny flat type accommodation in a lovely garden setting. The best hosts you could experience.

Our second time staying at Susan’s place and it did not disappoint. Great hosts, central location with good transport, quiet stately neighbourhood and lots of special touches. Looking forward to our next visit!
You won't be disappointed
The host is very friendly and nice. And they provided very delicious croissants.  Also the place is near to the beach
Susan and Greg were perfect hosts. Their studio is beautifully furnished and had everything we needed for a long weekend getaway. We would love to come stay again!

Me and my partner stayed in this Airbnb and we absolutely loved it! I’ve stayed in over 53 Airbnb’s across the world and this Airbnb was hands down one of the best places we’ve ever stayed in. The location was so close to the beach and some of the best cafes in Bronte. The room was so cozy and clean! The breakfast was so delicious with some really high quality produce. You can really tell that Susan has put a lot of love and thought into this Airbnb to make sure each guest has the best time! I would 1000% recommend this place to anyone!

Terrific in every way!  Susan was an amazing host.  Upon my arrival, she warmly greeted me like I was a long lost friend. The space is beautiful and shows such attention to detail. It could be featured in a home design magazine. Delicious yogurt, fresh fruit, and granola plus teas and coffees were provided. The linens were so cozy, I slept like a baby. The place had every special touch you can imagine. Susan gave great recommendations and was so helpful.  The location is ideal.  It's a short walk to a small grocer, pharmacy, and coffee shops and cafes, plus a most amazing bakery. You must eat breakfast at Three Blue Ducks. A little beyond the shops lies the big, blue sea that can be enjoyed by walking the coastal trail or from one of the local beaches. Bronte and Bondi beaches are easily accessible on foot.

Susan’s place is a beautiful spot to stay, lovely & clean & beautiful our side area, I certainly would go there again & thoroughly recommend it.
Leone
Very beautiful garden; nice balance of good hospitality and  privacy as you need. Location is divine. Near beach but away from tourists as you are able to hang out at local strip. Would stay again!
The best Airbnb I have stayed in, in Australia & Overseas

Susan's cottage is so sweet, compact but with everything you need and nothing you don't need. She is so kind and friendly. We loved staying at her cottage and will miss the birds singing every morning. If you want to be near Bronte Beach, it's just wonderful.

My spouse and I spent our first days honeymoon at Susan’s place.
The studio is so lovely (we both agreed it was our best Airbnb experience in the last 5years), comfy, calm, perfectly located (very close from the beach and good restaurants). 
Susan and her husband are very good and caring host.
Fully recommend the place !
Thank you Susan :)

We simply didn’t want to go back home after 4 days of being here. This Airbnb exceeded our expectations after seeing the photos and read reviews. The location is perfect for a quite weekend away, close to the beach but also convenient to get to the city for more touristy options. The studio is beautiful, super clean and has everything (literally everything, even slippers). The private courtward is also amazing. Susan and Greg are beautiful people, really nice to talk to but also really respected our privacy. 

Totally recomendable studio for spending some time in Sydney but away from the city madness.
Beautifully appointed accommodation and close to all that Bronte offers.
My partner and I had the most amazing time. The studio was lovely and was located in a gorgeous garden. Susan really went to great lengths to ensure we had a pleasant stay.

this is such a special spot! beautifully situated in a garden oasis, close to the beach and great cafes, and hosted by the nicest people! Susan also added so many special touches - teas, chocolates, organic snacks, awesome soaps and hair products. we'd definitely stay here again.

Location is great, area is very quiet. Susan and Greg were very nice and very helpful. The studio itself is a small cabin in the garden, very private and contains all that is needed. Very recommended.

A wonderful 2nd stay in this studio. We love the location, the privacy, accessibility to Eastern beaches (Clovelly, Coogee, Bronte and Bondi) and your warm hospitality,. Once again highly recommended.

Our weekend at Susan and Greg's place was relaxing and fun. We walked to Bondi and Coogee along the coast, and ate at the local cafes. (Three Blue Ducks was so good we ate there twice.) The studio is set in a lush garden, and has lots of natural light. It's also quiet and cosy - perfect for catching up on sleep. We travelled from Central by train and bus, which took about 40 minutes on average, with one change at Bondi Junction. Susan and Greg were excellent hosts. Greg met us at the house and dropped us at a bakery for lunch so we didn't get rained on, and on our second morning, we found muffins in a basket on our front step. We'd visit again with pleasure.
Fantastic beautiful relaxing place to stay. Perfect hosts. Great location. Will stay again.
Perfect !!

WOW. This was by far the most outstanding AirBnB experience I have had to date. Susan's place itself is perfectly located a short walk from Bronte beach and is a gorgeous garden hideaway under the shade of a mulberry tree, that we loved coming "home" to each day. The space is tastefully designed and decorated and the thoughtful touches went above and beyond ... from delicious gluten-free muesli, to the high quality tea selection, and natural and high quality soaps, high-speed WiFi. Our hosts were easy-going, kind and friendly, we felt immediately at home and were only sorry we didn't have more time to spend with them. Thank you!

Susan’s studio is bright, clean and wonderfully located in Bronte. The beach, a fab bakery, and great cafes and restaurants are all a short walk away. Susan was a wonderful host and the little touches and local knowledge made our trip extra special.

We enjoyed our stay at this lovely place very much. Susan and Greg are very welcoming hosts and the accommodation exceeded all our expectations. We will certainly recommend it to our friends and would love to come back and stay again soon.
A definite consideration if u want to be in Bronte it’s got all you need

Susan’s studio is a wonderful space: stylish, sparkling clean, quiet, close to the beach and a very quick bus trip to Bondi Junction, and set within beautiful gardens. Susan added some thoughtful, unexpected extras, was very accommodating of our flight delay and provided excellent dining recommendations. We would happily stay again.

Susan would be an excellent host for a couple looking for a personal and caring bed and breakfast experience.  We were disappointed in the size of the facility (plenty of room outdoors in the garden - but that was spoilt by mosquitoes).  The breakfast offerings were high quality and unusual but limited in choice and very much a DIY experience.
Wonderful hosts, thoughtful and nice place with great location. Will stay again next time
I can fully recommend this stay. Susan and Greg are great hosts. The studio is fully self contained, quiet and private. Bronte is a terrific location, particularly if you like the beach.

My girlfriend and I stayed at Susan's for a weekend. The studio was beautifully decorated and had everything we could need for a perfect trip. They had a lovely garden and a beautiful outdoor setting for us to enjoy. Susan and Greg were very welcoming and gave us plenty of advice on the local area. We hope to come back soon because staying here made the trip so much more special.

Susan's garden studio is the perfect place for a few days stay. The location is fantastic and it was lovely for us to sit out on the terrace and have a delicious coffee (Susan kindly provides Nespresso pods to use in very stylish cups!). They studio decor is beautiful and there were so many thoughtful touches. Susan was so considerate in helping us with an early check in. I couldn't recommend her place more highly!

This place is a gem. We arrived on a rainy day, but managed to enjoy being close to the beach.  The space is outstanding, as others have highlighted.  We loved the quick walk down to the beach and the many cafes in the area. Communication was proactive and quick and the hosts are a delight!  We really felt at home. Finally, we had flight troubles from NZ to Sydney and Susan was nice enough to hold the place for us even though we missed a night. We can’t wait to return!
We loved our stay in Susan and Greg’s garden studio. The location is great and the studio is well equipped and full of thoughtful touches. Thank you!

We can Highlight recommend staying at this lovely Place and These Great hosts. Amazing Little hideaway in a lovely garden, everything you need is either in your House Ort you can ask Susan and Greg and thy will Kindly help you, either with Equipment e.g. A Great sun tent for the Beach or with local tipps. It Was a Perfect stay!

Greg & Susan’s place is simply gorgeous!!! We LOVED staying here. If you are looking for privacy, while still being looked after this is your place. Greg & Susan are fantastic hosts, they even surprised us one morning with a beautiful breakfast basket, which was placed discretely in front of the guest house’s door. The guest house is super clean with great amenities. Local restaurants are within a very short walking distance, and so is the beach. This airbnb is 5 Stars all the way, very highly recommended!!
The cottage is a lovely & peaceful oasis tucked back in a gorgeous garden.  After a hot day at the beach, this is a perfect place to retreat.  Highly recommend!
They are real super hosts everything was perfect. We could even leave our bags there before chech in. Food was amazing. So was the space. We are looking forward to staying again soon.

If so, then our Artistic Guesthouse is perfect for you! Located in Surry Hills is our 3-storey modern design Artistic Guest House. It is situated on a busy street in the heart of the Sydney CBD, just 1-minute walk from Central station! Our place is great for couples, solo adventurers, students and business travelers alike.
space: Each room is fully renovated with a professional designer, it boasts an artistic, stylish design which brings a very relaxing modern atmosphere and we are sure you will love it here. If you are looking for something nice, convenient and close to everything, then this is the place for you! THE GUEST HOUSE: This private artistic guest house is a 3-storey modern home with a stylish design just 1-minutes’ walk from Central train station. It is perfect for couples, solo adventurers, business workers or a small group of friends. neighborhood_overview: Surry Hills is an evolving area known for its stylish cultural and cafe scene. Terraced houses on Crown and Cleveland streets showcase hip coffee joints, fashion boutiques & global eateries. Trendy pubs, wine bars & galleries dot this community hub with a contemporary design. Held once a month, the Surry Hills Markets lure shoppers for snacks and vintage goods. It is an excellent place to be!  As well as being the name of the most impressive city in the world, Sydney is the name of the suburb that covers the CBD, Opera House, The Rocks, Circular Quay and Darling Harbour. So, you know you're going to get views, history and plenty of places to booze with the suits. But what makes Sydney great are its fabulous little mini-burbs.
notes: To ensure a pleasant stay for all, please show consideration for all the guests sharing the premises. •Guests shall maintain their rooms in a condition that does not create a fire and/or hazard. •No overnight visitors are permitted. •Guests are responsible for the behaviour of their guests, no additional guests allowed without prior getting consent from the host.  •The building is always to be kept clear of garbage and debris. •No smoking, alcohol, bad language or drugs on the premises. Smoking allowed outside the property with proper disposal. All facilities are communal. Please clean up after yourselves, especially in shared spaces like the kitchen and bathrooms. Do not leave dirty dishes in the sink. Please KEEP QUIET after 10 pm, no loud music, conversations or devices allowed. Please be respectful of others and only whisper after 10 pm. All lights out in common areas before midnight. Check-in is from 2 pm and self check out is at 10 am. Thank you for your consideration.
transit: Just 1-minute (30 meters) walk to Sydney Central Station, the largest station on the Sydney Trains and NSW Train Link networks •2 mins walk to Crown St – the heart of Surry Hills, packed with top restaurants, cafés, bars, boutiques, and specially designed stores •2 to 6 mins walk to several bus stops, which takes you to the most of Sydney’s tourist attractions •5 mins walk to Oxford St – Sydney’s most colourful street •12 mins walk to Chinatown – one of Sydney’s most beloved tourist attraction, Sydney Paddy’s Market is just next to Chinatown •10 mins walk to Hyde Park – Australia's oldest public parkland •20 mins walk to Darling Harbour – Sydney’s entertainment hub •20 mins walk to Sydney Tower Eye, St Mary’s Cathedral, Martin Place  •20 mins walk to Townhall, QVB & Pitt St Mall •35 mins walk to iconic Sydney Opera House & the Harbour Bridge, and Circular Quay Wharf •35 mins by bus to the world-famous Bondi Beach •12 minutes by train to Sydney International Airport (4 stops) Also, with
access: No keys to lose or to return! This property provides secure, keyless entry with a Samsung Smart Lock keypad. Unlimited Wi-Fi is available free of charge. You will have your own comfortable private room each provided a study desk, closet with a single/double/bunk bed. You will also have full access to shared spaces including common and storage areas, shared bathrooms/toilets, are located on both floors while outdoor dining areas on the front veranda with street views. The kitchen is located on two floors of the property if you wish to cook basic meals. There is a fridge, microwave, small stove top, electric cooker, kettle, toaster, pots and pans and crockery. Most of our guests don't cook however because of our location - there are just so many restaurants for a decent price, not even a minutes’ walk from where we are! name: Sands Of Kahana 234 - 2 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom | Sleeps 6
summary: SPRING SAVINGS IN APRIL! 20% OFF! Beautiful remodeled corner unit with Central AC and panoramic sunsets!
space: Enjoy views of Molokai and Lanai in one of nicest corner units in the Sands of Kahana.  This air conditioned 2 bedroom, 2 bath unit with two lanais is one of the most spacious waterfront units on Maui. From the front balcony you are so close to the ocean that you can toss out a flower and watch it gently float back to the beach. Off the second bedroom balcony, you can watch the surfers at S Turn or maybe a turtle sunbathing on the beach. And don’t forget enjoy the nightly sunsets and the whales when they visit during the winter. When you enter the unit you are welcomed by the spectacular ocean view. The large kitchen has beautiful granite counters and modern appliances. The cabinets are a rich cherry wood. Draw the ice for your drinks directly from the refrigerator.  You can create Mai Tais or blend a Pina Colada. Although most visitors enjoy the Maui cuisine of the West Side restaurants, you have the choice of using the gourmet kitchen or simply going down to the beach to use one of t

neighborhood_overview: The Sands of Kahana does have a great beach out front for swimming and other water activities.  There is also a great restaurant on site as well as a few within walking distance such as Miso Phat Sushi and Maui Brewing Company.
transit: We recommend renting a vehicle while on Maui as there are so many amazing things to see on this island and having a car makes it easy!  Parking is included in your fees; the front desk will issue you a parking pass.  This property does not have assigned parking but there should be plenty of stalls available.  If you do not wish to rent a car, public transportation is nearby.
access: The Sands of Kahana has a 24-hour front desk, please check in with them and they will issue you a key for the condo!  All property facilities (pools, bbq’s, gym’s, tennis courts, beach volley ball) are available for your use.  Beach towels are provided in the condo!
interaction: The Sullivan Properties office is located in Kahana in the business building across from the gas station and McDonald’s.  We are open 7 days a week and have an emergency line for after hours if needed!
house_rules: We have no long distance phone service, so please bring your cellular phone or phone card! RATES, TAXES, CHECK-OUT CLEAN CHARGE & REGISTER OR MISC. host.host_about:
Aloha & Welcome to Maui Resorts at Sullivan Properties, offering affordable Vacation Condo Rentals on the tropical paradise island getaway of West Maui, Hawaii. We have been providing visitors and residents with the best Maui Vacation Condo Rentals, Real Estate Sales, Property Management Services, Activities and Car Rentals for over 20 years. We can provide you with the best quality, selection, value and service on the "West Side" of Maui. We specialize in properties located in the: Kapalua Resort, Napili, Kahana, Mahinahina, Honokowai, Kaanapali, Lahaina, and Olowalu areas of West Maui.

We offer tastefully furnished and spacious accommodations at all of Sullivan's managed resort properties. Enjoy complete kitchens that offer home-like conveniences. Golden sand beaches, championship golf courses, gorgeous sunsets and pristine views of both the West Maui Mountains and the Pacific Ocean are all part of the vacation experience.

space: Grasp the beautiful sunsets and rainbows from this very spacious three bedroom, two bathroom condominium. host.host_about:
Bir yanında Yeşilçay, diğer yanında Göksu dereleri, yeşilin binbir tonunu içinde barındıran ormanları ve Karadeniz'e bakan altın sarısı kumsallarıyla adeta bir yeryüzü cenneti, Ağva. Yeşilçay ve Göksu'nun denize döküldükleri yerde oluşan küçük bir delta üzerine kurulu olan şehir, Latince'de "iki dere arasındaki köy" ve "su" anlamlarına geliyor...
İstanbul'a sadece 97 km uzaklıktaki Ağva, şile ilçesine bağlı bakir kalmış yerlerden biri. Şehrin karmaşasından, süratinden, gürültüsünden yorgun düşenler için ideal bir dinlenme, nefes alma yeri.Ağva beldesi, Roma, Ceneviz,Bizans egemenliklerine girmiştir. Osmanlı döneminde önemli bir Rum nüfusu varmış. Milattan önceki yüzyıllarda, M.Ö 5. ve 7. yüzyılda, Ağva ve yakınlarında yerleşim bulunduğuna dair kanıtlar ele geçmiştir. Kalıntılar; Hitit ve Friglerin de bölgede yaşamış olduğunu gösterir. Başta Yeniköy olmak üzere çevre köylerde, Roma ve Bizans dönemine ait kalıntılar bulmak mümkündür.Ağva'nın tarihte bilinen ilk konukları Hititler olmuştur. Daha sonra Frigler, Romalılar, Bizanslılar ve Osmanlılar gelmiştir. Tarihi M.Ö. 7. yüzyıla kadar uzanan Ağva'da, Hititler'e ve Frigler'e ait kalıntıları, ayrıca Roma ve Bizans döneminden kalan kilise kalıntılarını, mezar taşlarını görmek mümkündür.Ağva otelleri

name: Casa Cosi - Gotico
summary: Au coeur du Barrio Gotico, à 5 min des Ramblas et des la plaza Real. Un typique appartement de 100m2
description: Au coeur du Barrio Gotico, à 5 min des Ramblas et des la plaza Real. Un typique appartement de 100m2
house_rules: The Barcelona city tax is not included in the price : 2,48 € per person over 16 years, per night, (for) up to 7 nights. It is payable at check-in. Extra fees :  -	Charge of 30 euros for arrivals on Sundays and local Bank Holidays  -	Late check-in : 30 euros for arrival between 21 :00 and 00 :00 and 50 euros for arrival between 0 :00 and 6 :00. No party and no noise after 22:00. Please respect the neighbors.

host.host_about:
Choisis principalement pour leur emplacement et leur luminosité, nos appartements Casa Cosi ont minutieusement été rénovés afin de préserver leur caractère tout en leur apportant un maximum de confort : double vitrage, climatisation et chauffage central, salle de bain modernes, cuisines fonctionnelles, meubles et literie de qualité, équipements complets : TV, électroménager, vaisselle, linge de maison et bien sur une connexion internet avec wifi....

Nous avons choisi des emplacements centraux pour que touristes ou en voyage professionnel, vous puissiez profiter d'un quartier vivant qui vous ouvre les portes de la ville mais aussi bénéficier d'une grande offre de transports.

À Barcelone, notre quartier de prédilection est l’Eixample. Un quartier central, animé proche des Ramblas, du Passeo de Gracia, de la Plaça de Catalanuya et plaça Universitat. Un quartier à l'architecture moderniste dans lequel les commerces, les restaurants et bars à tapas sont nombreux. Un quartier à partir duquel on se promène dans la ville.  

Notre structure de taille humaine nous permet d’être proche de vos attentes. Nous vous accueillons à votre arrivée pour vous présenter le lieu et le quartier, et restons joignables tout au long de votre séjour pour vous orienter et répondre à vos éventuelles demandes. N'hésitez pas à nous contacter.

Welcome to Casa Cosi !

name: BEAUTIFUL 2-BEDROOM TOWNHOUSE NYC
summary: Beautiful, spacious 2-bedroom apartment in safe & central Manhattan location. Large apartment with 2 bedrooms, a full kitchen and bath, wireless Internet, cable TV, and dishwasher. Less than 1 block from the train, walking distance to Central Park.
space: Experience New York City in true Manhattan Style...  Sharp, fully-furnished,  loft-style 2 bedroom apartment in renovated brownstone townhouse.  Located in the affluent Mount Morris Park district of Manhattan, the building is within 1 block of the 2/3 Express Train with less than ten minutes to Times Square, 34th Street, the Theater District, Columbus Circle, and Lincoln Center. The apartment is within walking distance to Central Park, Museum Row, Columbia University, restaurants, grocery stores, cafes, and shopping. This luxurious apartment is beautifully furnished in a safe, central, and convenient location. Shopping, restaurants, cafes, and coffee shops are within one block of the apartment.   Amenities include:  Keyless Entry Wireless Internet  Cable Flat Panel TV Washer/Dryer in each apartment Granite kitchen Dishwasher 2 queen beds 2 twin beds 2 queen sleeper sofas Fully-supplied kitchens and baths   Air mattresses available   This apartment definitely has the "WOW" factor!   You

As a courtesy to other guests, please do not make excessive noise in the hallway when entering or exiting the building. While you may feel free to relax in the apartment keep in mind that there may be tenants above or below you. For guests with children, please be mindful of children running and jumping.  Please do not leave items in the hallway including garbage, luggage or other personal items as hallways must be clear for safe entry and exit at all times.   The roof hatch is a fire escape only – Luxury Living Suites strictly prohibits guests from entering or occupying the roof of the building unless in case of emergency.  Luxury Living Suites assumes no liability for personal injury in or about the premises nor does it assume responsibility for damage/loss of personal items during your stay. host.host_about: I am a real estate entrepreneur specializing in short-term rental accomodations in New York City and San Francisco. I started this business after tiring of staying in small, cramped, expensive hotel rooms.  During a subsequent visit to NYC, I stayed in a short-term rental apartment and decided that staying in an apartment was the only way to have a true and satisfying experience in a major city.  I don't regret my decision - we host guests from all over the world.  We enjoy providing high-end, luxurious accommodations for travelers looking for an authentic but luxurious experience.  Almost without fail, we get a "Wow!"  each time a guest arrives at one of our apartments.  Satisfied guests make it all worthwhile.

reviews.comments: The apartment was nice! It is spacious and corresponds to description and photos of the advertisement. The location is perfect, near tho the subway and the zone is ok; you can find anything you need (supermarket, restaurants...). All has been prepared by Tammy and her team for our arrival. Thanks to them.
Very professional. Pictures same as the actual unit. Building manager Bonaya was a pleasure to deal with. Will definitely stay here again!

Very convenient to the subway, vibrant neighbourhood, I'm a little tiny white woman and I wandered around alone without any worries.  Kind of loud with the windows open, but there is always the A/C option and heaters/fans are provided. Apartment was clean and had everything necessary for basic cookery.  Titi (manager who met us) was very gracious despite our late arrival (pro tip - make sure you are on a red 2 or red 3 train as you head uptown, the red 1 line takes you 8-10 blocks west of where you want to be).

Super séjour à New-York sur Lenox Avenue, le quartier est super, vraiment animé avec des bons restaurants à proximité et la possibilité de faire du shopping.
Les lits n'étaient pas tous très confortables et il manquait un peu de vaisselle (4 tasses) mais sinon tout était en ordre et on se sentait bien dans cet appartement. On a aimé loger chez Tammy! Merci!
Nice apartment in good location. Big enough for a family with 5 persons. Very close to the subway. Contact with our host only per phone and mail.

I planned a trip with 5 of my girlfriends and stayed at this apartment. It was exactly as described- very close to subways which made getting around very easy; spacious enough for all of us to stay comfortably; washer/dryer definitely came in handy! Tammy and the on site manager were easy to get a hold of. I would definitely recommend this place to others coming to visit :) Thanks for the great time Tammy!!

We spent tr
The apartment is as described in the announcement and looks like the pictures : sunny, large and comfortable. Living there is a good opportunity to meet true New Yorkers and not tourists.
Tammy and Titi are available and efficient.

-- Español --
Estoy muy contento de haber tratado con Tammy, es una persona muy profesional, eficiente y comunicativa. Rápidamente respondió a todas mis preguntas y siempre estuvo disponible para echar una mano.

El apartamento es tal y como aparece en las fotos y como es descrito, es enorme tratándose de Manhattan y está muy bien equipado. Nos alojamos un total de 6 personas y un bebé. Además tiene muy muy cerca una estación de metro y varios supermercados. Realmente se lo recomiendo a aquellos que vayan a visitar la ciudad. Sin dudas volverá alojarme allí.

El vecindario es fabuloso,  es un barrio muy tranquilo y familiar, la gente es simpática y están dispuestos a ayudarte para cualquier cosa, Harlem es un sitio ideal para vivir en Nueva York. 

-----
-- English --
I'm very happy to have dealt with Tammy, she is very professional, efficient and has very good communication skills. She quickly answered all my questions and she was always available to help  me.

The apartment is exactly as it appears in the pictures and described. For Manhattan, this apartment is huge and it's well equipped. We stayed there a total of 6 people and a baby. A subway station, supermarkets and stores are very close. I really recommended it. I'll stay there again.

The neighborhood is nice, very quiet and homey, people there are very friendly and they're willing to help you for anything. Harlem is great to live in New York.

Great location, close to metro 2  and 3. Large flat in typical brown stone
Very practical if you work in Manhattan or upper outside

Barman dans les bars les plus branchés pendant plusieurs années, alors n'hésitez pas si vous avez des questions et/ou besoin d'aide pour obtenir des réservations, cela me fait plaisir!

Great location and a fantastic space. Stylish and super clean and ultra convenient parking. Highly recommended!

great place
Great place in perfect location in Montreal, good walking distance to most destinations. Great place to stay with nice balconies!

Alex’s place is right in the heart of the city of Montreal, with limitless things to do around and easy transportation via metro, although most things are walking distance. There is an IGA right around the block which was convenient for food shopping and beer. The place was very clean, comfy bed with balconies on both rooms. Alex’s place also had a wii-U which was fun to play in the morning when it was raining out. Alex was also a great host who answered any of our questions right away and gave great local tips. We had a great time, thank you Alex.
Super AirB&B ! Je le conseille fortement !

Très bel appartement situé en plein centre-ville. Très propre, tranquille et vaste. L'accès au stationnement intérieur est un peu étroit pour un VUS mais est très pratique et parfait vu l'emplacement!  Alex est disponible et répond très rapidement!

neighborhood_overview: You will be located in the heart of HOMA district. You are a walk away from the Green Line subway station (Prefontaire), which leads directly to the city center. You are one street up from the famous Sainte-Catherine Street which crosses the entire city.  Near restaurants, bars, clubs, shopping centers and groceries stores. 7 min walk to metro station 10 min drive to down town MTL 12 min ride to the BELL center 20-25 mins metro ride to UQAM, Mcgill and Concordia Universities 12 mins away from Montreal's Old Port Places and events to consider:  Olympic stadium  Botanical Gardens Biodome LaRonde Osheaga Igloofest and more...

reviews.comments:
This place is great bang for the buck and a quick stint to anywhere in the city. 

Three beds are A1 so no one is left pulling the short straw, Roku is a nice addon. 

Middle grounds between olympic village and downtown.

We had a nice stay at Melanie’s air bnb. The place was clean and well decorated. The electric key pad for the door is very convenient as you can check in and out when you please. The place is fully equipped as well with everything you need if you want to cook or do laundry. My only complaint is it takes roughly an hour to walk to downtown or it will take 40 minutes by public transport. It is roughly a 12 minute drive by taxi or Uber to Old Port. We ended up taking an Uber every day. I would not say the air bnb is in the “heart” of Montreal. It’s also a $45 cab ride to the airport. All that to say, for 3 bedrooms it’s a great deal.
Marco and Melanie were fantastic! Fast communication through the whole process and the place was amazing! Would definitely recommend. Less than a 10 minute Uber ride to downtown and three bedrooms!

We had a great stay at Marco & Melanie’s place. The space was clean, nicely decorated, well stocked, and it fit 6 people very comfortably. Getting to downtown Montreal was very accessible from this location (10 min uber, 40 min metro). We also enjoyed exploring the neighborhood of Hochelaga and there were some fun spots in walking distance. Melanie was quick to respond with any questions we had. Thank again :)
Perfect place to stay,  recommended
We weren’t in town for long but it was a great, clean and comfortable apartment for the night. The beds were also very comfortable and our hosts were great with communication.

name: Yau Ma Tei Shared Flat (Y8a)
summary: 4 people in Flat Sharing. 5/F building without lift (Walk Up Building) The apartment has everything you need, bed, sofa, washing machine, fridge, pots and pans, microwave, desk, chair, Wifi internet, all the kitchen utensils, blanket, curtain, pillows etc. Just bring your suitcase. Located at Waterloo Road, Yau Ma Tei. It's super convenient to access all types of public transportation. Good for any occasion.
description: 4 people in Flat Sharing. 5/F building without lift (Walk Up Building) The apartment has everything you need, bed, sofa, washing machine, fridge, pots and pans, microwave, desk, chair, Wifi internet, all the kitchen utensils, blanket, curtain, pillows etc. Just bring your suitcase. Located at Waterloo Road, Yau Ma Tei. It's super convenient to access all types of public transportation. Good for any occasion.
house_rules: - Electricity bill is not included in the rental. - A flatshare agreement has to be signed. And you should pay 500 key deposit and stamp duty tax about HK$80. Key deposit will be returned when you move out. -  IMPORTANT: All photos here are for REFERENCE ONLY. Please message me to confirm it the room is available or not. There is NO move in after 7 pm. There is a Flat share agreement to sign with us if you decide to confirm the booking with us, and a Hong Kong Government stamp duty to pay to the Hong Kong Government Tax which is usually less than HK$100 AND a key Deposit $500 which is refundable when you move out with us. It is mandated by Hong Kong law that a tenant and landlord / principal tenant have to sign a tenancy agreement to make the deal legal. Thank you for your understanding.

It's the best option for couples, individual adventurers, small groups and businesses travelers who want to enjoy everything Porto has to offer. I’m always looking forward to hosting great people. Email me now and embrace yourselves for the best experience ever!

You have 4 beds and 1 sofa-bed to have a great night of sleep and an awesome kitchen to challenge you to cook the best delicacies of the city. Also, you have wifi to share all the content and to be attentive to the news of your country. If you arrive earlier contact us to try to arrange a solution. Also, you have lockers in 24 Agosto bus station to keep it. name: Tranquilidade
description: A Lapa é um bairro de boêmio da Zona Central do município do Rio de Janeiro, no Brasil. Possui uma grande variedade de bares, restaurantes, boates e pubs temáticos, que atendem a todos os gostos ao longo de suas treze ruas. Sendo conhecido como o berço da boemia carioca, na atual efervescência do bairro, quinze novos estabelecimentos foram abertos em 2018. Também é famosa pela arquitetura, a começar pelo Aqueduto da Carioca, sua principal referência e cartão-postal, que foi construído para funcionar como aqueduto nos tempos do Brasil Colonial e que, desde 1896, serve como via para o bonde que liga o Centro ao bairro de Santa Teresa.

name: WYNDHAM VACATION RESORTS ROYAL GARDEN-Sleeps 4
summary: Relax in true Hawaiian paradise at Royal Garden at Waikiki on the vibrant island of Oahu! This lovely resort's expansive tropical gardens combine European elegance with Hawaii's classic tropical appeal. Set foot in the rich Italian marble lobby and be embraced with Hawaiian refinement and the promise of an island vacation in paradise.
space: Units ranging in size from studios to two-bedrooms are available at Royal Garden at Waikiki. Studios include the essentials you expect from your resort - a mini- kitchenette, lanai, cable flat screen TV, DVD player, air-conditioning and complimentary high-speed internet. One-bedroom and two-bedroom suites offer a bit more space and upgrades such as a larger kitchen, in-room washer and dryer, Bose stereo system and an upgraded lanai with even more space to admire the beautiful city and ocean views.

neighborhood_overview: Honolulu has no shortage of memorable experiences and attractions. Head out to Waikiki Beach for some of the finest swimming, snorkeling, and surfing you'll ever encounter. Take a hike up Diamond Head, the famous volcanic crater for a spectacular view of Honolulu and its stunning surroundings. Nature-lovers looking to get moving will find plenty of golf courses, hiking and biking trails among the tropical foliage. The city, on the other hand, offers endless shopping, dining, and entertainment options!

address.street: Sheung Wan, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Great stay, exactly as described! Frederic is a great host, the apartment is perfect, and the location is amazing! Super convenient to the mtr, Hollywood, and central areas. Hope to enjoy a stay at Frederic's again someday soon!

My stay at this apartment in Hong Kong was perfect. I feel like I was at home. It is well located, a grocery store next door and very safe.
A very nice place to stay.

Frederic's place is great!  Located well with good access to public transit and in the center of Hong Kong's Central district.  The room is well-appointed and the bed is very comfortable.  All-in-all, Frederic's room is perfect for a pleasant stay in Hong Kong.

If you like the pictures you'll love staying at this apartment. The apartment itself is wonderful and fully equipped with everything you might need. There is a supermarket right next to the building, a nice coffee shop 20 steps away and the MRT is 5 minutes by foot. Frederic will provide you with all information you need before you arrive. Nice place. Really.

Brilliant apartment, great location, super convenient with nearby supermarket and coffee shop. Excellent bet! We couldn't meet Frederic because he was away but he had someone else give us the keys and arranged for everything to be as easy as possible. We would highly recommend this flat.

This is a stylish apartment that looks just like the photos! The location in Sheung Wan was excellent, a short walk to the metro station; a short taxi ride to the Hong Kong airport train. Great WIFI and coffee machine. A big shower with lovely hot water (don't forget to turn on the switch just outside the bathroom though!)

We didn't meet Frederic, but all correspondence was received quickly. The arrival instructions were very easy to follow. We were met by a friend of Frederic's (who lives in the same building) who even gave us a few tips for the area!

An excellent place to stay, highly recommended.

It was very good time in Fred's flat which is same with picture.
Not only Clean also very close MTR you can get on.
I love this place and won't forget summer holiday in HK.

Fred's apartment is just as decribed in the pics and it's in a perfect location. If you're looking for an affordable, clean, conveniently located place to stay in HK with plenty of room for 2, this is your place. Everything worked out very smoothly during our 4-day stay in HK during March with the apt: his friend Simon met us in front of the building and showed us the apt. Everything we needed was provided in the apt (including an umbrella, which we unfortunately needed more than we liked to). When back in Hongkong, I would stay at Fred's apartment again.

I booked Frederic's apartment for my parents to stay in and it was a fabulous find. The apartment is exactly as it looks in the photos and is very clean. It's in a great location, easy to get a taxi or bus to get around HK Island and is less than a 10minute walk to Central and SOHO. The only thing i would say, and this is not necessarily a problem, but the bed, while very comfy, is low to the ground.

Frederic apartment is just perfect, great location very convenient. 

The apartment is very nice, clean and well decorated, so much better than a hotel room. Full kitchen, shower and comfortable bed even shower gel and shampoo sample, you won't be disappointed!

We will be back Frederic thanks for everything!

Frederics apartment was perfect for my trip to HK!  He was very helpful with my arrival schedule, keys were delivered by his friend who was waiting the moment I arrived.  The apartment is great and in a great location.  I would definitely stay here again during my next visit!

This was my second trip to Hong Kong and yet another fantastic and memorable trip made even better by Frederics hospitality.
He is a really nice guy and was very accomodating. His apartment is beautiful, spacious and very clean and the concierge is very helpful. From the moment I booked our stay with Frederic he was in constant communication and very helpful with details and directions of the area and how to get to the apartment and made us very welcome on our arrival.
I highly recommend staying at Frederics to anyone looking to stay in Hong Kong, you certainly won't be dissapointed.

Very good, light, roomy and clean apartament. The kitchen, hot water, the AC and the washing mashine are available. 10-15 mins to HK Central by foot, 5 mins to bus and tram stops, 20-25 mins to the tram station to Victoria Peak. Close to night activities, bars, restraunts and shopping areas. Good place to start in HK.

Frederic was very friendly and there was not any problem with our late (or early - 3:00 am) check in.

Frederic's apartment was wonderful. It was our first time using Airbnb and it was more than we had hoped for. It's a typical small Hong Kong apartment but Frederic has decorated so that we two did not feel cramped at all. Much more spacious than a hotel room. The bed is low but very comfortable. The shower is great. Frederic has photo guides for all the appliances and outlets. The location couldn't be better for central and surprisingly quiet for being on Queen's Road Central. You can easily walk to the Sheung Wan or Central Stations. Hollywood Rd is just up the steps and Soho a few minutes walk down Hollywood Rd. There is a market right next to the building entrance and good restaurants a block away. The best thing is Frederic has arranged for his friend Simon to let you in. Simon orients you to the apartment and the neighborhood. Both Frederic and Simon want to make sure you enjoy the apartment, neighborhood and Hong Kong. And we did. Finally Frederic is great at responding to your emails. Thanks Frederic.

We had a most pleasant stay at Frederic apartment. Everything was as described on airbnb. The location is terrific, with the MTR station a short stroll away. 
We did not have a chance to meet Frederic in person but communicating was fast and easy and receiving the keys a breeze. We will definitely stay again when next in Hong Kong on a private visit.

We really enjoyed staying here. The apartment was spotlessly clean and well appointed with a lovely natural light. All necessary amenities and equipment were thoughtfully provided. 
The location was excellent, right above a supermarket and minutes for the MTR. 
We would definitely stay here again.

Die Wohnung von Frederic liegt sehr zentral und zu Fuss ist man in 3 Minuten auf der MTR. Die Wohnung ist äusserst sauber und bietet tollen Komfort für ein Paar. Die Küche ist top eingerichtet und lädt zum Kochen ein - im gleichen Haus befindet sich ein Supermarkt und um die Ecke sind gute Restis. Ebenfalls hat es in der Wohnung eine Waschmaschine und eine Kaffeemaschine. Die Nachbarin ist eine Kollegin von Frederic und weiss sehr gut über Hong Kong Bescheid. Wir habens genossen und würden die Wohnung auf jeden Fall weiterempfehlen.

I stayed almost 3 weeks in this appartment and I felt like home! Super clean and well organized, everything was made to feel you're home. Quite, close to MTR, taxis, buses and supermarket downstairs. Great area if you want to explore the city: many lunch/dinner options around. Special thanks to Guillaume who gave me the keys and was really helpful.
See first review

The owner promptly responsive and responsible. We met a friend of the owner. All liked it. The apartment is bright and very comfortable. The apartment is close to the subway. We did not have a problem to get to the Central by foot. I can recommend the owner and an apartment.

name: Not a big room in Barcelona
summary: Our apartment has a unique atmosphere, which we try to preserve as much as possible, since the house was built in 1900. You will enjoy the great views of Barcelona’s famous sights from our home: Sagrada Familia, Tibidabo, the Agbar Tower. The provided room is small, but ideal for relaxing after a fascinating journey through the city.
space: Our apartment is located in a beautiful old neighborhood, very close to the famous tourist places of Barcelona. Next to our accommodation are restaurants and cafes, a beach at a 35-minute walk, Sagrada Familia at a 15-minute walk, Sant Pau hospital at a 15-minute walk, etc. Convenient transportation (three metro stations, various bus routes) Our accommodation is suitable for tourist and business travel.
