Удобная транспортная развязка( три станции метро, разнообразные автобусные маршруты) Наше жилье подходит для туристических и деловых поездок.
notes: Our apartment is located on the 5th floor in a building without elevator. In the room provided there is a folding sofa bed measuring 180 cm by 110 cm. We do not invite guests who are noisy and have a lot of alcohol who will disturb us or our neighbors. We do not allow the use of the kitchen.

name: Coogee Luxury Home with Salt Water Pool & Parking
summary: This unique, stylish 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom residence features bespoke interiors, a lush private garden, in-ground salt water swimming pool and security car space.  Perfectly located for a relaxed, beachy lifestyle, the home is less than 10 minutes walk to Sydney’s Coogee beach, as well as shops, bars and eateries.
space: Featuring gorgeous polished walnut timber floorboards and ducted air-conditioning, this spacious, comfortable home is perfect for a family or several couples holidaying together.  Upon entering, you’ll find 2 bedrooms, both with queen sized beds and plantation shutters.  One of these bedrooms also has a work space and an elegant bay window with a sofa.   Adjacent to these bedrooms is a bathroom with floor-to-ceiling white tiles and a double vanity.  Head down the hallway and you’ll come to a dedicated study/office on your right and then a family bathroom, also with floor-to-ceiling white tiles, a roomy shower recess and separate spa bath.  Opposite this large bathroom are stairs which lead to a loft bedroom with its own queen sized bed, and is perfect for children with games and books.   Back downstairs, continue down the hallway and you’ll arrive at a well-appointed galley kitchen with a 4 metre long stone bench top island, 5-burner gas stove top, generous sized oven and Miele dishwas

neighborhood_overview: The coastal suburb of Coogee features one of Sydney’s most beautiful beaches, along with a multitude of shops, eateries and bars to suit all tastes and budgets.  On the south side of the beach you’ll find ‘Wiley’s Baths’, a heritage listed 50 metre sea water pool.  A grassy parkland with grand old fig trees on the north side of the beach provides the perfect picnic spot next to the water.
notes: * An additional $40 will be charged to your total if a check-in happens after 8 pm, and we require your arrival time as the Concierge does not live on site. * Have you got a baby or an infant traveling with you? We’ve got you covered. Contact us, as we can also provide you with baby items (on availability and additional cost). We offer excellent package rates for two or more items. * A mandatory full clean of the property and complete linen change will be done every 4 weeks and added to your total booking amount for any booking longer than a month. This will be added to your total amount and processed separately. * Please note that this property has been specifically catered for short-term rentals and is not a hotel.
transit: The property comes with its own undercover security car space but if prefer to take public transport, it’s a short walk to Arden Street where you can catch regular bus services to Bondi Junction, one of Sydney’s major transport hubs with busses to nearby Bondi Beach or bus/train services to the CBD (Downtown).

host.host_about:
Hey, I’m Aymeric!

I’m a French expat from the vineyards of Bordeaux with a love for animals and traveling. At 18, I moved to the USA for 10 years and lived in Boston, Miami Beach and San Francisco while exploring most of Canada, Central and South America. For the past 15 years I’ve lived in Sydney, Australia, mainly because of the beautiful beaches here. On weekends in summer, you can find me volunteering as a surf lifesaver on Tamarama beach.

I work for MaisonNets, a boutique agency specializing in short-term rental management. The MaisonNets portfolio has over 125 properties, encompassing mid-range to luxury apartments and houses in Australia’s capital cities, as well as country homes and a villa in Bali.  

Our properties are all specifically selected for their amenities and prime location - the accommodation of choice for urban sophisticates, professionals, couples and families looking for a uniquely comfortable experience.

With a focus on organic products, MaisonNets offers unparalleled personal service and attention to detail ensuring that you, our valued guest, have a wonderful stay with us.

name: Amazing Waikiki Condo
summary: Amazing location right in the heart of Waikiki.  The world famous Waikiki beach is directly across the street.  The condo is located on Kalakaua Avenue.  There are restaurants and shopping within walking distance
space: Hotels on the same block charge over $400 per night for a 400 sq ft studio.  My condo is a 1 bedroom over 800 sq ft and a 100 sq ft balcony that overlooks the beach.  It is newly remodeled and has all of the amenities including full kitchen, washer/dryer, and beach equipment.
description: Amazing location right in the heart of Waikiki.  The world famous Waikiki beach is directly across the street.  The condo is located on Kalakaua Avenue.  There are restaurants and shopping within walking distance Hotels on the same block charge over $400 per night for a 400 sq ft studio.  My condo is a 1 bedroom over 800 sq ft and a 100 sq ft balcony that overlooks the beach.  It is newly remodeled and has all of the amenities including full kitchen, washer/dryer, and beach equipment. Access will be through a keypad.  My condo guest will receive 2 fobs that will get them in and out of the building.  The condo has a numeric keypad to get into the front door. You will get the entire condo to yourself.  A cleaning service will be there at the before your stay and directly after you leave. There is a public bus stop one block away. There are also a plethora of private tourist buses that drive up and down Kalakaua Ave.  The best way to get around is to use the Biki Bike system.  These bikes
notes: The condo is located on Kalakaua Ave.  This is the world famous Waikiki strip.  There are dozens of shopping malls and high-end stores within walking distance.   From casual beach snacks to Michelin rated restaurants, the Waikiki strip features all types of restaurants.
transit: There is a public bus stop one block away. There are also a plethora of private tourist buses that drive up and down Kalakaua Ave.  The best way to get around is to use the Biki Bike system.  These bikes are rented by the minute and are available in automated stalls that are within blocks of the condo.

name: Heart of Asian side
summary: A room with a single bed at the heart of Asian side of Istanbul. It is 7 minutes walking distance to the famous shopping street: Bagdat Caddesi. Lots of restaurants, cafes and pubs are available in the neighborhood. Very well connected with bus, dolmus and other public transportations.  Comfortable bed in a spacious room. You have access to the living room and kitchen. Hair dryer, washing machine, dishwasher and dryer is available. Towels and shampoo is also provided.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Eu e meu filho Cesar, temos o maior prazer em alugarmos os imóveis pertencentes a família, para famílias e grupos de amigos que estejam querendo visitar o Rio de Janeiro, a cidade mais maravilhosa do mundo.  Somos apaixonados pelo Rio!

Falamos vários idiomas (Inglês, Francês, Espanhol, Português e Italiano) e vamos ter o  maior prazer em dar dicas para tornar a sua viagem o mais bacana e sensacional!
